description: Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your  favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017’s brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!Your phone thirsts for battle!Features: 1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy’s tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart’s content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.6. Smart Offline AI Assistance In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang’s powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you’re offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.Contact Us You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/MobileLegendsGameYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA
descriptionHTML:
Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017’s brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!

Your phone thirsts for battle!

Features:

1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles
Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy’s tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.

2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy
Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!

3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory
Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.

4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master
With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart’s content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!

5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches
Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.

6. Smart Offline AI Assistance
In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang’s powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you’re offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.

PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.

Contact Us
You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:

Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MobileLegendsGame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA
developerAddress: UNIT 17, 9/F, TOWER A, NEW MADARIN PLAZA, No. 14 SCIENCE MUSEUM RD, TST, KL

summary: Enjoy the Classic MOBA on Your Mobile. Challenge Top Players All Over the World!
title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

description: [Introduction] War of Rings is a 3D MMORPG mobile game, in which players travel to the wondrous homelands of the elves, dwarfs, gnomes, orcs, cyclopses among others in order to collect 27 powerful rings and create a brand new world order! This game features many unique game modes and systems, such as the free equipment system, where equipment is obtainable only via killing monsters. The free trade system, in which players can freely trade items without price restrictions. A powerful and diverse social system, where guild members and friends fight alongside each other. And a balanced and exciting world boss system where bosses can be found across the world map and refresh all day round. [Game Features]——New Era, offline auto-combatUnique auto-combat system design that even offers offline auto-combat will help you to upgrade and kill bosses, creating a win-win situation for both work and play.——Advancement, exclusive customization systemThis game features a fully customization system, in which you can advance as you see fit, outside the constraints of a traditional class system. You can acquire your very own exclusive titles, spectacular skills and featured looks. ——Cool mounts, customizable looksDozens of cool mounts including tyrannosaurus, skyfyre and griffins are at your service, customizable equipment and splendid wings will make you stand out of the ordinary. ——Trade freely, buy or sell equipmentIn the trade market of this game, you can freely sell any unused or extra equipment you obtained from killing bosses or completing quests. None of your resources or time shall be wasted. ——Team PvE, fierce PvPPvP is allowed on all maps. You can team up to take on high level players and if you are lucky enough to give the finishing blow, then the ultimate equipment is yours. Team up to tackle the World Bosses, high drop rate makes this game more thrilling and exciting.——Contact UsIf you like our games, please follow our Facebook to get more information and events. Just feel free to give us your commentsFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/ujoyrings/Official webside: http://www.ujoy.com/rings/
descriptionHTML:
[Introduction] 
War of Rings is a 3D MMORPG mobile game, in which players travel to the wondrous homelands of the elves, dwarfs, gnomes, orcs, cyclopses among others in order to collect 27 powerful rings and create a brand new world order! This game features many unique game modes and systems, such as the free equipment system, where equipment is obtainable only via killing monsters. The free trade system, in which players can freely trade items without price restrictions. A powerful and diverse social system, where guild members and friends fight alongside each other. And a balanced and exciting world boss system where bosses can be found across the world map and refresh all day round. 

[Game Features]
——New Era, offline auto-combat
Unique auto-combat system design that even offers offline auto-combat will help you to upgrade and kill bosses, creating a win-win situation for both work and play.
——Advancement, exclusive customization system
This game features a fully customization system, in which you can advance as you see fit, outside the constraints of a traditional class system. You can acquire your very own exclusive titles, spectacular skills and featured looks. 
——Cool mounts, customizable looks
Dozens of cool mounts including tyrannosaurus, skyfyre and griffins are at your service, customizable equipment and splendid wings will make you stand out of the ordinary. 
——Trade freely, buy or sell equipment
In the trade market of this game, you can freely sell any unused or extra equipment you obtained from killing bosses or completing quests. None of your resources or time shall be wasted. 
——Team PvE, fierce PvP
PvP is allowed on all maps. You can team up to take on high level players and if you are lucky enough to give the finishing blow, then the ultimate equipment is yours. Team up to tackle the World Bosses, high drop rate makes this game more thrilling and exciting.
——Contact Us
If you like our games, please follow our Facebook to get more information and events. Just feel free to give us your comments

Official webside: http://www.ujoy.com/rings/

comments: I've been playing this game for a long time now, and I have to say, I didn't have high hopes when I started. 30 minutes in, I couldn't stop and I wanted to play more. It's a different take on a Final Fantasy game, and it really does feel like a Dissidia game in RPG form. The bravery and HP system is very interesting, and I'm always looking forward for new characters and their few, but unique, special abilities. TL;DR Overall great game.

My name is auron I've been playing game since release and I have some concerns. For starters I have 999 all strength crystals. Why is there still events to get crystals? And wakka can use some ability to boost his buff dance. He barely procs.maybe instead of strength crystals you can have key events for summon materials... Love this game btw keep up the good work and please rework wakka!!!!

It's liked someone finally thought "hey,  maybe people just want a classic ff based game with out to much mobile game bull." I liking  it so far,  leveling pretty fast(well until  the pay wall hits) and the chance of me spend money on this 70 percent. But for real,  4 chapters in still  no Squall ya killing me.

Absolutely amazing. I can safely call this an actual game that you can play. There is no energy that stupidly limits play time, you can unlock all available characters by playing the game, and it actually FEELS like a true Final Fantasy game! I love this game and I am definitely going to spend money in the future to show my support for this amazing game.   However, since this game is fairly new, there isn't much to do. You definitely need to add more quests, more characters, more events, and PvP. Real-time PvP would be amazing. This is truely a spectacular game, and I highly recommend it for any Final Fantasy fan. Also, Cloud is available near the start of the game! Big thumbs up. Please don't screw around with energy Square Enix, please as it is a plague in the mobile gaming business.   EDIT: Please increase the level cap to 99 in the future please. Lv 50 cap doesn't feel right at all. Otherwise, awesome game.

The game is amazing!! However I am not able to play on my Samsung Galaxy 9+ after upgrading my phone and this is truly unfortunate. Are you guys working on a fix? Pleease let me know, will update to five star after...cause I mean at this point I cant play the game :(.

Got this game since launch, but after the 6th days, the game get pretty repetitive. My cload still at lvl 47 lol. The cutscene video could be better because I always skipped it. The casually walking at the start of a video make me wanna spam the skip button. I remember what intrigued me from the old ff cutscenes wasn't about the graphic, but their action pack scenes. RTK just launched (currently #1 on play store). I'll be playing that game instead for now.
description: ----------------------------------------◆ Game Info ◆----------------------------------------● A Dream Collaboration! Legendary heroes and villains from across the FINAL FANTASY series come together in a compelling story of powerful deities and a world in peril. Fans of the series will see their favorite characters in a brand-new adventure, and newcomers will experience the compelling story, drama, and combat that the FINAL FANTASY series is known for!● Turn-Based Combat with a Twist! Engage in simple yet strategic turn-based combat! The unique Bravery system challenges you to balance offense with defense as you build up your Bravery and wait for the right moment to strike! ● Assemble Your Party! Build parties from a cast of dozens of FINAL FANTASY heroes and villains and prepare them for battle with a variety of equipment and abilities. Embark on a journey alongside beloved characters and encounter familiar faces, summons, and more along the way! ● Play with Friends! Multiplayer quests allow you to join forces with up to two other players to bring down mighty enemies and earn fabulous rewards!----------------------------------------◆ Story ◆----------------------------------------Darkness converges upon us, and the world crumbles before our very eyes…What was once a sanctuary for the weary has now become a battlefield.Long ago, the deities Spiritus and Materia warped the fabric of time and space to create a new world—a world they populated with warriors from other realms.These men and women were forced to fight day and night without reprieve, and the strain of endless battle soon grew to be too great.With battered bodies and shattered spirits, they sent out a cry for help…
descriptionHTML:
----------------------------------------
◆ Game Info ◆
----------------------------------------
● A Dream Collaboration!
Legendary heroes and villains from across the FINAL FANTASY series come together in a compelling story of powerful deities and a world in peril. Fans of the series will see their favorite characters in a brand-new adventure, and newcomers will experience the compelling story, drama, and combat that the FINAL FANTASY series is known for!

● Turn-Based Combat with a Twist!
Engage in simple yet strategic turn-based combat! The unique Bravery system challenges you to balance offense with defense as you build up your Bravery and wait for the right moment to strike!

● Assemble Your Party!
Build parties from a cast of dozens of FINAL FANTASY heroes and villains and prepare them for battle with a variety of equipment and abilities. Embark on a journey alongside beloved characters and encounter familiar faces, summons, and more along the way!

● Play with Friends!
Multiplayer quests allow you to join forces with up to two other players to bring down mighty enemies and earn fabulous rewards!

----------------------------------------
◆ Story ◆
----------------------------------------
Darkness converges upon us, and the world crumbles before our very eyes…
What was once a sanctuary for the weary has now become a battlefield.
Long ago, the deities Spiritus and Materia warped the fabric of time and space to create a new world—a world they populated with warriors from other realms.
These men and women were forced to fight day and night without reprieve, and the strain of endless battle soon grew to be too great.
With battered bodies and shattered spirits, they sent out a cry for help…

comments: This WAS my favorite game and was happy to spend a small amount of money to make my team competitive. If you are a new player DON'T download this game unless you plan to spend thousands of real money you are too far behind to compete. It now takes about 15 million in game currency to max out a character with all it needs. you will only make about 8 million a week if you complete every task and join a good team. So basically 2 weeks per character and you need a minimum of 5 maxed characters to make a dent

So it's kinda fun but I'm rating it low based on the cost of purchasing character shards versus how many you get. I tested it out and purchased a ton of purple diamond things and purchased character shards that gives between 5 and 330. Out of 7 purchases at 1299 each, I got a total of 41 shards. So for roughly 9100 diamonds, I get 41 shards. You do the math. This game apparently enjoys taking your money. I've mentioned this to the developers with no reply. DC Legends knows what they're doing when it comes to purchases of character shards. At least they make it easier

Very addictive. I started playing casually, and 4 weeks later I find myself checking it all the time. It's best played with at least a minor investment, but reasonably ftp...if you got patience.  Add: it's been six months, and I'm still hammering away at it. It has a huge base of fans,and I've only needed customer support once (and they handled my issue very well and quickly).  Still a bit grind-y, but great little bit of clicky gaming.

This game hooked me up. The community it is very helpfull and growing evryday.Check youtube videos befor you start playing this game because is a griding game and you will need patiance and a good guidance at the start. It is not p2w you can play it as a f2p but you will need patiance so dont worry about money...in this game money will only save you time not exclusive content. 5* from me this is for sure the best mobile game ever. May the force be with you.

I Personally would like to have the ability to upgrade stars on heroes easier without spending real money. Get 2 to 3 stars on the characters for free leaves me wanting, and im just not spending money on a game like this. Otherwise it is a fun game. Even though it basically can be a full time job you dont make money on and have to spend money on. So if you dont mind commiting months to barely make it to do the late game stuff amd still have to spend months to progress. This game will be great. This review is for those who play ftp games without actually paying to win.

The game is fun enough but to sync it with your Google account to have to give your phone and all its abilities to EA. Why is there a need for the game to access my photos and make and answer calls? How 'bout I play a game on my phone with cool light sabers and fun music and when I need to make a call I'll stop for a bit. Just let people play and EA can make bank with their microtransactions. GTFO of people's personal info.
description: “Visually striking and with adrenaline-pumping Star Wars™ music, Galaxy of Heroes is a must-play for fans for the franchise.” – USA Today"The best Star Wars™ game to release for mobile devices in recent memory." – GamezeboLive your Star Wars™ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your dream squad using characters from every era, including new characters from Star Wars™: The Force Awakens, Rogue One™: A Star Wars™ Story and Star Wars™: The Last Jedi™. Engage in epic turn-based war, confront giant bosses, progress your characters, and take your game to the next level!CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAMRebel leaders? Empire stalwarts? It’s your choice as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other characters from the Star Wars™ universe. Make key strategic moves and pick teammates with complementary abilities to go to war with unbeatable squads!BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXYDefeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames in a far-off cantina. Upgrade your heroes’ abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to achieve greatness.PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONSMake smart, tactical decisions and equip your heroes with the ultimate gear to enhance their damage in galactic war. Unlock fun abilities to make your team unstoppable as you unleash commanding moves like Luke Skywalker’s Bullseye, Jedi Knight Anakin’s Reckless Assault, and others.ENGAGE IN EPIC SHIP BATTLESCollect iconic starships and massive Capital Ships to construct your war fleets. Attack all-new challenges, fight through space, and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for Ship battles. Each vessel also has its own crew, adding special powers to individual Ships. Recruit powerful characters to create the strongest armada!RISE TO THE TOP IN GUILDSLead Raids with friends and fight against bosses like the Rancor and AAT Tank when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire arsenal of characters and ships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance when you face off against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global leaderboards in Territory War.Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.comGame EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.
descriptionHTML:
“Visually striking and with adrenaline-pumping Star Wars™ music, Galaxy of Heroes is a must-play for fans for the franchise.” – USA Today

"The best Star Wars™ game to release for mobile devices in recent memory." – Gamezebo

Live your Star Wars™ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your dream squad using characters from every era, including new characters from Star Wars™: The Force Awakens, Rogue One™: A Star Wars™ Story and Star Wars™: The Last Jedi™. Engage in epic turn-based war, confront giant bosses, progress your characters, and take your game to the next level!

CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAM
Rebel leaders? Empire stalwarts? It’s your choice as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other characters from the Star Wars™ universe. Make key strategic moves and pick teammates with complementary abilities to go to war with unbeatable squads!

BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXY
Defeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames in a far-off cantina. Upgrade your heroes’ abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to achieve greatness.

PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Make smart, tactical decisions and equip your heroes with the ultimate gear to enhance their damage in galactic war. Unlock fun abilities to make your team unstoppable as you unleash commanding moves like Luke Skywalker’s Bullseye, Jedi Knight Anakin’s Reckless Assault, and others.

ENGAGE IN EPIC SHIP BATTLES
Collect iconic starships and massive Capital Ships to construct your war fleets. Attack all-new challenges, fight through space, and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for Ship battles. Each vessel also has its own crew, adding special powers to individual Ships. Recruit powerful characters to create the strongest armada!

RISE TO THE TOP IN GUILDS
Lead Raids with friends and fight against bosses like the Rancor and AAT Tank when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire arsenal of characters and ships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance when you face off against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global leaderboards in Territory War.

Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.com

Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com

Game EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/

Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.
developerAddress: Geneva, Switzerland
recentChanges: Get excited – everything you love just got better! Now you can:
• Earn the right to multi-sim Galactic War and Ship Challenges
• Receive bonus banners based on combat performance in Territory Wars
• View which Territory War defensive squads were most successful
• Search for units by name when selecting your squad
• Set inactive units as favorites and search favorites easier
• Link accounts to play between Android and iOS devices
summary: Collect and battle with iconic heroes to become the top hologamer in the galaxy!
title: Star Wars™: Galaxy of Heroes

comments: Love this game addictive and lose time playing it. But anyone else having problems logging in? When i try to log in it just sits on the loading screen (on 100%).. Until i close the app and restart it Tried making a fresh Charecter and goes straight into other characters but just not my main.. This started happening an hour ago

This game sucks.. I always get thee same armament with only one star!  and some items are soo expensive that the money you pay is not worthy for the br you get and in return you'll get low br and also low money not worthy.. If they make this game less expensive maybe I'll give it a four stars... But no! not this time

I can't get certain menus to work. In shop its the purchase for mount gear, all i see is random text and it freezes the game. Some of the event menus do the same. Ive been playing for a little over a year and never had this problem. Please help.  Also the merit shop menu is broken. I can't buy anything and the event ends today. Ill update as I see other menus broken.

Makes you pay good money to be strong then merges you with much older servers that allows a no pay player to be much stronger ... horrible customer service also! Edit 3\18 I see Gatorcade replied to this saying contact them for help. I did 8 days ago with no reply... So yeah like I said horrible customer service

I paid money on This game only for it to stop working once I did...plunder doesn't open for me, mounts won't open for me...assassins creed play won't open...if I do open them....game immediately freezes and I have to shut down. Funny how I pay money and now I have Chinese characters all over the damn game...  THIS is absolutely a pay to play game...except when you pay...the game apparently stops working....

Hey guys.. So when I try to level up my mount I click on the icon and when it comes up most of it is blank except a few words in another language. It freezes the screen so I have to close out and sign back in. Also I can't get anything on plunder either. Some help would be greatly appreciated, thank you.

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate 2018 Lunar New Year with Google Play
==================================

Experience intense real-time combat as you hack, slash, and blast your way through a vast fantasy world! Party with friends to raid treacherous Dungeons or clash against rivals in the Arena and large-scale PvP Battlegrounds. Upgrade and transform yourself from a fledging warrior to an unstoppable God of War!

New Flying Edition featuring Aerial Battles!
I Believe I Can FLY! All new SkyWings system lets you take your battles to the air! Experience new dungeons and face epic flying bosses as you conquer the skies!

STUNNING VISUALS
-Brilliant 3D graphics and special effects puts you in the in the middle of the battle
-Highly detailed characters and fluid animations keep the combat fast and furious

VISCERAL GAMEPLAY
-Real-time CO-OP and PVP combat means the action never stops
-Epic Boss encounters test your skills and wits to the fullest
-Defend the honor of your Guild in glorious Guild Wars

ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATION
-Hundreds of Items and Equipment provides unrivaled character customization
-Unlock legendary Wrathwings and watch them transform in battle to grant devastating power
-Tame Mythical Beasts as pets and have them aid you in battle

BUILT FOR MOBILE
Special game engine built from the ground up to maximize performance on mobile
Unleash devastating skills and chain massive combos with optimized Touch controls

COMMUNITY
Visit our official Facebook page and Forum for the latest news and announcements
Official Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/LegacyOfDiscordFW

comments: From the most review, maybe Playstore should add rank and trophy for the most worst games update. And the MMORPG is a Role Playing Games, and the role for us is simple in this game, it is a same role as others, rank up your power, thats all. How can such game be called MMORPG? I suggest there is new class for this kind of games MMOPOG (Masive Multiplayer Online Power Oriented Games) + AEP behind it, A.K.A Auto and Easy to Play. Hail power which is as easy as to pay 😁.

The good. - Visual : one of the best visual in mobile game in my opinion - graphic setting : the graphic setting are good, just like a pc game where there is a lot of graphic option player can choose to get optimum performance.   The bad  - Auto questing : seriously why bother to play if it use auto, it's much better if you guys upload it on youtube as a video series.  - story : not really interesting. - character creation is just too limited.

Well... It's a good game. Better than the others... Tapi sayangnya pay2win aja sih.. Gw suka dungeon grindingnya.. Kalo bisa tambahin Special equipment yang gabisa di beli pake duit tapi di dapetin dari lawan boss , dungeon , clan war dll pokonya hasil dari loot. Tambahin juga sistem trade antar player dong pake red diamond / adena biar economy sistemnya seru.. Biar chat ga sepi.

Why can't I purchase at the bundle shop using prepaid load? I want to but that red armor selection box so badly. Please help it always says transaction failed. My Wi-Fi is stable no problem with my connection. Please fix. I'll give you higher rating when you fixed it. Anyways it's a great RPG, it's well balanced and easy to play. Continue improving.

Graphics is 5/5. Gameplay is 4/5. Control is 4/5. Given that this game's graphics is excellent, ithink the developers need to work more on making variations and unique customizations towards the characters. Now that there is a 3rd class, there is still no difference between the appearances of the 1st, 2nd and 3rd class. Unless you cast a skill, that's the only time you you'll know that character's class. I think this is what Netmarble must develop further. It is already given that most games nowadays are pay-to-win or pay-to-grow. So, making the use of excellent graphics by various character customization and great gameplay is to be expected.

Graphic 5/5 Very nice for a mobile game.  Gameplay 2/5 Lack of depth in character customization. No stats or skills to change and can't change gender and looks that much in character creation.  Control 3/5 Nice but it would be better if we could aim which target we are going to attack with basic attack and skills. Like if we press the button there's some sort of wheel to control which direction we're going to attack.  Overall nice game but definitely can be improved.

comments: This game is great and could be better if it was fair for everyone that plays! If you are a free to play player you will be destroyed with no way of getting ahead in this game. IGG only wants pay to play players with the upgrades and fixes they have put in this game. The game is fun and would have more people keep playing but once you play for a while and see it takes an ungodly amount of time to do anything in this game people quit. IGG really needs to look at this an make the game more enjoyable for all!

Love this game some people p2p but you dont have to. To level up does not take long and its easy step by step. Also if you you run into events you are not sure of how to do most pros help out . I also love the fact you can send items you need to other like food.

This is a pretty fun game as long as you don't care that IGG doesn't care. I've enjoyed the people I've met (And they're really the only reason I keep playing).  Unless you spend an ungodly amount of money it takes forever to be able to participate with the big guys (and theres ALOT of them. ) Plus there are many glitches that IGG won't ever own up to or reimburse you for. Itsnlike a vending machine play, and pay money at your own risk cuz if you lose, man you REALLY lose.

I thought this games was amazing. Spent a ton of money and it was fun. Then one night, after putting up a 24 hour shield, I was zeroed. Requested IGG look into it and requested reimbursement. Unfortunate that their glitches cause so many issues. They have so many glitches that they cannot find any abnormalities in my 24 hour shield dropping after 6 hours...  will not spend another dime on this game, and I do not believe anyone else should either

This game needs balance. Seems like all one does is hide behind shields and gather resources and hope higher might players harvest you for your resources. There should be a limit on how weak a higher might player can attack. An individual with over 100 million might should not be attacking someone with only 10 or 20 million. This game isnt a war game, its all about hiding behind a shield and being a resource collection for pay to win players

Pretty good. 4 stars because I never liked the time it takes to do stuff. I know it is profit making, but I gave 4 stars because it is manageable and they do have lots of free instant completes. This is waaaaaaaaaaay better than clash of clans... JS.
description: Want to clash with 120 million global players? Dive into LORDS MOBILE, the real-time strategy mobile MMO game chosen as one of Google Play's Most Competitive Games, and an Android Excellence Game of 2017!Explore exotic magical lands thrown into chaos by terrifying monsters and powerful enemies. Choose your favorite heroes, make new friends, and charge fearlessly into war! Strike down your foes and build an empire!FEATURES☆ An Open-World Mobile Game ☆Join with millions of players in an open world, on mobile! See, chat, and clash with other players in this MMO game!☆ Finding Friends ☆Unite your allies in your kingdom and ride into war together! ☆ Rule as the Emperor ☆Claim the throne in a battle royale for the kingdom! Will your legacy as a ruler be just or cruel?! ☆ Powerful Heroes ☆Recruit and upgrade heroes with unique skills and character! Let them lead your kingdom to glory, or mix and match them to complete an RPG-style campaign that you will want to play again and again! ☆ Master Your Strategy ☆How will you prepare your troops for the clash? Think of new lineups and perfect your strategy! Find the best way to strike down your opponent in this top-notch mobile MMO SLG! ☆ Animated Battles ☆Experience the thrill of war as armies clash in beautiful 3D graphics! ☆ Switching Kingdoms ☆Establish your empire on new lands by moving to any server you want with a simple tap! Get mobile! ☆ Choose Your Path ☆Will you conquer enemy kingdoms and imprison rival lords? Will you liberate prisoners of war? Or will your kingdom and empire crumble to dust? ☆ Summon Familiars ☆Forge pacts with fearsome monsters and make them Familiars! Train and groom your new companions to their full potential. descriptionHTML:
Want to clash with 120 million global players? Dive into LORDS MOBILE, the real-time strategy mobile MMO game chosen as one of Google Play's Most Competitive Games, and an Android Excellence Game of 2017!

Explore exotic magical lands thrown into chaos by terrifying monsters and powerful enemies. Choose your favorite heroes, make new friends, and charge fearlessly into war! Strike down your foes and build an empire!

FEATURES
☆ An Open-World Mobile Game ☆
Join with millions of players in an open world, on mobile! See, chat, and clash with other players in this MMO game!
☆ Finding Friends ☆
Unite your allies in your kingdom and ride into war together!
☆ Rule as the Emperor ☆
Claim the throne in a battle royale for the kingdom! Will your legacy as a ruler be just or cruel?!
☆ Powerful Heroes ☆
Recruit and upgrade heroes with unique skills and character! Let them lead your kingdom to glory, or mix and match them to complete an RPG-style campaign that you will want to play again and again!
☆ Master Your Strategy ☆
How will you prepare your troops for the clash? Think of new lineups and perfect your strategy! Find the best way to strike down your opponent in this top-notch mobile MMO SLG!
☆ Animated Battles ☆
Experience the thrill of war as armies clash in beautiful 3D graphics!
☆ Switching Kingdoms ☆
Establish your empire on new lands by moving to any server you want with a simple tap! Get mobile!
☆ Choose Your Path ☆
Will you conquer enemy kingdoms and imprison rival lords? Will you liberate prisoners of war? Or will your kingdom and empire crumble to dust?
☆ Summon Familiars ☆
Forge pacts with fearsome monsters and make them Familiars! Train and groom your new companions to their full potential. With their powers by your side, nothing can stand in your way!

Write your own legacy, only in LORDS MOBILE!

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/LordsMobile
Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.

[App Permission]
Devices running Lollipop (OS 5.1.1) or below can enable the following to save game data on external storage.
- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

description: Welcome to Growtopia, a free to play 2D creative sandbox platformer MMO game! In Growtopia everyone is a hero! Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires! There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends. ★	BUILD literally anything – castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!★	JOIN OUR ENORMOUS COMMUNITY - millions of players are waiting for you!★	PLAY THOUSANDS OF MINI GAMES  from parkour and races to PVP battles and ghost hunting!★	UNIQUE crafting process! PLANT seeds, SPLICE seeds, GROW trees - find your own way to create rare items!★	MONTHLY UPDATES! We do our best to entertain you with exciting monthly updates involving new items and events!★	EXPLORE countless unique worlds - you can enter any of them! ★	CROSS PLATFORM! Play anywhere – on any of your mobile devices or using the desktop client, - the progress is shared!BE AWARE! This is an online game about collecting items – make sure to keep them safe  ** Note: This is a freemium game that has optional In-App Purchases! **Note: In-App Purchase, Chat, and Tapjoy Offer Wall options can be disabled in a Personal Controls area in the Options menu.Didn't get your gems or having a problem? Email us at support@growtopiagame.com, we'd love to help!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Growtopia, a free to play 2D creative sandbox platformer MMO game! In Growtopia everyone is a hero! Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires!
There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends.

★ BUILD literally anything – castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!
★ JOIN OUR ENORMOUS COMMUNITY - millions of players are waiting for you!
★ PLAY THOUSANDS OF MINI GAMES from parkour and races to PVP battles and ghost hunting!
★ UNIQUE crafting process! PLANT seeds, SPLICE seeds, GROW trees - find your own way to create rare items!
★ MONTHLY UPDATES! We do our best to entertain you with exciting monthly updates involving new items and events!
★ EXPLORE countless unique worlds - you can enter any of them!
★ CROSS PLATFORM! Play anywhere – on any of your mobile devices or using the desktop client, - the progress is shared!


BE AWARE! This is an online game about collecting items – make sure to keep them safe
** Note: This is a freemium game that has optional In-App Purchases! **
Note: In-App Purchase, Chat, and Tapjoy Offer Wall options can be disabled in a Personal Controls area in the Options menu.

Didn't get your gems or having a problem? Email us at support@growtopiagame.com, we'd love to help!

description: As the new storm swept over, Taichi Panda 3: Dragon Hunter has embraced its Evolution Age! The modern "Mounts Hatching" DNA evolution system will gleam the complete pet ecosystem; the "Baby Mounts" with attributes-inheritance will improve their random attributes compatibility. Moreover, the newly-developed magical place - Court of Trials provides all warriors with a chance to test their pets’ lineup and observe the damage of attacks, to better enhance the unique team forces. In addition, the breakthrough of the character and pet level ceiling will be a great encouragement for warriors for their unstoppable path to Glory!  Download 2017's most anticipated MMORPG, a fantasy adventure with top graphics and an epic thrilling story! Choose your faction, develop your skills, and command a fleet of mounts for total control of the land and sky. Seize your destiny in Taichi Panda 3: Dragon Hunter. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Features:- The 2017 flagship product of Snail Games, the studio that brought you Taichi Panda- PC-level visuals immerse players into a vast 3D world- Hunt for dragons in an East meets West fantasy landscape- Join one of two rival camps, each with a unique character lineup- Explore a massive seamless map teeming with exotic creatures, breathtaking scenery, and random events with no load times- Enjoy cutting-edge visuals, including light, particle effects, and normal mapping - Snap gorgeous and crystal-clear action frames with our in-game Screenshot function- Explore every part of the fully interactive map, including rooftops, palaces, forests, and everywhere in between.- Collect a range of powerful mounts for both land and air battles- Take on World Bosses in multi-player Pve-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------COMMUNITY:Official Page: http://panda3.snail.com/Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TaichiPanda3Official/SUPPORT:support-panda3@snailgame.net
descriptionHTML:
As the new storm swept over, Taichi Panda 3: Dragon Hunter has embraced its Evolution Age! The modern "Mounts Hatching" DNA evolution system will gleam the complete pet ecosystem; the "Baby Mounts" with attributes-inheritance will improve their random attributes compatibility. comments: I would give a full 5 stars on everything because I love this game! I've spent money in the game on  building up two characters. And I'm pissed now that it appears its money totally wasted. I feel that this is basically stealing!!

My skills didn't come out when I use it.. It didn't show effects when I click on it.. It still deal damage to the monsters though.. So I uninstall and reinstall it back..  however  the loading progress keep restarting.. I had to again..reinstall the game several times! And it still didn't let me complete the download.. It keeps restarting and resetting to 0%

Since updated my graphics have changed. I don't see special effects and  the cloud tasks when I try do them I can't see the flowers and my character glitches threw the floor. And I also lost a my character after logging out and back in again

description: Battle kingdoms, wage war, fight armies, build your castle and conquer an empire with real time strategy in this epic multiplayer online RPG. Download Clash of Kings to experience the CoK fantasy world of PVP medieval combat action in an epic war game.Fight kingdoms, use dragons to enhance your abilities and conquer an empire in the multiplayer war game that pits your army against enemies and friends alike. The battle action heats up with a new army to fight, four new civilizations to explore and a new Popularity ranking system to dominate – join the Clash of Kings online game and play real time war strategy in this RPG for control over all the CoK kingdoms.CoK – Top 5 Reasons to Download:      1. Play CoK with real time MMO battle action against thousands of players worldwide      2. Battle kingdoms, upgrade dragons and your army defenses, collect resources and build an empire in this epic multiplayer online game       3. Fight against a rival castle, palace or kingdom and navigate the CoK fantasy world       4. Play tactical MMO real time battle strategy and build alliances with other lords and leaders       5. Battle and conquer kingdoms in four brand new civilizations and fight to retain your empire’s Popularity ranking in the online RPG and CoK battlefield.Fight against other lords and wage war in the massive PVP online game. Battle for control of the kingdom, build an army and shore up your defenses with upgrades to your castle, palace, dragons and army barracks to withstand even the most powerful PVE attack. Play real time strategy to strengthen control over your kingdoms, upgrade your equipment and fight in an epic MMO war to defend your castle from an enemy attack. Gain resources for your army and upgrade your palace by developing farms and sawmills. Build strategic alliances with other leaders and maintain them for your advantage.Send dragons on a journey to bring back gifts for your kingdom, use tactical MMO RPG gameplay to prevent a siege on your palace, battle enemies and manage your palace’s resources to become one of the most powerful lords in the Clash of Kings empire. Explore the new civilizations of Dragon-born, Viking, Yamato and Huaxia conquer all new territories. With new heroes each with their own specialties battling it out in the ancient valley, these battle-tested warriors are ready for intense fighting action within the ever expanding multiplayer fantasy world.Download Clash of Kings, battle enemies for top billing in the Popularity feature and take control of the realm in this epic MMO PVP war! description: Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you! New Features:●	Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.●	Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.●	Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.Classic Features:●	Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.●	Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe. ●	Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.●	Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.●	Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!●	Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.●	Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades. description: Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offersThe alliances of Good and Evil have been forged. The final battle between epic warriors and heroes on both sides is about to start. Ride the crest of the Idle RPG wave with Epic Summoners! Prepare your best summoner heroes for the fight. Join friends and players from across the globe as you embark on an epic action journey of enchantment to explore the Magic Ladder and the secrets contained deep within. Lead your action troops -heroes and warriors- into the light and overcome all battle challenges that lay before you to emerge victorious in an epic war! The world's destiny is in your hands!ENGROSSING ACTION RPG GAMEPLAYYour summoner heroes can’t wait to fight auto-battles against the enemy on your behalf! descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers

The alliances of Good and Evil have been forged. The final battle between epic warriors and heroes on both sides is about to start. Ride the crest of the Idle RPG wave with Epic Summoners!

Prepare your best summoner heroes for the fight. Join friends and players from across the globe as you embark on an epic action journey of enchantment to explore the Magic Ladder and the secrets contained deep within. Lead your action troops -heroes and warriors- into the light and overcome all battle challenges that lay before you to emerge victorious in an epic war! The world's destiny is in your hands!

ENGROSSING ACTION RPG GAMEPLAY
Your summoner heroes can’t wait to fight auto-battles against the enemy on your behalf! Recruit and gain experience with every powerful war hero in a legendary battle in this idle game!
Epic equipment and legendary summoner heroes and warriors challenge waiting for you!
Earn awesome combat rewards even when you’re offline. No need to stress when life calls!

ENDLESS TACTICAL AND STRATEGIC FUN
Plan your battle troops tactics and maneuver with your legendary hero to secure victory, it's your free action RPG destiny!
Collect, upgrade and use your equipment wisely to show off your strength as leader on an legendary epic adventure game!
Simple, yet effective strategy combat allows you to enjoy this RPG at home or on the go! Plan your characters tactics and troops maneuver and dominate the battlefield to defeat every evil challenge hero and enemy warriors adventure troops!

THRILLING ACTION BATTLE CONTENT TO KEEP YOU ON YOUR TOES
Summon and recruit summoner heroes and legendary warriors troops, deploy, defend, fight, collect and upgrade to accomplish your RPG challenge!
Between the Expedition Airship, Arena, Magic Ladder and Wishing Pond, there’s a huge world to explore in this idle war game and new creatures to find!
Your interest will never waver with our steady stream of great war content! Challenge your friends and defeat players from all over the world in this free action RPG!

A HIGH QUALITY VISUAL AND AUDIO FEAST
Exquisite warriors' aesthetics and creatures artwork in this free action RPG adventure full of fun and challenges!
Jaw dropping epic combat and maneuver animations in the arena and awe inspiring action battle challenge effects!

THROW DOWN WITH PLAYERS AND FRIENDS
Step into our battle warriors RPG Arena and compete with skilled players from all over the world! Recruit new legendary summoner heroes and warriors troops with different abilities to defeat every evil enemy!
Change your tactics and action maneuver against rivals to see your name climb the rankings and beat your friends best scores!
Win awesome battle rewards on your way to claiming the ultimate victory wih your army in this action hero war idle game!

Start now this epic adventure challenge with your best legendary hero and powerful warriors action in a fantasy adventure with different creatures and battlegrounds in a non-stop free RPG! Your destiny is to lead your magic summoner legendary heroes guild army and war troops in a battle adventure to the death!

comments: So much development has went into this game, the reason why I like it is because of the consistent updates and new stuff. It's hard to find games now with nothing new to bring to the table. It makes you want to invest into this game. Not to mention how generous they can be with the free gifts and whatnot. Keep it up Netmarble!

NM is slowly setting up higher prices for uniform qualities that should be 750 when on sale.. Now all new uniforms are 1050 when on sale even if the bonus and changes are trash. I'm disappointed that this game is changing drastically to a greedy game. Soon i will uninstall this game if this will continue.

This game is awesome. Love playing it everyday and everytime. But  recently I have a problem with the game crashing almost all the time. Please help me fix this problem.  I also want to ask when will you give Odin a uniform? A better skillset, a heal, and a piercing ability for him to shine again as a god. Looking forward to it Netmarble.

There are some incredibly predatory practices with the in app purchases.  For example, if you buy the new Emma Frost pack, you won't get her work fully leveled gear, and that isn't made clear on the purchase screen.  You will need to buy the package at least once, and possible multiple times over to actually advance her.

This game was good. The past 6 months have just been a display of how game companies do not care for user experience but rather their pockets. Cash grab all the way. This game had potential to be the greatest, but a pure let down for the entire community.
Game is easily a 4/5 stars, it's fun, addictive, and fair. It has had it wobbles but for new players, there is enough to do to keep you interested without needing to pay cash.
description: An epic blockbuster action-RPG featuring Super Heroes and Villains from the Marvel Universe!The Avengers, Guardians of the Galaxy, Inhumans, Defenders, X-Men, Spider-Man, and more!Over 100 characters from the Marvel Universe are available to play!S.H.I.E.L.D.’s very own director, Nick Fury, has sent an urgent message from the future... the convergence is destroying the world as we know it! Prepare to defend your universe!Recruit your favorite characters, complete missions, and compete with other players to be the greatest hero and save your world.Collect over 100 Marvel Super Heroes and Super Villains to assemble your ultimate team.- Level up your characters and their gear to unleash their full powers!- Build classic teams like the Avengers or X-Men to take advantage of special bonus effects.- Choose from hundreds of Uniforms to increase your character’s powers and perfect your hero's look.Upgrade powerful characters in Epic Quests!- Get everyone’s favorite Super Heroes, from Captain Marvel to Doctor Strange, and level them up while playing thrilling Epic Quests.- Unleash each character’s unique super powers as you make your way through various missions. Blast enemies with Iron Man’s Unibeam and bash opponents in the name of justice with Captain America’s shield!- Experience even more thrilling action in PvP Arena modes, where you can bring your best team to take on the world.Team up with friends and overcome incredible in-game challenges.- Take a friend’s character with you when you go into a mission for emergency assistance!- Join an Alliance and make friends. Compete with other Alliances in Alliance Conquest and take home the glory for your own team.Original new stories only found in Marvel Future Fight!- Experience unique, never-before-seen stories to find out who’s responsible for threatening the existence of your universe!- Play through Special Missions featuring the New Avengers, Inhumans, and even Spidey’s Foes!Terms of Service: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/terms_of_service.aspPrivacy Policy: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/privacy_policy.asp
descriptionHTML:
An epic blockbuster action-RPG featuring Super Heroes and Villains from the Marvel Universe!

The Avengers, Guardians of the Galaxy, Inhumans, Defenders, X-Men, Spider-Man, and more!
Over 100 characters from the Marvel Universe are available to play!

S.H.I.E.L.D.’s very own director, Nick Fury, has sent an urgent message from the future... the convergence is destroying the world as we know it! Prepare to defend your universe!
Recruit your favorite characters, complete missions, and compete with other players to be the greatest hero and save your world.

Collect over 100 Marvel Super Heroes and Super Villains to assemble your ultimate team.
- Level up your characters and their gear to unleash their full powers!
- Build classic teams like the Avengers or X-Men to take advantage of special bonus effects.
- Choose from hundreds of Uniforms to increase your character’s powers and perfect your hero's look.

Upgrade powerful characters in Epic Quests!
- Get everyone’s favorite Super Heroes, from Captain Marvel to Doctor Strange, and level them up while playing thrilling Epic Quests.
- Unleash each character’s unique super powers as you make your way through various missions. Blast enemies with Iron Man’s Unibeam and bash opponents in the name of justice with Captain America’s shield!
- Experience even more thrilling action in PvP Arena modes, where you can bring your best team to take on the world.

Team up with friends and overcome incredible in-game challenges.
- Take a friend’s character with you when you go into a mission for emergency assistance!
- Join an Alliance and make friends. Compete with other Alliances in Alliance Conquest and take home the glory for your own team.

Original new stories only found in Marvel Future Fight!
- Experience unique, never-before-seen stories to find out who’s responsible for threatening the existence of your universe!
- Play through Special Missions featuring the New Avengers, Inhumans, and even Spidey’s Foes!

comments: Ok best game ever. I always dreamed of playing games like pubg or ml something like that but its just not my thing yknow? How its hard to control and super annoying to play. But this god this takes the trophy. Easy control, fun game play, get to live again after dying so no need to be sad so yeah well done gi

Update: Game was fixed very fast and is my favorite game. Everyone should download and play this game. It's simply amazing with great graphics!!! Only thing is why can't we have a woman character? I'm a woman in real life and want to play one online too!!! When are you all going to add women characters???

Graphics are good an Gun play is pretty fair. When battling the game goes on runs where I get matched against teams whos members are way stronger then my team an I. Then it goes back to fair match making.   3 Month UPDATE: The game has turned into a money grab. You have no chance to compete against players that drop a bunch of money an have 4 an 5 star guns. This was the top shooting game in my opinion, but turning it into a pay to compete killed the fun with this game. Havent been match fairly against players in a couple weeks now. I would recommend trying a different p vs p shooting game.

Amazing game, however there is one small problem, but not enough for me to not give it 5 stars. Recently when I've been watching an ad to double the reward at the end of the battle, the video has played until the end and it says the reward has been doubled, but I only receive the regular reward? It has happened 15-20 times and it's getting slightly annoying, as I'm about 4000 gunbucks short of what I should be now. Anyways, thanks for making such an awesome free game with little to no adverts!  UPDATE: video watching for additional rewards does not work with anything. No extra crates or supplies

Initially the game seems super addictive but once you hit level 16 it gets ridiculous. You have players who have spent money on guns and you're practically no match. Also the teaming of players should be balanced out. Another thing is even if you win a match you win around 30 trophies, if you lose there's a loss of 60 and if by chance you're internet is bad and you automatically get kicked out and cannot reenter you lose a 100 .Eventually you get sick and tired of all this and the game gets boring.

After playing this game it's extremely pay to play. You never get notified if you get placed in a higher tier. There is very low rewards which makes upgrading your weapons and armor a grind unless you purchase them. Whenever you get a duplicate insignia you're supposed to get gold but you never see it. Because of these things I'm uninstalling the game. It's garbage. Good job devs!
description: ✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! • Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/
descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!

Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/
developerAddress: Antakalnio st. 17, LT-10312, Vilnius, Lithuania
recentChanges: Try the new 60-120 FPS high-end gaming experience and our full-fledged eSports Spectator mode!
- Frame Rate settings — enjoy the smoothest gameplay ever at 60 FPS on most devices and 120 FPS on Razer Phone
- New Spectator mode — use 3rd person and top-down cameras to freely switch between players during matches
- Restrict Spectating in Private Matches to prevent stream sniping
- AR Spectator for Android is finally here!
summary: Explosive FPS with super easy controls and non-stop PvP action!
title: Guns of Boom - Online Shooter

comments: Not like the online version at all. Graphics are below par. Can't access everything such as miracles on the mobile app. Can't sign treaties or find alliances. For it being 2018, you would think the app could do everything the online version does. Disappointing in every aspect. Pull it together, creators! Make something that is useful in this age, not from a decade ago.

Its the worest app ever so far. Lacking so much things that playing the game on the app causes you to lose stuff and bothers you. The funny thing is thay their site always tells you to download the app. Seriously start thinking with logic. If the app lacks so much, then stop insisting on showing that app downloading window on the site.
Cant even log in to my account. Works just fine on pc, but the app is straight up garbage. Username recovery doesnt work either. Practically nothing works and i havent even logged in yet. Insane.

When I started playing I did not provide my email. Now that I want to provide, I cannot.  I go to the lobby. Click on Extra information. Enter my email and new password  and press enter details. Nothing happens then  Something worth looking into
Too terrible compared to the pc version. The design team of this app should retake the course of basic game designing.

The game is best on pc but worst on the app. Looks like the app developer missed so many things. It gets stuck on loading status on many areas (Pillage, Transport goods, etc) and it lacks many features that are already available in pc. So technically, you still need to log in to browser version in order to fully enjoy the game. On this age, some of us no longer use browsers and expect just the app to give all things needed. I considered buying some ambrosia but seeing a lot of problems makes me think otherwise. I hope the developers spend some time in actually developing the app. The game itself has a lot of potential.

Your new culture rises up between the glitteringly blue sea and the fine white sands of a small island. But to attain growth you will need a constant supply of resources and accommodation for your people. descriptionHTML:
As ruler of an island kingdom, you build up grand citadels and storm into exciting battles with the armies of your fellow players.

In Ikariam you have command over experienced architects, soldiers and ingenious diplomats. Your new culture rises up between the glitteringly blue sea and the fine white sands of a small island. But to attain growth you will need a constant supply of resources and accommodation for your people. Mine your resources or defeat your fellow players on the battlefield for a chance of honour and a chance to get to their resources. On top of that, you can engage other cultures in trade agreements to secure your future. Lead your island kingdom to wealth, form alliances and go war against other players.

Newcomer friendly
Start setting up your town in a protected area and bit by bit discover the vast array of possibilities that Ikariam has to offer.

Build, trade, settle and loot
Build your town from ground up. Get in contact with other players to trade your wares. Settle new lands in the search of valuable luxury resources. Battle your enemies and loot their resources.

Suitable for opportunist players
Your people will continue to work on your tasks without you. As ruler, you can allow yourself time away from your people without having to worry about your accomplishments going awry.

Cooperative play
Form an alliance, unite with your friends, establish trade agreements and undertake looting missions with your allies.

Intuitive research system
Allow your clever inventors to develop sophisticated devices and dangerous war machines. Continually discover new technology, weaponry and buildings so that your island kingdom can benefit from their valuable advantages.

Endearing graphics
The blooming metropolis is extremely well detailed and soon there will even be so useful as well as gorgeous buildings that line the tidy streets.

AN ENTIRE ISLAND KINGDOM WAITS FOR YOU, ITS NEW RULER!

This game is awesome! And more importantly, it's waaaay better than the cancer graphics of Mobile Legends: Bang Bang. Although, you can never remove those kind of players but at least they stay in MLBB, and smarter people plays this. This is the best MOBA on smartphones! Kudos!

I seriously love this game and got me hooked to MOBA games. One quirk though, I got the skin for Astrid which looks like Arthuria from Fate Stay Night. One suggestion is to make her sword glow gold instead of red to make it match more to Arthuria (Saber). Thanks! Keep up the good work!

So I played to get the heroes for free on road to glory. but then there was this one hero i liked. maloch. it says i have already gotten it. but i can't use it since i havent acquired the hero. and i cant buy it. so kept playing to get the next hero and still the same problem. its like its giving me false hope or assumption that i could get those heroes. but no guess i was wrong. or it is a bug. fix this asap

I'm done. At least balance the matchmaking system and determine a players skill level. I was on Gold 3 then back to Silver 1 again? Wow Tencent. Good job making an enjoyable game, but this won't make me say that this MOBA is fine for me. Fix the issues first.

update I wonder why game app like R.O.S and this moba AOV need a huge update. Please make this game using abit amount of size from before & please make game more balance. Player with low connection please dont make them didn't join any rank match or what.. they always make our game really bad
description: Experience AOV - Arena of Valor, an epic new 5v5 MOBA by Garena!Garena 1st mobile MOBA, AOV, is now available in Philippines, Malaysia, and Singapore! Choose from a legion of unique heroes and become a legend in the Arena!Call on your teammates to join you in the jungle! Crush your enemies in classic 5v5 combat in real time! Draw first blood, carry your team, and conquer the Arena!Features:- Classic 5v5 MOBA, Perfected for Mobile -Battle in a familiar three-lane map filled with brushes, nooks and crannies that allow you to pull off amazing jukes. With intuitive controls tailored for mobile, you will dominate the battlefield in no time!- Play as any hero or legend -Explore and command a roster of over 30 heroes and counting. Enjoy a wide variety of playstyles as you lead the front lines as a tanky vanguard or infiltrate formations as an agile assassin.- The Ultimate MOBA Experience -All the familiar features that you have come to know and love, right at your fingertips! With 5v5, 3v3, 1v1, and a unique "Hook Wars" mode, AOV will provide you with endless replayability!- Fast Matchmaking & 15-Minute Matches -Enjoy the full MOBA experience in just 15 minutes! Enjoy fast matchmaking with players around the world and become a legend!- Join Your Friends in Fierce Team Battles -Enjoy fast-paced combat and forge friendships with players around the world. Interact with friends and guild buddies any time! Share the load, work together, and fight strategically. Team up with your friends in Tourney Mode and craft your own eSports legend.- Got What It Takes? Free to Play Forever -In AOV, it’s all about skill. We strive to create the most riveting and balanced gameplay, so you can turn the tide of battle and vie for glory no matter the odds. Win or lose, every action counts!
descriptionHTML:
Experience AOV - Arena of Valor, an epic new 5v5 MOBA by Garena!

Garena 1st mobile MOBA, AOV, is now available in Philippines, Malaysia, and Singapore! Choose from a legion of unique heroes and become a legend in the Arena!

Call on your teammates to join you in the jungle! Crush your enemies in classic 5v5 combat in real time! Draw first blood, carry your team, and conquer the Arena!

Features:

- Classic 5v5 MOBA, Perfected for Mobile -
Battle in a familiar three-lane map filled with brushes, nooks and crannies that allow you to pull off amazing jukes. With intuitive controls tailored for mobile, you will dominate the battlefield in no time!

- Play as any hero or legend -
Explore and command a roster of over 30 heroes and counting. Enjoy a wide variety of playstyles as you lead the front lines as a tanky vanguard or infiltrate formations as an agile assassin.

- The Ultimate MOBA Experience -
All the familiar features that you have come to know and love, right at your fingertips! With 5v5, 3v3, 1v1, and a unique "Hook Wars" mode, AOV will provide you with endless replayability!

- Fast Matchmaking & 15-Minute Matches -
Enjoy the full MOBA experience in just 15 minutes! Enjoy fast matchmaking with players around the world and become a legend!

- Join Your Friends in Fierce Team Battles -
Enjoy fast-paced combat and forge friendships with players around the world. Interact with friends and guild buddies any time! Share the load, work together, and fight strategically. Team up with your friends in Tourney Mode and craft your own eSports legend.

comments: I've reported a healing bug a few weeks ago but I think its still not fixed.   An agent told me they have already created a ticket but nothing happened. Healing still fails when heroes uses their 4th skill at the same time with the heal(eg. Leo's passion skill cutscene doesn't interact with any heals) and its frustrating.  Will change stars once bug is fixed

This is the kind of game you should open ang play time to time so you wont left behind...  But the problem is ther is always a problem in entering the game...  Now it is stock in a black screen...  Before server prob ang now this...  Feels like i have to quit if it..  Im lvl 27. Changing 2 starts to 1 star..  Sad..  Too many problem

This is the kind of game that comes once in a lifetime. Hands down, the best game on mobile right now. Top notch graphics, story, gameplay and sound. It's a bit skewed towards paying players but hey, trust me, it's worth it.  Thank you Fincon for this gaming masterpiece.

Enjoyed the early phase of the game but as days go by, it is getting boring and boring. Lack of events, very slow grind time (it takes too much time to finish a stage, tyrant, squad tyrant, conquest), very limited control all you will do is watch and wait for 5minutes to finish 1 fight, very bad drop rates its almost a joke, and worse is the huge p2p money pit devs. Smh. Not regretting on quitting this awful game

My brother using iphone 5s It says that the device is not supported to play this game.  Could you help to fix the problem? Please let me know if you are still working in to fix it.  I mean, 5s users shouldn't buy a new phone just to play this game, right?   Admit it, this game is awesome, just please, try to do something with the problem.  Waiting for your reply! Thanks

I love the gameplay. But poor server, sometimes when I change the graphic from the settings,.freezing at moment and sometimes got disconnect from the server. Please fix the lag issue from the server. Just new player here and I will rate 5* for fix the lag problem.
