comments: Nice game but the way they select the game players within the same "strenght" is unfair. Because they use infamy to measure your lv but at the same time you can get infamy even when you die in the first seconds of a match. In that way you are obligated to face strong enemies because your team is good enought to win the battle without you. In that case the game delievers a bad experience for the player.

Plz push an update to hide chat button during battles, while battle the screen should be much cleaner with minimum icons on screen or transparent eg weapon icon. Auto on off header which shows ship names icons etc to enjoy the game screen on mobile.  Ship score is added but how know the quality / grade /% over the other strong ships where do our ships stand on that point of the certain ship levels.   Sea texture and colour need to be more improved, i really love the water in the poke'go. The way it appers its great. Plz add weather effects lightings nights Strom snowy etc head lights to ships, Reload animations, ship colour paint jobs decals,

Could you fix the guild rivalry page. After battles when people go to check the quests etc. it does not pull up. Have to exit game and restart. Happens a lot and gets frustrating. Other than that it's a very good game
Good changes, but could you guys bring back the big ol' red BATTLE button? The new one doesn't quite evoke that same 'YAAAARRGH!' feeling of going into battle. Thanks:)

Bear with me here.  How about introducing a pulse that stuns? A yellow item, radius 5, 1 slot point and stun duration probably shorter than the Tesla stun in the respective training level.  OR!  have the fixers pulse gain the ability (training maybe) to stun enemies for like 1-2sec. Same duration as when a Tesla shield is forcefully taken down. (not so sure about the second one, but the first seems good)

I love this game and the fact that all the pictures of the game above aren't hyped up. They are the real game. The game is good and I love being able to select my weapons I'm still figuring the system out completely but it's great overall. The only thing I might ask for is a slightly better tutorial
description: Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles – it’s sink or win.A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.Mobile MOBAThe thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves – all while you wait for the bus. Choose A ShipChoose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality – the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is… speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. Level up your ships for more healing, defense, speed, and firepower!Weapons, Armor, Items, AbilitiesCannons, torpedoes, grenades – Collect, fuse and modify items to almost infinite variations. Choose from an arsenal of destructive or defensive items to fit your fighting style. Whatever it takes to keep you and your team stay afloat.Get StrategicAttack your enemies with a full on offensive assault, or play defense and capture the point. With different classes of ships to choose – each with their own unique abilities, and a motherload of weapons, armor, items, and perks, there is plenty of room for a wide range of battle strategies.Join a GuildTeam up with your friends in a guild and chat with your guildmates while you send your opponents to the depths. Guild leaderboards pit your crew against other bands of blast-happy captains. Who will rise to the top?Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyThis game may include: - Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. - Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page. - Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. descriptionHTML:
Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles – it’s sink or win.

A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.

Mobile MOBA
The thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves – all while you wait for the bus.

Choose A Ship
Choose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality – the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is… speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. Level up your ships for more healing, defense, speed, and firepower!

Weapons, Armor, Items, Abilities
Cannons, torpedoes, grenades – Collect, fuse and modify items to almost infinite variations. Choose from an arsenal of destructive or defensive items to fit your fighting style. Whatever it takes to keep you and your team stay afloat.

Get Strategic
Attack your enemies with a full on offensive assault, or play defense and capture the point. With different classes of ships to choose – each with their own unique abilities, and a motherload of weapons, armor, items, and perks, there is plenty of room for a wide range of battle strategies.

Join a Guild
Team up with your friends in a guild and chat with your guildmates while you send your opponents to the depths. Guild leaderboards pit your crew against other bands of blast-happy captains. Who will rise to the top?

description: The latest expected AAA Naval-battle game has been online, adding multi-lines fighting to its traditional single-line fighting! The game combines different warships to create its unique naval fleet! As the commander of the fleet, your mission is to strike enemy’s warship and to save your territorial sea! Each fighting is a kind of unique experience! = Features =Stablish Your Territory and Ready for action!You will never know how to do when you have to fight back. Your territory needs to accommodate a strong fleet and you need to protect yourself in naval battle. Establish your territory and update its buildings, which can give you a better protection in PVP and PVE.The Whole Global Multi-player Online (PVP)!You are not the only commander with territory! In this game, you need to fight with thousands of commanders to prevent them from destroying your territory. Launch your warship to defend your territory and strike with them to rob their resources!  Unpredictable Brains Battle!Technology determines its fighting capacity, but the strength comparison will not last eternally. The Most Exciting Iron Warship!Steel vessel and Solid cannon are the immortal soul of naval battle! Various aircrafts, battle ships, cruisers, destroyers are waiting silently in the dock and they are waiting for your service. Research Advanced Technology!Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. descriptionHTML:
The latest expected AAA Naval-battle game has been online, adding multi-lines fighting to its traditional single-line fighting! The game combines different warships to create its unique naval fleet! As the commander of the fleet, your mission is to strike enemy’s warship and to save your territorial sea! Each fighting is a kind of unique experience!

= Features =

Stablish Your Territory and Ready for action!
You will never know how to do when you have to fight back. Your territory needs to accommodate a strong fleet and you need to protect yourself in naval battle. Establish your territory and update its buildings, which can give you a better protection in PVP and PVE.

The Whole Global Multi-player Online (PVP)!
You are not the only commander with territory! In this game, you need to fight with thousands of commanders to prevent them from destroying your territory. Launch your warship to defend your territory and strike with them to rob their resources!

Unpredictable Brains Battle!
Technology determines its fighting capacity, but the strength comparison will not last eternally.

The Most Exciting Iron Warship!
Steel vessel and Solid cannon are the immortal soul of naval battle! Various aircrafts, battle ships, cruisers, destroyers are waiting silently in the dock and they are waiting for your service.

Research Advanced Technology!
Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.

Download Iron Warship:Battle and join the PVP war!

comments: I am really disappointed that it takes so much to upgrade each time is insane. I love that there are a few things to help but to have to put so much money into it to be able to do that really makes me not want to play, only a week of that but we get attacked so much that it was all for nothing. I must say Alot of people won't stay if this continues and you won't make as much if you contantly let people down on these little things you could fix. Makes us feel like it's only about the money... it should be fun and enjoyable but that's hard when everything takes so much and so long.... Make the money worth spending.

This game has been glitching for the past 20 hours. can't log in. have reinstalled multiple tjmes. my army will probably have been wiped out by someone who has spent 120,000 dollars on his account (yes there are people who have spent that amount and that's what you're up against) glitch laden game. admins don't give a damn. I will get a standard response to this... if any. Don't download. don't play. don't waste your time and money.

It's a good game but the issue is that much higher level players can attack you regularly. And this sets you back on your development. Level 5 players should not be being attacked by level 20 players. You rebuild an army using resources needed to grow only to have a higher level player destroy it again and again before you can even rebuild completely. My army took a day to rebuild and before I could yluse it it was destroyed again. And more resources are wasted. It is a distressing pattern that has put me off the game.

I love how the game is. Our kingdom 489 have the peace treaty. We dun attack others tagged clan bases. We let them grow. But I currently now facing a problem whereby I can't upload my picture profile. It sucks. Help me and you get ur five stars rating. Get back to me asap. I've been trying for abt a month and nothing change

This game changed my life and how I live... Up until now every so called "strategy game" has been full of nothing but disappointment but then I came across king of Avalon and I was astonished that such a game existed. The graphics are breath taking and the community is truly like your in another world... 5 stars!!!

You will have my 5stars back if you just remove that K.E. in the gold event!!! Or maybe just make it 1 day only!!!  It sucks that all my troops were killed because of that. At least maybe if someone attack a city, not all troops should be lose half of them maybe. How can i gather  resources to heal them if only few left and takes millions or thousands resources to use for healing. Un installed!!! It sucks really!!!

comments: Would be 5 stars if I could get back into the game. Have tried uninstalling but it still keeps crashing after the loading screen. A Mikaela screen comes up with a Start Download button and it crashes on this screen.  Update: I can't login on your website to log a ticket with your support team.

I do miss the old LOA - Fire Raider style of art and play, just came back after maybe a year or so and it was gone! But, Paradise seems pretty cool so far, only thing I'm not a big fan of is how everything deals with irl money while in the 'old' one you could build up gems or materials for certain things like VIP levels; also I heard about rewards being given to old players like me? That's pretty cool, will have to check that out... But yea, so far I like the game, miss the old style but it's still good to me, will update this later on when I play more.
Gave you people an opportunity to fix the stupid chibi icon characters. The latest update didn't fix that so uninstalled.  Also do not reply with a generic response cause you can kiss my ass

Only challenging for nonpaying playing. Not a big fan of pay to win games. But LoA is always addicting and just makes you want to spend your money. Not suitable if you're addicted to that overall. More nonpaying support would be reasonable for them to at least be able to compete.

Latest updates just added more to this already enjoyable game.  However I wouldn't encourage new players to spend any money on the game as the benefits are nonexistant for what you pay. Which means a limited lifespan for the game if no one is paying.  Still a good game to enjoy on a mobile device.

An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels![Game Introduction]The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. [Game Features]Superb Visual Presentation:- Stunning combat effects- Dynamic 3D scenery- Exquisite character art and designEngaging Strategy:- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategyMultiple Progression Methods:- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strengthWide Variety of Gameplay:- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goalsVisit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/
descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!

Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！

An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.

When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.

Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels!

[Game Introduction]
The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.

Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.


[Game Features]

Superb Visual Presentation:
- Stunning combat effects
- Dynamic 3D scenery
- Exquisite character art and design

Engaging Strategy:
- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil
- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategy

Multiple Progression Methods:
- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team
- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential
- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones
- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strength

Wide Variety of Gameplay:
- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre
- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!
- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals
- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goals


Visit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/
Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/
developerAddress: 12/F San Toi Bldg,137 - 139 Connaught Rd C,Sheung Wan,Hong Kong

summary: Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！
title: League of Angels-Paradise Land

But fix the loading issue so we can get back to akademia!!

Great game so far. Not sure if there is a community forum or something somewhere which would be nice. I had a character on some other server and it seemed to be erased when the new server opened? Its fine though, previous character did not have too much progression. Music is not the greatest though, would be good if you could include more classic FF music in the game.   Dailys seem a bit overwhelming. There are so many quests to complete each day to get all the chests.   Other than that im quite enjoying it. I hope this time it won't happen again.   What?? Still having the same error! Please do something about it, since the game is really nice.

And now the game doesn't even start, i love the final fantasy franchise and you have a really great game, and i like that you have to interact with the game to stay alive and it's not just automatic bullcrap, please keep updating the game.
description: 【Game Introduction】:An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.【Features】:-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
descriptionHTML:
【Game Introduction】:

An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)

Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.

【Features】:

-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.

-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.

-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.

-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.

Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/
Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
developerAddress: 1 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong
summary: The Sole SQUARE ENIX Official Licensed "Final Fantasy" Action Game
title: Final Fantasy Awakening: SE Licensed

comments: I'm glad that you've finally thrown in 5v5. It's a lot of fun.  I'm aware you're trying to do your own thing as far as mobas go but I'd appreciate it if you'd consider adding a way to set up your own build before entering que. Many mobas do the same and I enjoy putting my own spin on builds without having to sit in the shop menu in game for 30+ seconds attempting to adjust everything from the standard builds.  Just a thought.  Thanks for this amazing game. =)

The game is pretty good and the 5vs5 was the update I have been waiting for. Very easy to play nice graphics and controls are easy as well. But since the update 3.1 I have been getting bad pings but my internet is pretty good above 5 mbps constant an bing are well below 50. So have been getting thumbs down for rude pings. Kindly check i have been playing this gane for almost 2 years now. I dont want to remove the games.

I've playing vg since its been 2 years before 5v5 update. After the updates i was start matching up time was taking pretty long and when it start to play the screen doesn't show up, after that it return to vg homescreen. Vanglory is one of my favourite game in these years and i don't want to take it off from my device. Try to fix the issue pls.thx

Couldn't get free rewards for halycon, I clicked on them and it did nothing. I also had a rare mystery chest key and When I clicked to use it, it did nothing, not even get rid of the key. I had to reinstall and it still didn't work, please, help. I also never got that free chest for creating a profile. Very much appreciated if you help. I also don't know how to claim my five free heroes and one skin .-. And it shows I have no wins, which I do, but please, this really needs to be fixed!! I'm sure it's not just me who is having this problem. I also can't open my EPIC mystery chest, even though I have a key. Fix this.

Nice gameplay, very good looking graphic for a MOBA game, on phone obviously. Very nice and comfortable controls. Impressive multiplayer and, fighting system. But The only problem i found is sometimes i still disconnecting from games due to low internet connection, but i got a solid 10MBps speed. I hope Super Evil MC quickly fixes this up. Really irritating when im fighting with enemy hero and you just "pop" disconnected. The others features are just fine.

50 mbps connection with 47 pings tested during gameplay. Every time i start vainglory 5v5, works well. 10 mins in the ping goes to 30000 ms. I close the game and go to speedtest to check if my network works fine. ITS BEEN WORKING GREAT THE WHOLE TIME. i get back on the game and the ping is still 30000 ms till it goes back to normal after 5 mins. 5 MINS LOST. and after the game is over? DESERTER! do not push updates when your servers cant handle it. Its been happening to many players but they keep on thinking its their nets fault. Smh...
description: Join with friends or go solo in this breathtaking free-to-play, real-time PvP MOBA filled with dragons, epic heroes and a global community of allies ready to fight by your side. Super Evil Megacorp’s Vainglory 5V5 is the only “no-compromises” MOBA on mobile, providing to players superior gameplay and strategic depth, the most accurate and responsive controls and the best graphics and highest frame rates on mobile. Sound intense? Only if you want it to be. Have fun your way with casual and competitive experiences ranging from 5-minute BRAWLs to the full 5V5 battle arena experience. At Super Evil, we believe every phone is a portable next-gen console, and that every mobile player deserves games just as core, strategic and performant as players on PC. Experience the most powerful game engine on the platform — and the most fun you’ve ever had playing on a mobile device. If your current game was dumbed down for a mobile audience, you deserve better. Never settle for the lesser evil.THE CATEGORY-DEFINING 5V5 MOBA FOR MOBILE:- Real line-of-sight Fog of War- 120 FPS pro-motion support- Skill-based play & decision-making- Macro & rotational strategies- Objective-rich 3-lane map- Free Camera- Last-hitting- Wave Control- Lane Teleports- Active items- Intricate vision system- Original fantasy characters and storytellingVainglory 5V5 is the first and only true MOBA on the mobile platform.----------------------"This is one of the best multiplayer experiences on mobile.Vainglory is a totally legit MOBA experience, available any time in the palm of your hand." —IGN“Best Mobile Game” —2016 Global Mobile Awards“Some of the best visuals seen on the App Store.” —Macworld UK----------------------Features:== Casual, Ranked and BRAWL Modes ==Vainglory offers real-time MOBA combat with and against bots or live players. Whether you’re ranking up with your guild or just just have time for five minutes of fun, Vainglory has the gameplay style for you.== 37+ Playable Heroes & Unlockable skins ==Master heroes across a variety of themes and playstyles. Make unforgettable plays as a high-damage carry. Attack from the shadows as a menacing jungler. Soak up damage and save your friends as a front-line captain. However you like to play, Vainglory has unique, captivating heroes you’ll love — along with a hunt for skins you can earn through play without spending any money.== Touch Controls & E.V.I.L Engine Designed for Mobile ==Designed exclusively for mobile, Vainglory’s game engine is made for jaw-dropping teamfight battles running as high as 120 frames per second. Instead of janky and imprecise joystick controls where you can’t select the target, Vainglory’s pinpoint, sub-30ms touch controls offer the responsiveness and autonomy you need to win. And because everything is just a tap, you’ll attack, move and use spellbinding hero abilities with ease. == Guilds & Teams ==Need someone to play with? Vainglory’s built-in Guild Finder makes finding a team at your skill level simple. Create a team to climb ranks as a group or party up with your Guild to have fun and earn more rewards.== Chests & Quests ==Every time you play Vainglory, you make progress and collect loot you can use to open chests, unlock skins and hero talents and more. And if you’re lucky, you’ll hit one of the many massive jackpots.== World-renowned International Mobile Esport ==Watch and learn from the pros and enjoy some of the best matches you’ve ever seen — and if you’re the best of the best, travel the world and compete for massive prize pools!== Vibrant Community ==Vainglory is a global community in 14 different languages that thrives on the support of active players.----------------------Twitter: https://twitter.com/vaingloryReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/vainglorygameFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/vainglorygameTwitch: https://www.twitch.tv/vainglory
descriptionHTML:
Join with friends or go solo in this breathtaking free-to-play, real-time PvP MOBA filled with dragons, epic heroes and a global community of allies ready to fight by your side. Super Evil Megacorp’s Vainglory 5V5 is the only “no-compromises” MOBA on mobile, providing to players superior gameplay and strategic depth, the most accurate and responsive controls and the best graphics and highest frame rates on mobile.

Sound intense? Only if you want it to be. Have fun your way with casual and competitive experiences ranging from 5-minute BRAWLs to the full 5V5 battle arena experience.

At Super Evil, we believe every phone is a portable next-gen console, and that every mobile player deserves games just as core, strategic and performant as players on PC. Experience the most powerful game engine on the platform — and the most fun you’ve ever had playing on a mobile device.

If your current game was dumbed down for a mobile audience, you deserve better. Never settle for the lesser evil.

THE CATEGORY-DEFINING 5V5 MOBA FOR MOBILE:

- Real line-of-sight Fog of War
- 120 FPS pro-motion support
- Skill-based play & decision-making
- Macro & rotational strategies
- Objective-rich 3-lane map
- Free Camera
- Last-hitting
- Wave Control
- Lane Teleports
- Active items
- Intricate vision system
- Original fantasy characters and storytelling

Vainglory 5V5 is the first and only true MOBA on the mobile platform.

----------------------

"This is one of the best multiplayer experiences on mobile.Vainglory is a totally legit MOBA experience, available any time in the palm of your hand." —IGN

“Best Mobile Game” —2016 Global Mobile Awards

“Some of the best visuals seen on the App Store.” —Macworld UK

----------------------

Features:

== Casual, Ranked and BRAWL Modes ==
Vainglory offers real-time MOBA combat with and against bots or live players. Whether you’re ranking up with your guild or just just have time for five minutes of fun, Vainglory has the gameplay style for you.

== 37+ Playable Heroes & Unlockable skins ==
Master heroes across a variety of themes and playstyles. Make unforgettable plays as a high-damage carry. Attack from the shadows as a menacing jungler. Soak up damage and save your friends as a front-line captain. However you like to play, Vainglory has unique, captivating heroes you’ll love — along with a hunt for skins you can earn through play without spending any money.

== Touch Controls & E.V.I.L Engine Designed for Mobile ==
Designed exclusively for mobile, Vainglory’s game engine is made for jaw-dropping teamfight battles running as high as 120 frames per second. Instead of janky and imprecise joystick controls where you can’t select the target, Vainglory’s pinpoint, sub-30ms touch controls offer the responsiveness and autonomy you need to win. And because everything is just a tap, you’ll attack, move and use spellbinding hero abilities with ease.

== Guilds & Teams ==
Need someone to play with? Vainglory’s built-in Guild Finder makes finding a team at your skill level simple. Create a team to climb ranks as a group or party up with your Guild to have fun and earn more rewards.

== Chests & Quests ==
Every time you play Vainglory, you make progress and collect loot you can use to open chests, unlock skins and hero talents and more. And if you’re lucky, you’ll hit one of the many massive jackpots.

== World-renowned International Mobile Esport ==
Watch and learn from the pros and enjoy some of the best matches you’ve ever seen — and if you’re the best of the best, travel the world and compete for massive prize pools!

== Vibrant Community ==
Vainglory is a global community in 14 different languages that thrives on the support of active players.

----------------------

comments: There is an abusive player on battlefield 62 and the developers have not been very responsive.  If you want to play a game where a player repeatedly tells others to kill themselves, douse themselves in gasoline, threatens people, makes sexual assault jokes and literally tells players with cancer he hopes they lose their battle and just harrasses players to make them quit and even says that is what he is doing then this is the game for you.  Edit:The developers reply shows another issue with the game.  If they read the part where I said the developers have not been very responsive they would realize I did contact GM support about this issue.  They just have not done anything.  Nothing has been done even though multiple players have contacted them.  This is why they have 1 star review.

Devs don't listen, battle fields are very imbalanced and half dead really. It's really a pay to play game so be prepared for that. It could be fun if they would pay more attention to players and not so concerned with how to make you pay for the next thing.
Was really looking forward to playing this game and it does have potential, but it's so frustrating with bugs that makes it so disappointing. Sort the bugs out and you'd have a great game.

It's a good game overall. The in game support is minimal to non existent. Your better off asking players for support. Its a good team building game. Like every other game like this it's pay to win but with strategy and a good team you can still have fun. Again it's a good game. I just hope they sell to a smarter company with better skills in game development and customer service (because without customers, you don't have a game) and then this would be an even better game. Give it a shot just get a good active team and don't expect help from customer service. Be careful buying packs and if you do screenshot EVERYTHING. Hope this helps

If army men strike stuck to there rules, and didn't allow people making death threats, abusive language, to play, it would be better, I would not let anyone under 21 play this game as the explicit content in chat would lead to children learning much foul language and receiving death and rape threats.  Ask anyone in bf 62

So many glitches to what could be a great game....slow on fixes....no lvl buffer so watch out for maxed out players who love hitting low players...be sure not to come to bf74 as it has been held hostage by a single player called Welpia and his corps ROK.....YOU WILL BE MISERABLE.....numerous unanswered complaints to customer support by numerous players....numerous players. May rage quit on this bf....attempts to get cs to act have failed....other wise a great game with great potential so long as you dont get stuck in a bf with one who calls himself Welpia or any corsps. Named ROK or Kor

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates

-Over 3,000,000 Downloads!-
Thanks to your support, we now share the happiness and joy of toy games with millions of players all over the world!

-Description-
Time can change many things, but not everything. Take a time travel to your dearest childhood, continue your unfinished adventure and join this toy game!
Lead your green army soldiers, remote-control planes, rubber ducks, transformers and many other toys to defend your bedroom, hallway, living room and backyard against the invasion of the Evil Legion! To experience a great war game!

-Features-
Lilliputian Toy War:
• Build Headquarters in your bedroom, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your little train, and collect metal with magnets. Every houseware has its unique function in this toy world!
• Fight the enemies in the kitchen, the living room and even the bathroom! The adventurous and playful battlefields will make war interesting and fun!

Grow Your Army:
• Design and assemble ultimate strategic bomber to strike out your enemies!
• Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army, let the toy war commence!
• Upgrade and promote your green army soldiers, flamethrowers, snipers, tanks, artillery units and many more troops of various types to teach your enemy a lesson!

Expand and Exterminate:
• Compete with real players for more territory, greater power and higher prestige.
• Build fortifications to keep invaders at bay.

Strategize to Win:
• It takes patience and strategic moves. Build and deploy your troops with heroes wisely. With a good strategy, you can defeat enemy troops much bigger than yours in size!
• Outwit your enemy with intelligence and timing rather than brutal force.

Play with Global Players:
• Get to know friends with the same interest and ambition as yours in the alliance.
• Compete or cooperate with other alliances. Diplomacy or War, it’s up to you!
• Chat with players from all over the world without barrier anytime and anywhere.

-We Are Waiting For You!-
Childhood is unforgettable, and the toy soldier game is irreplaceable. Join us in the toy world and it will be a better place with your participation!

PLEASE NOTE: Army Men Strike is free to download and play, Some Game items that can also be purchased for real money. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ArmyMenStrike/
developerAddress:
Room 735, 7/F, Run Run Shaw Tower Centennial Campus
Pokfulam Road, Hong Kong, China
summary: Play like a kid, fight like a man!
title: Army Men Strike

comments: I'm not a downloading games on my phone or tablet kind of person but I saw this game and decided to try it out. I loved it and played it all the time but then one day it suddenly stoped working when I was doing so well. I couldn't open the game anymore I tried many things and didn't work. I started a new game all from the beginning I had 55 cash in my town and all randomly it showed I had like 20. This game just wants you to keep making purchases. If you don't it will block you out.

I love this game. I dont play a lot of games. Township just keeps getting better. Some things are a minor downfall to this game, like how you can usually get great items from the store, untill you need a product or item for a task or event item. Then unless you have the township cash to hire the dealer then its hard to get things done in time. Plus in order to complete some tasks, you have to sell everything in your barn to complete the task. You should be able to just harvest than sell without it subtracting it back from your task. But either than that its an awesome game...

Something different and fun. I usually don't play these type games, but I love TOWNSHIP! Still having so much  fun with every level. AMAZING FUN! WOW! The HALLOWEEN decorations were so cute, I can't wait for Thanksgiving and Christmas. Loved the Cranberries. I'm enjoying Township more and more with each level. Year of the Rooster.  Greetings we're all gussied up for the holidays. It's Easter season 2018 still playing.

Loved this game but I can't seem to get on the game now. I wait for a long time for it to start and have to sometimes uninstall and reinstall and wait for it to start again.  If It I do make it on I can't help other players by going to there town. I paid money on this game and play faithfully everyday. I'm feeling some kind of way about this. Please fix this.  Update: The bugs are fixed..Thank you

Other wise it can be costly.  If it a child playing it I would highly recommend supervision,not because of any other reason other than updates and complex issues.  But it is a thnking ame that is fun.

This is one unique blend of many things made into a game that makes me feel obligated to keep coming back and keeping everything running in the game. It doesn't feel like this when I played HayDay. One highlight I have to mention, game cash (township cash) is generously given away in many form! No more worry of being unable to achieve this and that due to no cash available...
description: Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming! Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!Township features:● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect● Lovely animals to take care of● Farms to manage and expand● Exotic goods brought from islands● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals● Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!● Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans! Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features* Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game! Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile Questions? Contact our Tech Support at support@playrix.com.
descriptionHTML:
Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming!

Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.
Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!

Township features:
● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town
● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories

Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

comments: Love it.  I kept seeing ads for it and thought it was just another crappy rip off game, but I figured I'd give it a shot, and I'm so glad I did. Game play is fun, there aren't ads every 30 seconds, the app runs smooth, and the artistry that went into designing this game and the characters in it is absolutely flawless. Can't complain at all. Great game, I do recommend to anyone who likes puzzle and strategy games.  10/10!

Awesome game. Sadly motivated by profit grabbing providers. The cost to buy extra lives is astronomical. The only way to buy on a more viable basis was via the piggybank and guess what. They removed it. When I questioned this I got standard fob off bull. I questioned that and guess what no reply. A shame, it is a great addictive game. Just don't get tempted to get you wallet out..........

Zainy!  I can understand the addictivity of it, however, just as I was getting into each level, surprise!, is was completed! This spoilt a bit of the fun for me.  The catchy music, oddly I never got tired of hearing... Great game!!!  This review is after my first experience of the game which I played upto level 20 before stopping.

Sounds boring but I'm loving it! Sucks you right in. Starting to get a little complex (actually using some real brain power) but still very much doable and no charges as of yet and I'm up to level 10 atm. I am no gamer by any means but I'm really enjoying this.

Awesome game! Thanks to the developers for not only making this fun, but doing it in a dignified way (i.e., no annoying ads). I love this game! It's fun, addictive, and challenging enough that it's still entertaining 500 levels in! Love it, can't say enough good things about it.

I love this game as it's challenging but not ridiculously hard! Very addictive & u can get coins & power ups within the game, 2 help u, so there's no need 2 buy any! 🤗 Pity more games aren't like that!! 😊
description: WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds! Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!FEATURES:● Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!● Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!● Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!● Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!● Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world! ● Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing! ● Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!● Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!

description: [朕的江山]百城無縫大地圖，真實展現了三國時期的整體圖景。內政+軍事+計策，帶來最正統的三國誌玩法。遊戲中，您穿越至三國時期，扮演壹方諸侯，招兵買馬，發展內政、擴張勢力,最終吞並天下。是三國鼎立還是七雄爭霸亦或十八路諸侯勢均力敵，這裏發生的壹切都與妳的努力息息相關。壹局遊戲的終點不是妳的結束，總結經驗，輪回重生，開始書寫新的歷史！[三國圖景，纖毫畢現] 遊戲采用實時無縫大地圖，世界作戰信息壹目了然。不管是老張占了老李的漢中還是老王偷偷吞下了吳郡，都逃不過妳的法眼。[攻城拔寨，發展內政]依照真實歷史，三國時期百座城池重新展現在您的眼前，您的目標即是奪取全部城池，達成統壹。當您奪取城池之後，可以對轄下城池進行建設與升級。通過建築民居、集市、農田來獲得奪取天下的資源。[武將招募，號令天下]三國時代之所以令人神往，與這個時代產生的英雄豪傑有莫大關系。在這裏，歷史名將，悉數登場，您可以在聚賢館中將他們盡數收入麾下。良將想要發揮出威力，還需要提升他們的等級和星級，並為他們裝備精良的武器和馬匹。通過您的培養，想必這些將軍都將有橫掃天下的能力。[遠交近攻，算無遺策]個人的力量有時終究是有限的，通過外交尋找壹位誌同道合的盟友吧。統壹之時，您將和盟友共享勝利！善於用計可以讓妳的實力倍增，速去計策館中尋求妙策。[是非成敗，輪回再論]本遊戲采取輪回模式。無論您在上壹局遊戲中功成名就還是失意離場，均可在新的劇本中重新書寫歷史。朕的江山沒有終點，有的只是妳的不斷努力。曾經失去的，壹定不能再丟掉！過去已經到手的，將它們握的更緊！◎為了提升遊戲體驗，將會有部分權限要求，若不同意開啟權限，遊戲還是可以進行。※ 本軟體依中華民國遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為：輔12。※ 本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣，物品等付費服務。請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。

comments: I like the games but.. I would rather go to a real casino if i wanna spend and win REAL money, so buying coins with REAL money just for innocent playtime is a Big turn off for me. You lose coins fast like the real slots, unfortunately. I just start playing the game for the first time and I'm already out of coins. I believe they start you off with a low amount because I'm already out of coins in 30mins of play. The games and the graphics are fun though, which makes it attractive to play. My only complaint is paying for those coins..

Had friends refer me to the  games. At 1st I wasn't  happy I couldn't  just  select  the games I wanted to play I had to earn the level it was on to open them. It's  actually  been kinda fun trying to advance  to get to the games  I want to play  . Been a HOF "groupie"  for  3 years now and enjoy the bright colors,  games & especially  how fast technical support will respond  when the. System  jams up. . Thank you.

The variety of games are great, and I would enjoy playing them if I didn't lose all my money within 30sec... It's totally ridiculous to only get $800 every couple of hrs when the cost to spin one time is $250! Also, the big spin wheel sucks too... Instead of the normal $800, I get close to $2000. Big woop. Give more $ or make the spins less!

If you like slots this app is great. Gives free chips/credits every 4 hours but for more free chips you have to go on the HOF Facebook page in order to participate in their daily contests plus click on links to collect more free chips. Sometimes I collect chips for a few days without playing in order to save up a larger bank so when I do play Im able to raise my bet & win more. But if u bet too much per spin (based on ur total chip bank) you will loose 99% of the time.  Wish I cd Win more contests!

Short reviews are tough as any gambling game if ya win it's fun & great. If you lose it sucks! Cash purchases of chips & extras disappear super fast! The 3 hr wait to collect a few coins is very long. Then the SPIN has not given me a BIG pay out ever & I've been at x 2.0 forever. I hope you listen to your patrons & investigate & consider meeting our concerns at least some of the way. We know you make TONS money also! Consider smaller costs on packages if your not going to ever let us win! Tyvm

Have so much fun playing this. It's nice to be able to have a "flutter" and not use real money. Good fun, great graphics and so many different slots to choose from, plus the rewards are well worth it. Thank you hof! Awesome!! Love this game! Though only one thing to gripe about, the adds are becoming more invasive. Despite this I thoroughly enjoy myself! So keep it up!

If you don't have money to burn then don't play this game. This game is the embidiment of the 'pay to win' phrase and would make EA look like a baby when it comes to that. Levels are easy to scale up in the beginning but as you cross level 10 through 20, you'd realise that without paying through your nose, you are just fodder for paying players. Don't be a sheep they'd like you to be. On top of that, the game is riddled with bugs and the developers are unresponsive, unless again you are a paying player. Do yourself a favor and Invest your time in another game.
description: The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! Become an admiral of invincible navy fleets in the best 3D interactive strategy game of naval warfare. Why not join an alliance for true MMO glory and battle in the ultimate naval showdown – The Bermuda. Hunt the pirates and sea monsters wherever you may find them! The high seas are yours for the taking and it needs a ruler!We are in a new era of war game, where your strategy matters as much as the size of your base and power of your Armada. comments: It started out as a simple companion app and has evolved into an everyday game. I still feel there's a lot of untapped potential. Needs to be more customizable. I see a lot of players with the same or similar team as mine. Needs more team involvement. Overall they have done a pretty good job with the new additions altho a story mode would be nice. The next step is obvious. Rather than 1 year at a time. They need to keep it going and just update when the new 2k drops. I would actually spend money if this were the case. Knowing this game is done in a few months makes me reluctant to do so. Do this and I guarantee ur profits will soar. I'm not the only one that feels this way

I've changed your rating from a 5star to a 1star.  In the pass two days, I had to uninstall and install 3 times because it froze waiting reconnect with the network. 2 those times I was in the playoffs and couldn't manage my cards. I love this game, but I'm really, really frustrated. Please fix this, or you'll be losing one of your most Loyal fans.
Awesome game but the face scan needs some work. Using my new Galaxy X camera and still had errors when scanning. Other than that I love this app.
Haven't okayed online since 2016  an the upgrade is the best love three look an all..   Only bag thing is I have to keep signing in my psn account
Still doesn't work with the Nintendo Switch.  Have wasted hours trying.  Anyone else have luck?  My account is good and I did everything exactly how I was supposed to.
Good  could be better but I think  it would be cool if you had a train area  every time you use  it each stat on your player goes up one
description: The companion app for the award-winning NBA 2K franchise is back, with MyNBA2K18.  Packed with features, including the ability to scan your face into NBA 2K18 from your mobile device and daily opportunities to earn Virtual Currency, MyNBA2K18 makes it easier for you to stay in touch with NBA 2K18 on PS4 and Xbox One.  MyNBA2K18 also includes the collectible NBA 2K themed card game, MyTEAM Mobile, which allows players to collect their favorite NBA player cards and legends to challenge other competitors across the world in quick games, playoff tournaments, and in-game special events.  This year’s iteration includes brand new cards, daily objectives that earn great rewards, new ways to improve your cards and new team incentives!   Features:•	Integration with NBA 2K18:o	Facial Scanning with your mobile device to get YOU in NBA 2K18 on PS4 and Xbox One o	Earn Virtual Currency dailyo	Shop for console items while on the go from expanded MyPLAYER Storeo	Watch 2KTV any time from your device.•	Many ways to play with Quick Game, Playoff, and PVP game modes•	Daily Objectives – complete each day for in-game rewards•	Team Login Incentives – Login daily to earn team packs to distribute to teammates•	Over 300 new cards for the NBA’s 2017-2018 season

comments: A wonderful survival game that Ive been enjoying nonstop for around a week. I personally have not experienced slow loading, and the rare items to find are fun for me, not too hard. The controls are great and graphics a+. (they also keep adding new fun stuff that makes the game fun to play for even experienced players) great game 😀

This is not actually a review its more like tips for those who like to play the game. I started playing on December and I already have a chopper. I could easily build a second one. The alpha bunker is the best place to get parts. Try using the traveller and selecting 5% chance to find a car part before you open the treasure boxes. Keep the best weapons for the  bunker.  Spots that appear on the main map that have timers are the only places you will find your body incase you die out there. If this is helpful I will give more tips on clothings.

I really like the game. It's fun and addicting, with patience.  My only complaint is that everytime i die,  which is often,  i lose all my stuff and can never find my body again.  I can't build most of what I'm able because I'm still trying to gather from the first levels.  I die instantly at every aggressive player I encounter.  Maybe there is a trick to finding my stuff that I don't know.

WARNING: every time you update the game, it cannot connect to your google play account for god knows how many hours or even days! The risk of losing all your progress is VERY high. If when starting the game you don't see the "Restore" button, quit immediately and start again after few hours when (and if) the restore button appears again. If you can't restore your progress and continue playing without restoring, then all your progress is lost!

I love the game. But seriously? You get 1 energy every 5 minutes and at minimum need 13 energy to get somewhere... Also why do you stop letting us watch ads? It gives you money and helps us in-game. Please add faster energy recharge and unlimited ads. Because taking away ads is a little much..

I'm done with this game... I have spent hours on it and despite being level 99 the game has stagnated. This latest update... Who the hell cares about a dog when you can't even keep a jacket for more than a trip to a location... Update has lost my account again and do you know... I think that I have had enough. I'll come back if you do ever finally release it which I don't think you will until you stop wasting time on pointless additions and concentrate on the core gameplay.sort yourselves out, I am going to find another game.

comments: BEWARE!  They will take the system down and give you when it will be back up.  Only problem is they bring it up before the advertised time.  Meaning you are left vulnerable.  They do not follow their own rules.  They do not compensate players for their mistakes.  They let Chinese player buy packs cheaper and use at accounts.  If you are a Westerner do not play or pay on this game.  Their customer service sucks.  They actually try to get you to feel sorry for them.  Its amazing.  They will only steal from you.

This is definitely a pay to win game.  And I agree with previous reviews saying it favors Chinese players.  The developers claim it's not, but if it wasn't true, then why are 99% of the servers dominated by Chinese players?  Plus the Chinese to English translations are terrible.  You will barely understands what they're saying.
The game could use more tool tips and information to properly explain all of the content. If I hadn't played a similar style game before this would be difficult to understand for a beginner.
Nice that this game is helpful to a point. Yes could be a little bit more forthcoming about items and there do's and don't on Upgrades and applications
Just getting started I guess

The graphics are great and the game play is interesting but it's very independent to new players; from other players as well as the system itself. Like things that have been improved on in this genre of game in other apps are still frustrating here. Oh well, what can I expect from a freemium game? Overall it's enjoyable but I have to take it in doses; basically until I get frustrated by the gameplay or other players. All in all, there are worse was to spend your time.

descriptionHTML:
- Enter your country's guild and vie with players from all over the globe to become the ruler of the universe!
- When you download the game now, you'll be one of the first to receive $10 in new player boosters while supplies last!

I built, I sailed, I conquered!
Join the battle NOW!

With the expansion of the population, Earth is becoming increasingly crowded. The whole galaxy has turned into a new battlefield between human beings and extraterrestrial civilizations. Though governed by the Imperial Federation Government. The galaxy is still in the upheaval between various powers. On Planet Tekkman, you and alien creatures will operate your own space arks and create formidable fleets to confront against the Imperial Federation Government, fighting for living space and rebuilding the order.

Mighty Space Arks
- Construct your fortress on huge space arks.
- Operate the space ark on the battlefield in any way you deem.
- Battle like a carrier, attack your enemies while moving your ark.

Ultimate Galactic Military Power
- Upgrade your ark to elevate its power and change its appearance.
- Collect, equip and evolve terrific human and alien commanders.
- Establish your armed forces consisting of space infantries, mechs and spacecrafts.

MMO Strategic Gameplay
- Launch large-scale and real-time wars of alliance between hundreds of arks.
- Grab territories for your alliance with players from all around the world and chat through real-time translation.
- Dominate and govern a planet and rule over it. Use diplomacy to establish the order of your world.
- Trade your equipment and resources with other players and become a space merchant.

comments: Don't spend a dime if you play this game.  Rates on character drops are rigged.  As you go up in rank they manipulate drop rates as they believe people who invest so much time will pay money to try and get better rather than quit.  This is a major issue.  You cannot do any real events without banner cards and the developers know this.  Again they manipulate rates based on account rank so as you go up in rank your chances go way way down.

This game is awesome however, today I was updating my app and I can't log in. It updated and say open than the app continues to try and update and wont. I can't even transfers it. I tried with internet and my data. I have more than enough storage but now all my time and effort has been wasted. And I feel "great"

Tried transferring to new device, now the damn game won't download beyond the title screen and I've tried everything to get it to work. A pity too. I liked the game but I can't play it. All that time spent on my old phone, just gone.

As promised I upped my 3 star to a 4 star because SSJ4 Gogeta is complete now. However it really kills the joy of the game to have to gather 5 of the same SSR to awaken all the way especially when I used some of them for super attack power increases. Find another way to fully unlock characters through the potential grid(maybe a tournament item) and you'll pull me back from Pokemon Duel.

This gacha game involves summoning characters through a "loot box" system.  Most games now show rates so you know what you are getting in to.  For this game, however, it do not show the rates on this english version.  For now, just keep this in mind if you decide to spend money on this game.  Until this issue is fixed and until Google Play policies are updated to reflect showing rates in "loot box" based games, my review will remain as 1-star

Will change my review after connection issue is fixed. The most recent update made this game unplayable. I have played for over a year without issue but not now I cant update the game in app at all. It gets to the end of the update and hangs there then it gives me a download fail no matter what I do. ****Update**** It seemed to download today but I have lost over 3 days of logins which sucks. Looking at the bright side though I can play again ^_^.

A brand-new chapter in the Dragon Ball Z saga has arrived!
Now you can experience all the nonstop action in the palm of your hand!

◎Explore the World of Dragon Ball!◎
Face off against formidable adversaries from the anime series! Explore your favorite areas in a whole new way with unique board-game-style gameplay! Utilize various items and power-ups to strengthen your team and steel yourself for the battles ahead!

◎Intense Over-the-Top Action!◎
Simply tap the Ki Spheres on the screen to engage in supersonic combat! The fighting is so extreme your screen won't be able to handle it! Awaken the true potential of your favorite Dragon Ball characters and make them stronger than ever before! You’ve never experienced Dragon Ball like this!

◎Assemble Your Very Own Dream Team!◎
Create your own team from a wide variety of Dragon Ball characters! You can even group together certain characters to activate powerful Link Skills! Only Dokkan Battle gives you the freedom to build virtually any team you want! Take your trusty fighters to the battlefield and rise to the top!

◎Time is of the Essence!◎
The story begins when Trunks’ Time Machine crash-lands on a planet where the Dragon Ball timeline has been thrown into chaos! Who could be behind this sinister turn of events? Work together with Trunks to get to the bottom of this mystery, battling legions of familiar foes along the way. The very fate of the Dragon Ball universe rests on your shoulders!

Get pumped--the world of "Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle" awaits you!

comments: This is such a fun game ever since I watched the anime when I was a child! Worth a keeper on your phone if you're super bored. This is the best time killer ever. Keep up on the updates, I would spend some money getting some cool decks. Great job on this game!

Cheating or hacks are still an issue with the potential to manipulate the game growing in diversity. Im worried for the day where they obtain the ability to wipe all our progress or cards. Also please release the wight cards. You have very weak king of skull support and im sure there are many whod  love to run it
This is really fun to play in my downtime, the duels are challenging and I'm getting better at strategy and planning through my turns! I recommend, even if you're not a fan of the show/manga!

I loved this game and really got into it until the game started crashing every time I was in a pvp duel or creating a new deck. Now it crashes a couple seconds after starting it every time. Wish they had better support for these issues.

Everything was thought of. Very easy to learn the rules. And totally awesome to be able to start playing this game for real with. Out having. To spend money.. I will spend a little though to make a nice deck

This is a very polished game. Everything is on point from graphics to game play. The meta game is very diverse with many decks being fun to play. I've come to really enjoy the speed duel format as it works great for mobile gaming. Having only 3 Monster spaces and spell/trap spaces makes you think about what you are using.

descriptionHTML:
Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!

Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience!


[FEATURES]

Fighting Card Games
- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks
- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!
- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!
- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missions

Online Multiplayer Battles
- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai!
- Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize
- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!

Card Battle Deck
- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!
- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top
- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!
- Shop for cards in the game store!
Stay tuned for future card additions!

[ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and above
developerAddress: 東京都港区赤坂9丁目7番2号
summary: Card games with epic monsters! Fight other Duelists in online PVP battles!
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links

description: The NBA 2K franchise returns with NBA 2K18 for mobile, featuring unparalleled authenticity and improvements on the court. Packed with new features such as a deeper MyCAREER mode, “The Association” mode, and new 2K Beats Soundtrack, NBA 2K18 will be the most authentic NBA mobile gaming experience yet!Features:•	MyCAREER mode with expanded script and more interactions for your MyPLAYER.•	Association Mode – New multi-season mode allowing you to control a franchise’s future and become the next NBA dynasty.•	2K Beats – An eclectic mix of tunes from around the world, featuring Future, Kendrick Lamar, Shakira, Nas, and many more.•	More gameplay controls including ability to sprint on defense and more rebounding capabilities.•	Earn more Virtual Currency to boost your MyPLAYER.

description: An action-packed role-playing mobile game powered by Unity 3D, Tales of Thorn takes handheld gaming to new heights with gorgeous visuals, adrenaline-fueled battles, massive gear loots and advanced character progression.Featuring revolutionary gameplay and an epic tale of heroic adventure, Tales of Thorn captured the hearts of RPG gamers. Whether you’re new to this genre or a longtime fan, the quest to save Thorn’s future promises hours of enthralling experience.WEAPON IS YOUR SKILLNot only are there tons of weapons to choose from, all of them have unique skills to meet your different combat needs. There are ten thousand skill combinations overall to cut through your foes!BALANCED PvPUnique and innovative PvP experience in a balanced arena system, where both high and low-level players have been recalibrated, to ensure a more competitive and fair duel gameplay. Rather than relying on gear and character attributes, your control skills and combat strategies matter the most.TARGET LOCK-FREE COMBATEnjoy full degree combat in thrilling battles. With no target to lock on, it’s easier than ever to combine the powers of your weapons to unleash different combos, offer players numerous options and in-depth combat.RESPONSIVE AND INTUITIVE TOUCH CONTROLSAttack, dodge, block, and cast devastating skills - all with the simple swipe of a finger.DEEP CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATIONHundreds of outfits to acquire takes character customization to a deeper level.ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCETeam up with your friends to take down the formidable bosses, challenge your friends online, fight for glory and honor in the competitive and balanced arena. Languages supported: English, Thai and Simplified Chinese.Follow Us:www.facebook.com/talesofthorn
descriptionHTML:
An action-packed role-playing mobile game powered by Unity 3D, Tales of Thorn takes handheld gaming to new heights with gorgeous visuals, adrenaline-fueled battles, massive gear loots and advanced character progression.

Featuring revolutionary gameplay and an epic tale of heroic adventure, Tales of Thorn captured the hearts of RPG gamers. Whether you’re new to this genre or a longtime fan, the quest to save Thorn’s future promises hours of enthralling experience.

WEAPON IS YOUR SKILL
Not only are there tons of weapons to choose from, all of them have unique skills to meet your different combat needs. There are ten thousand skill combinations overall to cut through your foes!

BALANCED PvP
Unique and innovative PvP experience in a balanced arena system, where both high and low-level players have been recalibrated, to ensure a more competitive and fair duel gameplay. Rather than relying on gear and character attributes, your control skills and combat strategies matter the most.

TARGET LOCK-FREE COMBAT
Enjoy full degree combat in thrilling battles. With no target to lock on, it’s easier than ever to combine the powers of your weapons to unleash different combos, offer players numerous options and in-depth combat.

RESPONSIVE AND INTUITIVE TOUCH CONTROLS
Attack, dodge, block, and cast devastating skills - all with the simple swipe of a finger.

DEEP CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION
Hundreds of outfits to acquire takes character customization to a deeper level.

ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE
Team up with your friends to take down the formidable bosses, challenge your friends online, fight for glory and honor in the competitive and balanced arena.

Languages supported: English, Thai and Simplified Chinese.

Follow Us:
www.facebook.com/talesofthorn
developerAddress: UNIT A1 7/F, CHEUK NANG PLAZA, 250 HENNESSY ROAD WANCHAI, HK
summary: Epic role-playing experience. Forge weapons, recruit allies and defeat evil.
title: Tales of Thorn

comments: Your customer service takes time to reply so i resorted to google to refund my money and now you suddenly locked my account without an explanation. How can i give it 5 stars and recommend it to my friends. I play and pay to support and enjoy this game and now this is how you give back to your players? How can this be resolve? I want my account back!!!

The game itself is great though I have some comments / suggesfiins: First, there may be lots of characters to acquire however, using your new player disregards all your previous efforts. Youll start with level 1 and work again on improving it. The worse part is that the rewards on the career were already consumed by your previous character. Another thing is the stats for the purchased characters. Its almost the same as with the free ones. Shouldnt there be any advantage in acquiring characters by spending for the game?
From 5 stars to 1 star or even No stars!  After the bear update many of my fashions has gone!  Well played BH i used to love this game so much -_- but now im uninstalling it my heart breaks 💔

Im using Pf when i try to fake and shoot under the ring the text appears and in the way of the ball so i cant see ball when i rebound, remove text please. I suggest make the ball blinking blue instead of stupid text.. Or maybe make the text transparent so i can see ball

It is a very fun and addictive game! There is no complain from here except for one thing. I worked so hard to get my desired player yet I have to work from the ground to train him. I was so happy after all those hard work of getting a new player but the current system of player training ball thingy kills my motivation to play the game. If only there is a way to reset or make an entirely new approach of how we could train our newly purchased player then this game deserved a 5 stars, once that is implemented then I will spend my money on this game to further support the development.

The game is ok. The problems are: 1. In the ladder match, you have opponents who have higher skills and levels. Match up should be in same level to be fair. 2. You should have chat options to tell your team mates what to do. 3. There should be an option to penalize players who went offline or afk specially in ladder match. Because of these problems it makes the game annoying.
