5. GIẢI ĐẤU ĐỈNH PHONG – VINH DANH TẠC TƯỢNG LIÊN SERVER
Đây là tính năng PvP thi đấu liên server trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng, nơi hội tụ tất cả những game thủ mạnh nhất tại các server, tham gia tranh tài để tìm ra người chiến thắng. Giải đấu được tổ chức như một vòng chung kết WorldCup, thi đấu chia bảng và các vòng đấu cực kỳ hấp dẫn. Ngoài danh hiệu, được tạc tượng liên server, người chơi tham gia giải đấu sẽ nhận thưởng điểm tích lũy dùng để đổi lấy các mảnh tướng Đỏ siêu hiếm. Người chơi khác cũng có thể ủng hộ, bình chọn và cổ vũ những người chơi tham gia giải đấu để nhận thưởng nhiều phần quà giá trị.
6. 37 HIỆU ỨNG – TÙY HỨNG TRẬN HÌNH – SO TRÌNH CHIẾN THUẬT
Chiến thuật trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng được thay đổi liên tục thông qua các hiệu ứng kĩ năng của tướng như tăng tốc, hóa đá, đóng băng, thiêu đốt, x2 sát thương… Các hiệu ứng này sẽ ảnh hưởng mạnh mẽ đến cách chơi và cách bố trận của game thủ sao cho hiệu quả nhất, từ đó phân định đẳng cấp trí tuệ của người chơi.
7. HỆ THỐNG PET ĐA DẠNG, BUFF HIỆU ỨNG TĂNG CHỈ SỐ CHO TƯỚNG
Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng là một trong số hiếm các game chiến thuật có sử dụng hệ thống Pet khi xuất trận. Các Pet này khi xuất chiến sẽ cộng chỉ số khá lớn cho tướng trong đội hình bao gồm cả hiệu ứng. Mỗi Pet sẽ có các chỉ số riêng tùy thuộc vào chiến thuật của người chơi mà tùy biến sử dụng loại Pet hợp lý khi xuất trận. Pet cũng là một trong những thứ có thể show hàng thể hiện sự độc đáo, oai phong cho nhân vật.
8. BẠN SẼ KHÔNG CÔ ĐƠN KHI CHƠI GAME
Mặc dù là game thẻ tướng chiến thuật Tam Quốc, thế nhưng Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng không hề “tự kỉ” khi có rất nhiều tính năng cộng đồng cho phép tương tác giữa người chơi với nhau. Với hệ thống bang hội đặc sắc, bang chiến khốc liệt, tổ đội tinh anh, vận tiêu bang hội, công thành chiến, phụ bản liên server, voice chat liên server… thì bạn sẽ không thể cảm thấy cô đơn khi tham gia vào game.

CÁC TÍNH NĂNG ĐẶC SẮC KHÁC:
KHAI PHÁ LÃNH THỔ, CHIẾM ĐOẠT TÀI NGUYÊN
THÍ LUYỆN HỔ TƯỚNG, XƯNG BÁ THIÊN HẠ
BẾ QUAN TỎA CẢNG
TRÙNG LUYỆN TRANG BỊ
BANG HỘI ĐẠI LOẠN MÔN

THÔNG THIÊN THÁP
VIỄN CHINH TAM QUỐC
CƯỚP KỶ VẬT
PHỤ BẢN EXP, PET, BẠC

comments: At first I thought it was great, but now I realise it's just another PAY-TO-WIN game... You've got no chance if you come up against a paid-for character like Batman. It's such a shame this is the way game devs are heading these days.

*Update Very greedy company-> bad rating from me! They sell packages for 200-300 dollars! What's worse is that there are people who are stupid enough to pay for it. Aside from that a very cool game. To be at the very top it is pay to win. Besides that really cool. Lots of heroes and therefore possibilities.

It's a great game don't get me wrong but as I wrote in previous reviews they just went completely pay-to-win. Nowadays you cannot win not only because you don't have the latest gacha heroes, you just can't win because they released Batman for $160 to be competitive, most broken character ever. They are also releasing legendary pets... For $400 each. So yes, forget about having a fun competition, some players are simply out of you range by how much money they have spent and that ruins the experience.

My first review disappeared so I will leave another.  This game was great at first, then it started inserting the buyable characters such as Batman, Assassin's Creed and they are so over powered, one of them can take down your whole team without taking any damage.  Game is now so unbalanced that it isn't worth playing.  Until they fix the game, it worth playing.  Unless you like wasting money to feel like a god with over powered characters.  Game is dead, play something else.

definitely one of the best game if not the best game ived ever played on mobile. when you pull a hero for free the feeling is incomparable. the strategy you need to bring down other tougher players/guilds, its all here i tell ya! and to cap it all off the customer service is GREAT. you have concerns they reply ASAP what more could one ask for?!  install now! =)

Had the potential to be good but they care more about money than a good game, once you progress so far you will constantly lose to ppl who have bought characters that are vastly over powered. They will auto reply and say plenty of ppl still have fun without out paying, I made it to level 65 and it's just not true.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to a world of Holy Paladins, Deadly Dragons, Evil Wizards and over 50 other playable heroes! Conquer kingdoms lost to a mysterious curse, and find a new adventure around every corner. Create and lead your party of legendary Heroes into battle!
Join the 80 million players already experiencing this unique Action-Strategic RPG!

In partnership with Ubisoft, Lilith Games is proud to announce that the Prince from PRINCE OF PERSIA joins Ezio from ASSASSIN'S CREED as a playable hero in Soul Hunters.
 
［LEAD YOUR OWN EPIC PARTY］
- Choose from over 50 Heroes, from Stone Collossus to Ice Dragon, Sun Goddess to Wolf Child.

- Collect Soulstones scattered throughout the world to upgrade your Heroes into an unstoppable force.
 
［MASTER THE TACTICS, PERFECT YOUR STRATEGY］

Create the perfectly balanced party to overcome the most powerful foes and legions.
Master your Heroes’ abilities to protect your allies, interrupt your opponents’ attacks, or deal massive damage.
 
 
［LEGENDARY  BATTLES］
 
-Challenge players from all over the world and become Master of the Arena.
-Advance to the Epic Arena and earn the title of Elite Soul Hunter.
-Create or Join a Guild,participate in raids, and earn exclusive rewards! Clash with other Guilds in the weekly Guild Wars! 


［A UNIQUE IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE ］
-A dark curse has been cast upon the kingdoms and it’s up to YOU to Unite the Heroes and Break the Curse!
-Real-time combat with captivating visual effects and extremely deep strategic gameplay.
-Explore mysterious and magical lands to find and collect new Heroes in a captivating campaign.

Hunter, welcome to Heiland! Dragons and monsters have taken over the kingdom and it’s your mission to battle them in this action MMORPG. Gather your allies to summon and battle mighty Behemoths together in real time with co-op multiplayer. Then forge powerful weapons and armor from their materials.

Join us on this action-packed adventure to hunt all the dragons, master all the monsters — and collect all their equipment sets 💪. It’s the most fun you can have with one finger! ☝️

Hunt dragons and monsters

✔ Summon Behemoths, then defeat them to forge powerful equipment
✔ New Behemoths for you to summon and battle every two weeks
✔ Limited-time game events happening every day!
✔ Action-packed and skill-led battles against dragons and monsters

Play co-op multiplayer with friends. Or make friends by playing.

✔ Defeat Behemoths with 3 other players in real-time co-op multiplayer battles

✔ Play privately with real-life friends by joining a Lounge (Level 15 onwards)

Forge and collect equipment sets

✔ Hundreds of Magi stones to gain magical skills and enhance your battle style

✔ Forge new equipment from Behemoths released in the summon pool every two weeks

And many more!

✔ Easy and intuitive one-touch controls lets you play with a single finger
✔ Battle in portrait or landscape mode—it’s your choice.
✔ Stunning 3D graphics and effects
✔ Supports 8 languages

Download now to join us on this co-op multiplayer monster-slaying adventure! 👊

comments: There is a LOT of things to do and keep track of in this game.  Definitely more than just a single point and click - theres some semblance of depth and especially with alliances, attack, and defense.

This game is a complete copy of Clash of Kings (same company, different name, different address in Kowloon), but it's well made and fair in terms of team play, and if you choose to pay, doesn't require a ton of money.  If you enjoy team play, it's a great game.  If you want a sim-city game where everyone leaves you alone, good luck!

The "gameplay" videos are fake. You do not get to have huge wars with the undead. It's nothing more then a waiting game unless you spend large sums of real money and even then the game is a lie it is not what they advertise and should be taken down for this reason alone. There are enough scam games as it is but this one is just depressing.

description: Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.Features:Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.
descriptionHTML:
Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.

When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!

In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.

Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.

In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.

Features:

Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;
Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;
Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;
Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;
Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;

When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.

The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!

Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.

Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.

Original version of MMORPG that makes you really feels in the fantasy world!

Can you imagine you are in a fantasy world full of interesting things?
Meet new people, adventures in various stories even share the secrets of the power to fight evils in the world.

Explore the world of IRIS: as a Theian, blessed by the power of god's servant Aiaran, your role is to protect what's left of a long lost era of peace.

Join other fellow Theians in Guilds, fight in engaging PvP, PvE and PvPvE battles to show others who's the real protector of the land.

Claim what's rightfully yours while exploring the continent of Theia, overcoming the challenges it presents.

[Game Features]

◆ PK system ~ New Update
Now you can the experience of PK system in IRIS M, prepare you gear to defeat other player in hidden forest map

◆ Fishing ~ New Update
In Iris M you can go do fishing, from fishing you can collect many item that can be sold as gold.

◆ Customize your Unique Character & Fashion
Create your character by choosing from three different races and various hairstyles. Then make it even more unique by dressing up with stylish costumes, weapon skins and various sets of armors.

◆ Battle Royale 1 vs 49
You will be one out of 50 players who will survives in the battle. Are you the last man standing? Prove your power and skill now in Battle Royale

◆ Never Ending Excellent Stories
The original interesting storyline of Theian Kingdom parallel with so many NPC Characters and Power.

◆ Transform into 'Luminous'
Transform into one of three different gods of war and wreak havoc among your enemies

◆ Build Your Private Kingdom!
Build your own Farm, Mine and Wood Mile to produce variety of raw material that can be use to enchant your equip

◆ Astra Cards Collection
You can collect Astra cards by building your relationship with NPCs and each Astra Card have different additional status for your character!

◆ Explore the Dungeons!
Explore 25 different dungeons with your companions, including special Challenge Dungeons to hunt for specific goodies and adjustable difficulty to aim for the best rewards

◆ Siege War & Guild Battle
Prove your Guild is the most powerful over the Castle War!

◆ Intense Real Time PvP and PK!
Experience Real Time PK in any Open World Map. Fight with other player with Battle Royale style.

◆ Insane World Bosses
Unite with other Players to destroy devastating World Bosses and other powerful foes

◆ Grow your Wings!
Your Wings is the prove of your power. Your Wings will evolve based on your power. Unleash your true power and show others how strong you are!

** Like us on Facebook for up-to-date information and events.
Official fanPage: https://www.facebook.com/IrisMSEA/

** Customer Support
Please visit us to get support: https://support.lyto.mobi

These Permission below are necessary to handle game expansion file and patch in your device
- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

summary: Share your memories and journey in Open World Fantasy MMORPG! IRIS M
title: IRIS M - MMORPG

comments: Just a heads up. Like I said before you people had this planned. Within this year you have proven your desire. Tell me... when have you played a game that changes like a leaf in the wind? I have never seen any Developer change core functions like you have. Wonder why others used to love this game? It's not the graphics! Summoner Wars and Clash of Clans have you beat! Wonder why? They add and not change everything in just a few days like you have. Like I said before...You reap what you have done.

Actually... I was bored and installed this game and I noticed that my gameplay didn't diminished even after the stall was removed. Actually, now that I think about it, I didn't even use the stall that much. I take it back. I am so sorry for the negativity that I showed. I love this game so much. Btw I didn't spend real money on this game lol.

I love this game so much, but there's always a moment when I enter a room that the fade-in heavily lags. I always thought it was just making the area entry take longer, but it's actually gotten me killed upon entering one of the pvp areas, so it's definitely not normal. Nothing I've changed in the system settings has worked, so I really hope I'm not the only one this is happening to. Also, I think the water elemental magic for the Summoner is bugged: I used it several times in the base and main tower, and it hit in wildly different spots depending on whether I was aiming for an enemy or not. With no enemy in your direct line of sight, the spell always hit directly in front of me, but if I tried to attack a monster with it, it hit in a spot much further ahead instead. This is actually a huge problem because it's effectively impossible to aim the spell. I hope these are addressed in future updates.

Only thing I ask is that u make summoner advanced classes I suggest mabey a nechromancer like summons dead can revive friends from death mabey once a day or like three idk mabey make a demon class like a underworld class where all skills are demonic in nature or a animal summoning ability this should have been thought of before class was released btw just saying otherwise amazing game 10/10 in my opinion

-About the Game
Action online RPG with ultimate graphics　 [AVABEL ONLINE]

AVABEL ONLINE is a 3D-MMORPG that delivers the best in smartphone graphics.
Users can enjoy the games exhilarating features, such as smooth combo strikes, sequential attacks with jump action, etc in the same world. Enjoy hunting monsters and quests in the MMO field "Main Tower" (multiplayer field), or the "Dungeon" in the MO Field (Played by parties or by solo), the PvP (Player versus player), or the tower scramble where a max of 1000 players fight each other in real time all with the best graphics.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

[RECOMMENDED FOR THE FOLLOWING PLAYERS]
--- Note this game can also be enjoyed for beginners!!
- If it is the first time to play online RPGs
- If you have played MMORPGs for PC but not for mobile and are looking for a full scale 3D online RPG for smart phones
- If you are looking for a free-to-play role playing game, or just crave role playing games
- If you like fantasy games, or action games
- If you want to experience exciting battles
- If you have mastered many RPGs in the past

The game can be enjoyed for all players that apply for the above.
Build your parties and guilds and enjoy the real time adventure as in online RPGs for FREE!

description: ★ 24시간 실시간 세력전쟁 RPG ★최대 3000명 동시접속 세력전쟁의 전장에서 당신을 기다립니다!- 삼국지라이브 공식카페: http://cafe.naver.com/efunlive★ 게임특징 ★▶ 24시간 라이브로 펼쳐지는 국가전 ◀당신이 잠든 사이에도 전장은 계속된다! 24시간 풀타임으로 진행되는 전쟁의 희열을 느껴보세요~▶ 1000 VS 1000 VS 1000 ◀최대 3000명 동시접속 실시간 세력전의 시작먹고 먹히고 또 먹는 실시간 전쟁의 재미를 즐겨보세요~▶ 퀘스트만해도 쏟아지는 금화대잔치! ◀막퍼주는 금화 시스템으로 다양한 영웅들을 획득!어디서도 찾아볼 수 없는 혜자이벤트로 금화가 쏟아집니다~▶ 고퀄리티 그래픽의 스킬액션! ◀삼국지게임 중 역대급 고퀄리티의 그래픽!화려함과 다양함에 압도되는 자신을 경험하세요~▶ 전설속 60여명의 영웅들! ◀다양한 영웅과 그들간의 조합으로 구성되는 진형!제갈량, 태사자, 조운, 마초등 자신만의 워너비 무장을 조합하세요!▶ 한 국가의 전쟁을 지휘한다! 왕좌의게임! ◀각 국가의 지휘권을 놓고 왕좌의 게임이 시작된다!각 지위별로 가질 수 있는 특권을 향한 쟁투에 지금 참여하세요!★ 공식커뮤니티 ★▶ 네이버 공식카페: http://cafe.naver.com/efunlive▶ 카카오 플러스친구: https://pf.kakao.com/_eLMxnxl▶ 페이스북 팬페이지: https://www.facebook.com/kr.efunlive-----------------------------------------------------접근권한 안내A. 전화 걸기 및 관리&저장공간1.  게스트유저가 이펀 플랫폼을 통해 게임에 접속할 경우, 해당 권한 승인이 필요합니다.B. 마이크1. 앱 내에 보이스 채팅 기능이 존재하며, 해당 기능 사용 시, 마이크 사용 권한 승인이 필요합니다.2. 카페 동영상 녹화 기능이 존재하며, 해당 기능 사용 시, 마이크 사용 권한 승인이 필요합니다.C. 카메라1. 카페 동영상 녹화 기능이 존재하며, 해당 기능 사용 시, 카메라 사용 권한 승인이 필요합니다.2. 앱내 AR기능이 존재하며, 해당 기능 사용 시, 카메라 사용 권한 승인이 필요합니다.- 접근권한 철회방법 - 운영체제 6.0 이상 : 설정 > 애플리케이션 관리자 > 앱 선택 > 권한 > 접근권한 철회 가능 - 운영체제 6.0 미만 : 접근권한 철회가 불가능하여, 앱 삭제로 철회 가능주의사항-저장공간 권한: 리소스 다운로드에 사용할수 있으며 권한 철회시 리소스 중단 혹은 게임 접속 불가 현상이 발생할수 있습니다.

comments: Fantastic game.I am loving this game. Still there is few problem.Miniclips please solve the issues. After players matching ,game is hacked/stopped by several times.Only way to win that kind of match,any of one player has to quit or network issues.Its waste of time,also harm for devices (battery drainage,high heating). So,admin plz look after these prob.Why it's hanging or hacking.

As football based game it is superb, in terms of gameplay, graphics etc. But the biggest idiotic part of this game is that if freezes like magic. The whole game main screen becomes unresponsive and stays like that no matters the game is restarted or the damn phone is. Get this thing sorted out Miniclip. You have a reputation to maintain or not?

Could you please enable the user to save his progress in a Gmail account??  So that, when you lost or change your phone, you can recover the level and progress you had before instead of restarting from the beginning!!!!!!!!!!!!   If you could allow more media for sharing the game, it would be better, Facebook is not the only social media!!   And sometimes, it bugs!! Sometimes, the game is very slow and causes you to lose. Indeed, you shoot but the ball goes after many seconds even though the connexion is good!! Consequently you loose against a weak player, And this makes very angry!!!   Should those problems fixed, I will rate 5 stars.

I think this game is a really fun addicting game. The main reason why I got it was because of 8 ball pool. That game is also very fun. The only thing I don't like about football strike is that when I get on sometimes it won't let me click the spinner. So it's like my phone froze. But my phone didn't freeze. It's just the app. So can you guys please fix this.

At first I was skeptical about this game. I had downloaded it and went without playing for a couple of weeks. Then,one day I just happen to open the app and play. Best move I ever made for an app! This game is just flat out addicting, fun and challenging.  I was pleasantly surprised about how much fun it is and that there is, most of the time, something new.  Chalkenign friends and new people always makes for a challenging and fun time waster. Even if I don't have the time to play, I still make time!! Haha

There is a bug in your game I went first of my league, supposingly I am entitled to 350 cash, but it wasn't there.  How could you make it so unfair for someone. Why bother having a prizes if not given to the right person.

descriptionHTML:
You’ve never played a football game like this before. Take on your friends in multiplayer free-kick face-offs, or make a name for yourself in the Career Mode!

Challenge the world across different online game modes! Hit the targets in a fast-paced, time-limited battle for points in Shooting Race mode, or take turns as both striker and goalkeeper in the one-on-one Free Kick mode!

Customise your striker and goalkeeper with tons of unlockable items! Show off your style or represent your team’s colours!

Take on Career mode, travelling through different stadiums around the globe and taking on unique soccer challenges to unlock medals!

With simple, fast gameplay, Football Strike is easy to play and offers endless competitive football fun!

KEY FEATURES:

• Take your shot and make amazing saves, all with the flick of the finger!
• Play online in Shooting Race and Free Kick modes!
• Play against friends or challenge players from across the world!
• Represent your favourite team! Play as FC Barcelona, Borussia Dortmund, FC Zenit, FC Schalke 04 and more!
• Conquer an extensive Career Mode to earn medals!
• Upgrade your player and equipment and take on the world’s best!
• Fast-paced gameplay means there’s always action!


-- Download Football Strike by Miniclip NOW! --


This game needs an internet connection to play

comments: The game itself is wonderful, but I've had this bug ever since Chapter 2 or 3 (I just finished Chapter 12) where when I finish the final level, the screen goes black and won't play the cutscene. I end up having to close the game and never get to see it, then I go into the next Chapter not really knowing what's going on. The story is important to me and it's very unfortunate that this is happening. A fix from the developers or a suggestion on something I can do would be greatly appreciated.

Really enjoy this game.  Just wish we could pay for land expansions because they don't come fast enough.  Running out of room to place everything.  Yes they have the cargo ship but you lose points for doing that.

I play whenever I can. Very Enjoyable!  Love both searching scenes and decorating my island. Love being able to rearrange, and I wish I could move the gifts I receive.  Don't like waiting the 4 hours to regain energy and I would gladly watch ads to be able to fill my energy. It would be nice to have a larger expansion area while needing the same requirements. Love the speciality collections!  Great job!

In one of the recent updates, the timers to receive flowers messed up.  Purchased the passenger car and I'm on the fourth day so far. It counts down, but just before it finishes, another day is added.
Game is too slow to progress. You find the clues, you get the flowers but you have to spend DAYS to get stars to progress!
Energy Bar drains too quickly. Other than this very cool game.
description: A hidden object game for story lovers everywhere Discover June’s Journey, the brand new hidden object game from the makers of Pearl’s Peril. Find hidden clues and solve exciting puzzles across beautiful locations that draw you right into the heart of the mystery!Surprises at every turn, stunning hand drawn scenes, and a cast of glamorous characters await you in a globetrotting story game. From the heart of 1920s America to the perfect style of Paris and beyond, enjoy a story unlike anything you’ve seen before.With every new chapter, you’ll sink into a world of thrilling mystery and exciting drama in a story to take you around the world.Take a break from the stresses of life, and dive into a mystery game like no other. *MORE THAN JUST A MYSTERY!*FROM THE MAKERS OF PEARL’S PERIL – The follow-up to the hit hidden object game played by over 90 million fansTHRILLING PUZZLES – Hidden object scenes, jigsaw puzzles and loads of exciting modes. descriptionHTML:
A hidden object game for story lovers everywhere

Discover June’s Journey, the brand new hidden object game from the makers of Pearl’s Peril. Find hidden clues and solve exciting puzzles across beautiful locations that draw you right into the heart of the mystery!
Surprises at every turn, stunning hand drawn scenes, and a cast of glamorous characters await you in a globetrotting story game. From the heart of 1920s America to the perfect style of Paris and beyond, enjoy a story unlike anything you’ve seen before.
With every new chapter, you’ll sink into a world of thrilling mystery and exciting drama in a story to take you around the world.
Take a break from the stresses of life, and dive into a mystery game like no other.

*MORE THAN JUST A MYSTERY!*
FROM THE MAKERS OF PEARL’S PERIL – The follow-up to the hit hidden object game played by over 90 million fans
THRILLING PUZZLES – Hidden object scenes, jigsaw puzzles and loads of exciting modes. Which is your favourite?
MODERN WOMEN – Join June, a brave adventurer in a mystery game you’ll love
TRAVEL THE WORLD – See some of the most beautiful places in the world, all lovingly hand captured from the 1920s
ALL-NEW EPISODES – Just like your favourite TV series, look forward to a new mystery in each new chapter
HUGE CAST – Lose yourself in the wild and wonderful characters of June's Journey, but watch your every step!
Opening with the mysterious disappearance of her sister, June must take her orphaned niece under her wing. Together, they get drawn into a mystery greater than anyone ever expected. Can you uncover the real secret behind June’s Journey?

Discover the follow-up to the smash hit hidden object game, Pearl’s Peril, and uncover June’s Journey today!

comments: Cars could look better and authentic during the race. They look like miniature toy cars. Not even look like the real car. You should patch the game after some time, after you have the revenue. Cars not even look like they "look" in the real life. The gameplay is alright so far, might become enjoyable for a longer gameplay.   Just started, but I wasn't suggested to invite my friends to play. Correct it also for making the community larger. Where is the option to play with my friends? Also, any crew creator option? So far , 4/5. Started yesterday

I normally hate card base games, but I saw the preview as an ad on another game. So I thought it looked good enough to try it out. This game is HELL A LOT BETTER than the preview suggested. It does have pacts of cards to buy with real money, yet at the same time you earn gold coins to buy same packs. You can easily save the gold coins to buy these packs. LOVE THIS GAME
Hi... The game keeps crashing down after the recent update.. Can't even write to the support team about it, it crashes just seconds after I start the game.. Help!

I liked the game but the reason its a 4 is because on the 0 to 150 races i have a car that its high is 157 mph but it just randomly stops at 134 and says dnf my car is way faster plz fix the Chevrolet Impala 1967 and my Chevrolet Camero 1970 can make it to 145 mph on a mile drag but cant make it to 130 mph on a 0 to 150 race, thats bs plz fix these cars' top speeds plz. They r broken

Great game, constantly playing, was crashing this morning but fixed now so up to 5 stars.  Would like more ways to make money once the campaign is 100% complete, maybe more, or replayable campaigns, or new game modes all together, but still great fun.
Since yesterday I can't even the game anymore keeps crashing right after the loading screen I wish that a lot of money on this game if it's not working properly I will complain

descriptionHTML:
Think you know your cars? It’s time to put your knowledge to the test in Top Drives - the #1 FREE car racing card collection game on mobile.
BUILD THE PERFECT CAR RACING DECK from over 700 officially licensed cars.
UNLEASH YOUR CARS on 100s of racing challenges with our all-new Card Racing System.
COMPETE FOR EXCLUSIVE CARS in live multiplayer events against rivals.

Why is Top Drives the ultimate motorsport experience for every car enthusiast?
- Marques such as McLaren, Bugatti, Pagani, Porsche, Mercedes and many more.
- Real Car stats sourced from Evo Magazine making this the ultimate bench racing tool.
- Manage, upgrade and tune your cars – be the best motorsport manager.
- Race scenarios include drag strips, race circuits & hill climbs.
- Weather effects and multiple surface types, including dirt, asphalt, and snow.
- Stunning car photography from one of the world’s top car magazines.
- Addictive and fun racing strategy gameplay.

Top Drives is free to play but offers some optional in-game items that can be purchased for real money. Top Drives is an online game and requires a persistent internet connection to play.

comments: One of the best game i've played, so many reward systems, good control and great graphics. Keep up the gpod work, hope to see more new hero. One last thing, the co-op mode has some bug where u created the room but unable to start the game even when u have enough player. Please fix that, thank you.

I think it's a good game. Suck that you have to pay money to go up against other people that already have SS Hero's. Just wanted to say y'all should make at least more S hero's that are FTP so y'all can get people to get back into the game I don't want this game to die off.

The game is really addictive. Hours of game play and activities. I really like it. However, since it's international the time for coop game should be more flexible so i can join with my friends at suitable time. Tournament matching is a little bit unbalanced, either it's a raid or it's a total defeat. And heroes skills should  give more details on stats, so we can plan effectively. Thank you for such a good game.

They are about to make it more of a money trap with an update that screws f2p and budgeted p2w. They say they have free events and events so part time p2w have fun. Then why are people talking about quitting? These are high paying players. I know you plan on making it so hero's bought for special skills like stun and silence won't work if there's a big gap. You've made it so hero's bought for the purpose of moving these budgeted p2w are useless. So it's in favor of real p2w. It should be a reverse. Make the lower people have a better chance not a worse one.

I found an issue, when I defeat the boss by bleed damage, the victory screen doesn't show up. It just stuck at the boss level with its dead body lying on the ground. I hope you fix this. Great game by the way.

Heroes Night Watch unique skill is not working. It stated any enemies that hit the magic barrier will be stopped immediately but when I use it in arena enemies pass the barrier like nothing. It had been a month and nobody seems bother about this.

descriptionHTML:
TAP, SWIPE & SLING your heroes to send them smashing towards hordes of monsters, unleashing explosive power on impact and looting epic treasures!

ALSO FEATURES

•Simple Control, Super Fun:
Issue orders, take aim and cast skills, all easily controlled by a finger swipe!

•Turn-based combat and tactical thinking:
Plan your moves, adjust formations and build up combos to overcome your enemies!

•Strategic Team-building & Hero Collection:
Each hero comes with a set of unique stats & skills that greatly affects how your plan & plan!
Try out different setups to gain the upper hand!

•Multiplayer Game Modes: Fun With Friends & Prove Your Strength
Play Co-op levels with up to 3 buddies, share the extra loot & fun!
Or battle head-to-head against other players in real-time PVP duels!

Hyper Heroes is free to download and play, however, some in-game items can be purchased with real money.
If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

A network connection is required to play, and Wifi connection is recommended for multiplayer games.

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/hyperheroes

Our service mailbox: hyperheroes@90kmile.com

comments: the new fusion medals added make it so you can not fuse heros without spending money this game is officially broken theres no free way to advance anymore dont download. its very sad i like the idea behind the medals but whos going to grind with 0 progress for 8 months and still not get thier first 6 star .... its messed up

All in all a fun game which u dont have to pay for.. on lvl 104 now and still enjoying the game and actually progressing too.. thumbs up from me! Update: dropped down to 3* after update. Totally been made to p2w now by adding stupid fusion medals.. was a hrund before but now almost unplayable.. greed have ruined the game for me and will probably uninstall.. many others also when u go in chat room.. not good epic summoners, not good at all.. good game ruined again :(

Latest update with fusion medals ruined the game. Got stuck like many other players. Fusing was hard enough without them (ie collecting 4 same 4 star heroes plus 4 same 3 star, PLUS random 4 star heroes... Ridiculous) to get 5 star one, now you stuck waiting to lvl up your current ones to pass stage boss and MAYBE get fusion medals... Ruined very good game.

What the hell are you people thinking,.  Fusion Medals are the most ridiculous thing to add to the game.   It was bad enough the game cost so much to play, but then you really screw us over good with Fusion medals.   Crooks,. You guys should be in jail. Class action law suit.  Horrible,.   Don't play this game, waste of your time and big money.

They absolutely ruined this game with the last 2 updates! Be prepared to spend a fortune to be competitive! They took away the best parts of the Game! Added another item you need to make heroes that are very difficult to get! Then they reduced the number of dark soul you get when disassembling heroes! I'm a paying customer, don't mind supporting development but not when you feel taken advantage of! Don't recommend this game! Very Very Greedy company! Planners should Be Fired!

New updates have killed game experience.  Now not only do you have to wait to gain xp for adventure levels,  you are now limited on fusing characters.  Lack of ability to gain fusion medals limits game play. Very few other actions log in and play 10 minutes a day and then nothing to do for another whole day.  No ability to move at your own pace.  Everything is limited.  To those that can endure slow pace only way to gain in game is slowly over time with daily log ins.

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers

The alliances of Good and Evil have been forged. The final battle between epic warriors and heroes on both sides is about to start. Ride the crest of the Idle RPG wave with Epic Summoners!

Prepare your best summoner heroes for the fight. Join friends and players from across the globe as you embark on an epic action journey of enchantment to explore the Magic Ladder and the secrets contained deep within. Lead your action troops -heroes and warriors- into the light and overcome all battle challenges that lay before you to emerge victorious in an epic war! The world's destiny is in your hands!

ENGROSSING ACTION RPG GAMEPLAY
Your summoner heroes can’t wait to fight auto-battles against the enemy on your behalf! Recruit and gain experience with every powerful war hero in a legendary battle in this idle game!
Epic equipment and legendary summoner heroes and warriors challenge waiting for you!
Earn awesome combat rewards even when you’re offline. No need to stress when life calls!

ENDLESS TACTICAL AND STRATEGIC FUN
Plan your battle troops tactics and maneuver with your legendary hero to secure victory, it's your free action RPG destiny!
Collect, upgrade and use your equipment wisely to show off your strength as leader on an legendary epic adventure game!
Simple, yet effective strategy combat allows you to enjoy this RPG at home or on the go! Plan your characters tactics and troops maneuver and dominate the battlefield to defeat every evil challenge hero and enemy warriors adventure troops!

THRILLING ACTION BATTLE CONTENT TO KEEP YOU ON YOUR TOES
Summon and recruit summoner heroes and legendary warriors troops, deploy, defend, fight, collect and upgrade to accomplish your RPG challenge!
Between the Expedition Airship, Arena, Magic Ladder and Wishing Pond, there’s a huge world to explore in this idle war game and new creatures to find!
Your interest will never waver with our steady stream of great war content! Challenge your friends and defeat players from all over the world in this free action RPG!

A HIGH QUALITY VISUAL AND AUDIO FEAST
Exquisite warriors' aesthetics and creatures artwork in this free action RPG adventure full of fun and challenges!
Jaw dropping epic combat and maneuver animations in the arena and awe inspiring action battle challenge effects!

THROW DOWN WITH PLAYERS AND FRIENDS
Step into our battle warriors RPG Arena and compete with skilled players from all over the world! Recruit new legendary summoner heroes and warriors troops with different abilities to defeat every evil enemy!
Change your tactics and action maneuver against rivals to see your name climb the rankings and beat your friends best scores!
Win awesome battle rewards on your way to claiming the ultimate victory wih your army in this action hero war idle game!

Start now this epic adventure challenge with your best legendary hero and powerful warriors action in a fantasy adventure with different creatures and battlegrounds in a non-stop free RPG! Your destiny is to lead your magic summoner legendary heroes guild army and war troops in a battle adventure to the death!

comments: Игра отличная. Только утомляет выбирать станки по одному и тыкать в апгрейды. Можно ли сделать меню «усовершенствовать станок/станки по максимуму» одной кнопкой при наличии достаточных средств и монет? И ещё, можно добавить функционал типа своего НИИ, КБ, которые разрабатывают новые технологии, станки, материалы? Добавить службу безопасности, которая будет бороться с промышленным шпионажем, саботажем и воровством на производстве?  Благодарю за ваш труд.

The game is good. Awesome idea for a time killer app. Please add press brakes, laser cutting, turret punch, deburr operations. This would make the game sooo much better. It would make it more appealing to a wider range of players.
Nice Game.....  Please Add All Machine Name And New machine....
It's definitely pretty darn good game and it makes me happy to know that I can run a factory better than my senile old boss at my current job
Well done

Great game, great idea. But, when you have even 2 workshops, notification for broken machines are really annoying. Every few minutes a long vibrate which I cant turn off... What is a difference if I buy better worker or he evolve? Maybe to include waiting for raw material after order? Include different sizes of workshops? I have some other ideas as well
description: You are presented with a unique opportunity manage a large industrial enterprise, to go from a ruined factory to the industry leader! Buy machines, hire employees and start production. Do research and upgrade your equipment. The success of your enterprise depends on the strategy you choose!Industrialist is the economic strategy. In the game, you will find dozens of unique machines (turning, milling, drilling, machining centers and others), various employees (workers, engineers, and service men), and interesting research to upgrade your production.Expand your factory by building new facilities. The number of workshops is not limited, it all depends only on your ambitions, knowledge, and experience! The game works without the Internet!
descriptionHTML:
You are presented with a unique opportunity manage a large industrial enterprise, to go from a ruined factory to the industry leader! Buy machines, hire employees and start production. Do research and upgrade your equipment. The success of your enterprise depends on the strategy you choose!
Industrialist is the economic strategy. In the game, you will find dozens of unique machines (turning, milling, drilling, machining centers and others), various employees (workers, engineers, and service men), and interesting research to upgrade your production.
Expand your factory by building new facilities. The number of workshops is not limited, it all depends only on your ambitions, knowledge, and experience! The game works without the Internet!

comments: Really entertaining story. Great tactics gameplay and characters. I enjoyed this much more than I expected. Steve Jobs said, good artists borrow but great artists steal and I feel that that is what this game did. Very heavy Naruto vibe with Logi and Dias. Then of course,  the Full Metal Alchemist feel with alchemy and the door of truth and leaving part of your body on the other side of the door in order to gain power. 7 kingdoms, 7 deadly sins. This had a good animated opening and song. This game has been very entertaining and I'm looking forward to the next episode to see what happens next. Good stuff, Gumi.

Quite unique game with active players who already experienced the japanese version. UI needs lots of improvements, my goodness! Like Units page must have a back button, and be available not only when going back from Home (Talk abt inconvenience). Loot pieces on-hand should be available when newly acquired loots are pressed and hold! Screen transition also needs optimization for faster reaction.

So far I have only been playing the game for a few hrs. The graphics are sharp and the controls are easy to learn. My only complaint is you can't turn the camera a complete 360 to get a better look at where you opponents are. Other than that it's a great game. Closest thing to Final Fantasy Tactics on Android. Love it.

Best Turn based tactic game. You dont need to be a whale to be good bcos of10% "rainbow" summon chance. The stage and event is quite challenging. The only problem is MULTIPLAY. Please make the player can switch between private (code) room to public so that if we only wait for 1 friend, we can switch to public to fill the other 2 slots. It is because if we go to public there is a high chance our friend cannot enter our room bcos of full slots. And then force us to disband and recreate room over and over just to make our friend enter our room.

Game is SUPERB, however it will be awesome if devs could implement following suggestion 1. Quest mission pop up is super annoying if we want to manually farm the equipment in the story mission. 2. Try again mission should be automatically enter the dungeon instead of choosing the team formation. 3. Auto go option, so player can easily farm the dungeon.

Great VAs and story. What I mostly disliked is how slow the combat is even with the accelerated mode, to grind materials it can be quite annoying if you lack skip tickets. I hope they add an option to skip combat animation soon.

descriptionHTML:
The pinnacle of Japanese Mobile Strategy RPGs enjoyed by millions in Japan, THE ALCHEMIST CODE brings forth an enjoyable mix of genuine tactical elements and a plethora of high quality content - from intense 3D animations to stunning anime-styled cutscenes as well as superb music and voice acting!

Play your cards right - master the arcane power of Alchemy and alter the fate of the world!

FULL-FLEDGED STRATEGY RPG
* Classic turn-based battle system with grid-based movement
* Command strategic units on 3D terrains, consider the difference in elevation and orientation to turn the tides of battles

DEEP CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION
* Summon, collect and evolve more than 50 beautifully designed characters
* Master a wide selection of Jobs Classes, unlock new abilities and outfits

PLAY WITH AND AGAINST FRIENDS
* Real-time 4P multiplayer co-op - Challenge high-level dungeons with 3 other players
* Put your skills to the test at the Arena! Battle fellow players to climb Daily Arena Rankings and get rewarded

RICH EXPANSIVE CONTENT
* Go on invigorating adventures and traverse through unique landscapes
* Take up exciting Missions and Challenges daily and get fantastic rewards
* Discover intriguing character personalities, gripping backstories and quests

-------------------------

STORY INTRODUCTION

The Forbidden Art of Alchemy brought about destruction and a world divided by differing ideals.

It was sealed away into the darkness by the Seven Kingdoms of Babel...

However, its seal has shown signs of weakening, signalling an eminent foreshadowing of what's to come..

Bestowed with the power of Alchemy, who will prevail, and bring about a change in the world? Where will your will take you and how will the world judge you?

- Mankind’s Will is merely at the mercy of the Stones of Gods -


NOTICE: THE ALCHEMIST CODE is completely free to play. However, some in-game items can also be bought with real money.

WEBSITE
http://alchemistcode.com/

FORUM
http://forums.gumi.sg/thealchemistcode

SOCIAL NETWORK
Facebook: facebook.com/thealchemistcode
Instagram: instagram.com/alchemist_code
Twitter: twitter/alchemist_code

TERMS OF SERVICE & PRIVACY POLICY
http://gumi.sg/terms/

IMPORTANT NOTICE

** THE ALCHEMIST CODE requires a device with Android 4.1 and above.

** A device with a minimum of 1GB RAM is recommended. Performance is not guaranteed on devices with less than 1GB RAM.

** 1.8 GB free space in phone internal memory is recommended to install the game with all of the downloadable contents.

** The game will require you to grant permission to access photos, media, and other files on your device. Enabling this permission will allow game data to be written to your SD card.

** Contact us on https://alchemistww.zendesk.com/ for further help with technical issues.

comments: This is just amazing! Once you get started it gets a little tough, but you can have other people help you if your stuck. I love the easy gameplay and the graphics, The only problem I have with it is how hard I is to get ninja pearls without money, I'm young and dont have a credit card or job yet so I miss quite a few opportunities. I highly recommend to any Naruto fans.

This game is very great and can be addicting. The only problem u have is that when ever I try to play a mission it always says there is a communication error. I would really like to keep playing the game, so if there is anything you could do about it- that would be great.

your servers are bad.. trying to hunt Chino but 2 times already when we finish the last map and i see the yellow card of the last boss, then i get connection lost and don't get a thing in the end.. it is really frustrating to play for 15 minutes, see your goal fulfilled but then.. nooooo, you don't get the cards in the end

I love the game, but during multi-player, especially in impact missions, let us continue even if player 1 gives up. It's extremely annoying when you play to the boss, and their hp is very low,  and player 1 leaves and all that time was for nothing. Let player 2 and 3 continue, even if player 1 and 3 or 1 and 2 quit, let that last player control the other two. That's the only improvement I can think of for the next update.

I'm only putting it as one star in hopes the devs see this, but please find a better way to recover accounts. I've been a fan of this game for years and when I logged in I was logged out, I have no idea what my transfer info is because I've only had to do that once. I don't want to just start over, please find a better way for people to get their accounts back once your update logs them out.
It's not the best game but because I am a fan of naruto my interest in this game might be different than others would think. Overall its a decent mobile game but it could use some more improvements.

comments: Smurfymurf.  Now that's a Smurf! Did they ever mean something to you? Then you just have to get it ! Super nice!!! And technically very well done too !!!   Oooooooooops !!!! Update few days later...   Suddenly the game keeps crashing randomly...   Tried it for days....   Can hardly survive a single level now...    Very sad....   The game itself is still excellent....   Maybe a later update brings a fix..................

This is by far one of the best games I have played like this all year. Very addicting, easy, but challenging enough to keep you wanting to come back play some more. Haven't found something I don't like about this game just yet😁

Fun game, my daughter enjoys playing. ..easy, yet challenging at the same time.  One irritating issue...every time there's an update, or just opening the app, turns on the game's notifications..and have to turn it off constantly. ..otherwise it would be a rare 5 star rating from me.
You can't get anywhere unless you actually use money to buy the power ups to bet the levels. It's a waste of space for any device
Hate it. Too difficult. No helping aid. Not funny, but stressful. I left the game at level 83. Why you made it ugly like this?
Like with all other games this game is rigged, once you get to a certain level you are set up to fail unless you buy coins. I don't play games so I can go broke on coins, I don't like this.
description: **CELEBRATE SPRING WITH OUR LIMITED-TIME OFFERS**Ready, aim — pop! Embark on a colorful, bubble shooting adventure with all your favorite Smurfs in Smurfs Bubble Story! Travel with Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Clumsy and rest of the Smurfs family, on a quest across a forbidden forest, mysterious meadows and rushing rivers to pick up the other Smurfs kids who have gone lost.  Join these little blue folks on an amazing magic adventure as they discover new Smurfs, explore the Smurf world, and go toe to (smaller and very blue) toe with Gargamel.  Earn rewards, unleash special moves, and expand your Smurfs collection as you puzzle pop your way to victory!  Line up the perfect shot and trigger massive chain reactions by using each Smurf's individual amazing abilities.  --FEATURES-- MATCH BUBBLES - Pop matching bubbles to collect tons of magical items. BUILD YOUR SMURFS COLLECTION - Collect all unique Smurfs for special abilities to blitz through missions.  FEATURING YOUR FAVORITE BLUE FRIENDS - Just like in the cartoons, meet Smurfette, Hefty, Brainy, Clumsy, and more. HUNDREDS OF MISSIONS - Countless missions with addictive, yet challenging obstacles. EXPLORE A BEAUTIFUL WORLD - Journey through the Smurfdom filled with stunning visual assets from the movie. comments: Love it to pieces. The characters are loveable and the stories are fun. I got through three to four in a few days I can't put it down. The only downside is certain decisions cost gems. Major ones are fine and expected but to have to be a jerk to someone because you don't have enough kind of sucks a little. But it's not often and by no means a deal breaker.

Actually, I came here because I'm a fan of Jakayla Toney. I'm a reader from wattpad, and I'm checking out her story here as game. 😂 Anyways, I finished one chapter and I'm enjoying so far. Gotta check out other book after I'm done. Looking forward to this app, though I don't really like the choices costing gems.But its okay, still like it. 😊

Every GOOD choice involved money.  Hard to find one interactive story game that doesn't involve money so much.  I don't mind paying for extra bonus scenes in the end but at least give us some GOOD selection WITHOUT charging!  Then maybe I'll rate it higher

I've really enjoyed reading All the Wrong reasons.  The author is very talented, a true story teller.  As I was reading I felt like part of the story I was so enveloped in the lives of the characters they were alive and real. I was sad when the story ended wanted to keep reading.  I was overjoyed when K. I. S. S.  came out by that very sane author who transported me to a whole new world yet again. I look forward to reading more from this amazingly talented storyteller!!

I'm frustrated by the fact that this is supposed to be a choose your own adventure game, but all the choices that make the most sense to me are stuck behind a paywall, requiring me to purchase those choices with a currency called diamonds. I get the story passes, and I would have been fine if that was the only barrier to read the story, but to require you to pay money for making what you feel are the right choices is just greedy.

The only reason I'm giving 3 stars is because the chapters update too late that you lose interest and sometimes forget what's happening in the story. If the chapters were to update on a regular basis then readers would feel the need to keep this app and will constantly play instead of playing the waiting game. However the content is good and most storylines get you hooked.
description: Choose your story with Chapters, the interactive story game that lets you choose your path in every story. Read through pages and pages of fun interactive stories that fit your mood, from romance to suspense!Choose your story from our top collection of romance, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, comedy, and drama series! Chapters combines a unique style of choose your own story gameplay with fiction stories that you simply can't put down!YOU get to make the choices in each story. Decide on hard life choices such as falling in love, discovering secrets, or unravelling deep mysteries! Make your choices wisely; every ending is different!Chapters Features:- Choose your story! Dive in and start making choices that affect the overall outcome!- Adventures start with you choosing your name and style to reflect your personality.- All stories come with info directly from the author!- Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!  50% Off starting March 20th until March 30th!Our exclusive collection of choose your story games include:ROMANCE - ALL THE WRONG REASONS- Romance story unfolds when YOU have a one night stand with the city's most notorious playboy.- Drama unfolds after a one night stand suddenly explodes into many more nights of forbidden passion.- Make the choice between what’s more important – letting go of your insanely jealous boyfriend or keeping the complicated love affair going?DRAMA - PRINCE WITH BENEFITS- Fantasy story mixed with comedy! Play as the hopeless romantic that never seems to catch a break.- Make bold choices and decide how your romantic story unfolds with your almost knight in shining armor.- Drama arises when you find out that he's the Prince of England. For real.SUSPENSE - KIDNAPPING THE PRINCESS- Choose your life as a supermodel by day and a kidnapper extraordinaire by night.- Make the choice to play as the hero or villain who kidnaps the only heir to a whole country.- Make choices to pull off the biggest kidnapping ever while keeping your feelings for the Princess in check.HOLLYWOOD STORY - STARSTRUCK- Try surviving high school after a world-renowned actress suddenly puts her career on hold and enrolls in YOUR high school- Hollywood life isn’t what it seems, and you realize there's more to this media darling than meets the eye.- Romance is in the air, but can YOU avoid your crazy ex long enough to figure out this mess? ROMANCE - BAD BOY BLUES- Your life choices led to you becoming a master at playing the piano and fleeing problems.- These choices lead you to Adriano, a brooding mob boss, who steals your heart and the rest of you.- Romance blossoms and you decide to jazz things up and stand your ground.- Have your life choices made you tough enough to rescue your handsome kidnapper and make the murderous rival family dance to your tune?"SUPERNATURAL ROMANCE - MR. DEVIL- When your boyfriend falls terminally ill, you make a deal to save him: spend the rest of your life together or surrender your soul to Hell.- Then you discover your boyfriend is cheating on you, so do you break up with him? The Devil comes to collect his prize...you.- Transported to Hell, you face difficult choices that determine whether you will survive fire and brimstone, fallen angels, and hot gossip.- And more importantly, can you find everlasting love, not in Heaven or on Earth, but with Mr. Devil himself?And more interactive story games with fun choices!Chapters: Interactive Stories will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, romance, or even a gamer, you’ll love making choices in this interactive story game!Please note that Chapters: Interactive Stories is an online game that requires an internet connection to play.Follow us on: facebook.com/ChaptersInteractiveStories
descriptionHTML:
Choose your story with Chapters, the interactive story game that lets you choose your path in every story. Read through pages and pages of fun interactive stories that fit your mood, from romance to suspense!

Choose your story from our top collection of romance, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, comedy, and drama series! Chapters combines a unique style of choose your own story gameplay with fiction stories that you simply can't put down!

YOU get to make the choices in each story. Decide on hard life choices such as falling in love, discovering secrets, or unravelling deep mysteries! Make your choices wisely; every ending is different!

SUSPENSE - KIDNAPPING THE PRINCESS
- Choose your life as a supermodel by day and a kidnapper extraordinaire by night.
- Make the choice to play as the hero or villain who kidnaps the only heir to a whole country.
- Make choices to pull off the biggest kidnapping ever while keeping your feelings for the Princess in check.

HOLLYWOOD STORY - STARSTRUCK
- Try surviving high school after a world-renowned actress suddenly puts her career on hold and enrolls in YOUR high school
- Hollywood life isn’t what it seems, and you realize there's more to this media darling than meets the eye.
- Romance is in the air, but can YOU avoid your crazy ex long enough to figure out this mess?

ROMANCE - BAD BOY BLUES
- Your life choices led to you becoming a master at playing the piano and fleeing problems.
- These choices lead you to Adriano, a brooding mob boss, who steals your heart and the rest of you.
- Romance blossoms and you decide to jazz things up and stand your ground.
- Have your life choices made you tough enough to rescue your handsome kidnapper and make the murderous rival family dance to your tune?"

SUPERNATURAL ROMANCE - MR. DEVIL
- When your boyfriend falls terminally ill, you make a deal to save him: spend the rest of your life together or surrender your soul to Hell.
- Then you discover your boyfriend is cheating on you, so do you break up with him? The Devil comes to collect his prize...you.
- Transported to Hell, you face difficult choices that determine whether you will survive fire and brimstone, fallen angels, and hot gossip.
- And more importantly, can you find everlasting love, not in Heaven or on Earth, but with Mr. Devil himself?

And more interactive story games with fun choices!

Chapters: Interactive Stories will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, romance, or even a gamer, you’ll love making choices in this interactive story game!

Please note that Chapters: Interactive Stories is an online game that requires an internet connection to play.

Follow us on: facebook.com/ChaptersInteractiveStories

description: Build up your Sector from the ashes of a post-apocalyptic wasteland in a brutal MMO strategy game, and start your battle for Total Domination! Build your army and join players from all over the world in unrelenting PVP and PVE combat! Take the fight to your enemies, defend your Sector, gather resources and devise brilliant strategies to crush all resistance! Total Domination: Reborn brings the popular Sci-Fi MMO RTS to Android as a standalone game, with all the familiar strategy, adventure and epic Multiplayer action that comes with it.After decades of plagues and nuclear warfare, the human race is facing its greatest enemy yet - a rogue Artificial Intelligence hell-bent on destroying every last human from the face of the earth. Join forces with Commanders across the wasteland and stand against a deadly army of mutants to reclaim your home planet once more. But beware, friends are rare in the Wasteland and everyone has but one goal - Total Domination!PLEASE NOTE! TD: Reborn™ is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download TD: Reborn™.FEATURES✔ FREE TO PLAY!✔ Fight for control against players from around the world.✔ Form powerful alliances with friends and become leading clans.✔ Participate in Global Missions and save the post-apocalyptic world from further destruction!✔ Earn bonus rewards just for commanding your troops each day.✔ Defend your sector from invasions and take the fight to your enemies.✔ Over 30 powerful Infantry, Armor Corps, Artillery & Air Force units.✔ Plan strategies according to your game style – do it alone or form alliances and clans with other Sectors.✔ English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Russian, and Portuguese are supported.NOTE! This game does not connect to your existing web colony. Total Domination™: Reborn is a standalone mobile game completely independent from the web version.Support: http://plrm.me/zendesk-support    Community: http://plrm.me/tdr-forumPrivacy Policy: http://plarium.com/#/doc/policy/Terms of Use: http://plarium.com/#/doc/terms/
descriptionHTML:
Build up your Sector from the ashes of a post-apocalyptic wasteland in a brutal MMO strategy game, and start your battle for Total Domination! Build your army and join players from all over the world in unrelenting PVP and PVE combat! Take the fight to your enemies, defend your Sector, gather resources and devise brilliant strategies to crush all resistance! Total Domination: Reborn brings the popular Sci-Fi MMO RTS to Android as a standalone game, with all the familiar strategy, adventure and epic Multiplayer action that comes with it.

After decades of plagues and nuclear warfare, the human race is facing its greatest enemy yet - a rogue Artificial Intelligence hell-bent on destroying every last human from the face of the earth. Join forces with Commanders across the wasteland and stand against a deadly army of mutants to reclaim your home planet once more. But beware, friends are rare in the Wasteland and everyone has but one goal - Total Domination!

PLEASE NOTE! TD: Reborn™ is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download TD: Reborn™.

FEATURES
✔ FREE TO PLAY!
✔ Fight for control against players from around the world.
✔ Form powerful alliances with friends and become leading clans.
✔ Participate in Global Missions and save the post-apocalyptic world from further destruction!
✔ Earn bonus rewards just for commanding your troops each day.
✔ Defend your sector from invasions and take the fight to your enemies.
✔ Over 30 powerful Infantry, Armor Corps, Artillery & Air Force units.
✔ Plan strategies according to your game style – do it alone or form alliances and clans with other Sectors.
✔ English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Russian, and Portuguese are supported.

NOTE! This game does not connect to your existing web colony. Total Domination™: Reborn is a standalone mobile game completely independent from the web version.

Support: http://plrm.me/zendesk-support
Community: http://plrm.me/tdr-forum
Privacy Policy: http://plarium.com/#/doc/policy/
Terms of Use: http://plarium.com/#/doc/terms/

description: Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‘sniper vs. sniper’ LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it’s FREE TO PLAY!• Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world’s best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.• Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.• Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.• Ally with your friends and create an UNSTOPPABLE SQUAD! Lead them to the top of the leaderboard, defeat other teams and win territories in Domination mode.This game requires stable INTERNET CONNECTION to play. The gameplay involves real-time online match ups with players across the globe, shared server for any mobile device, and LIVE-CHAT.For more info and all the latest news check out: https://www.facebook.com/SniperArenaGame/

comments: I love this game! But, there's not enough energy or chances to win energy or earn it. 10 isnt enough!There's times when I'm out of energy and have done everything I can do and have to leave the game but still feel like playing. I've spent money on this game but I don't always have money to buy energy or coins to buy energy. There should be more give-a-ways, prizes, little games, etc to earn more energy so I can keep playing!! Also, I'd like to be able to friend request other players and send them things. Like people on my team on here.  Thank you! Lynn Mauger

Amazing! It is an amazing game that you go and figure out the death of somebody. You go through stages and different areas and you must find hidden objects. You get coins and bucks that you spend on things to make your world. Great time taker.

There are quite a few objects that are incorrectly identified. For example, there is a screen used for changing clothes behind, but it is what you need to find when asked for a "lamp."  The pace is not good. In gameplay, you collect coins used for buying decorations. You have to place decorations to advance the gameplay. But if you have no coins and are at an impasse in the gameplay because you need decorations, you're stuck unless you lay down real cash.  A lot of the problems the developer is aware of, because their next game like this, June's Journey, is much better.
For some reason the game is frozen and won't  go past  the wooga screen it is also doing it on  June's  Journey  please fix because I  really  like  to  play these games
I really like it. It's something different every time your finding new things same things different order etc lots of fun
Very addictive. Not enough hours in the day.
description: If you love Hidden Object Games, epic adventure, and romance stories, Pearl's Peril will be your new favorite! Find objects, solve the mystery and discover a new world full of twists. This game offers graphically beautiful scenes where you will have to reveal secrets and intrigues.Pearl’s Peril is a stunning hidden object game that sweeps you away into an age of intrigue and romance, where polite appearances give way to inner greed and familial bonds are broken by betrayal. Make friends, fall in love and seek clues in hundreds of hidden object scenes.*YOU WILL LOVE PEARL’S PERIL* ● EXPERIENCE THE BEAUTY No other hidden object adventure game can match Pearl’s stunning, hand-drawn scenes. Hundreds of unique locations transport you to a historic era when adventure pilots like Pearl were just beginning to open up our world.● DISCOVER NEW ROMANCE SCENESAn epic story-driven game you’ll experience over years of gameplay! It will leave you with many dramatic scenes and stories to cherish and experience over and over again.● UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY Have fun! Find romance! Fall in love! Get swept away! Be shocked! But beware… in a world where power goes unchecked and hidden ambition knows no bounds, nothing is ever as it seems. ● BUILD YOUR PARADISE As you journey through Pearl’s exciting challenges and hidden object gameplay, always return to Artemis Island to rebuild and expand – to create a paradise that you will love.Join more than 40 million others when you play the most beautiful, deepest, highest-quality an epic hidden object adventure game on your mobile device. Adventure is waiting for you, so get started today!~ Pearl Wallace lives the exciting life of an heiress and socialite in the 1920’s in New York City. That is until her father’s sudden suicide plunges her into a world of intrigue and mystery. Despite overwhelming evidence to the contrary, Pearl knows in her heart that her father’s death was no suicide. She will stop at nothing as she seeks to unravel the series of events leading to his untimely death and find the hidden villains who were really responsible. Money, danger and even death is no object as Pearl works to clear Samuel Wallace’s name. As an ace pilot and cunning detective, Pearl flies headfirst into a whirlwind of adventure which takes her around the world from the depths of Africa to the heights of the Eiffel Tower. However, she’ll need your keen eye if she’s going to find the evidence she needs to confirm her suspicions that her father didn’t commit suicide at all. He was murdered!Travel with Pearl to her family home on the Polynesian island of Artemis and help her find clues as well as piece together the puzzles, revealing the truth about mysterious secret orders locked in a struggle to determine the rise and fall of nations. Join our heroine as she unveils the hidden story of deception and betrayal that involves nearly everyone she has ever known or loved. Stand beside her as she seeks and finds hidden strength. descriptionHTML:
If you love Hidden Object Games, epic adventure, and romance stories, Pearl's Peril will be your new favorite!

Find objects, solve the mystery and discover a new world full of twists. This game offers graphically beautiful scenes where you will have to reveal secrets and intrigues.

Pearl’s Peril is a stunning hidden object game that sweeps you away into an age of intrigue and romance, where polite appearances give way to inner greed and familial bonds are broken by betrayal.

Make friends, fall in love and seek clues in hundreds of hidden object scenes.

*YOU WILL LOVE PEARL’S PERIL*

● EXPERIENCE THE BEAUTY
No other hidden object adventure game can match Pearl’s stunning, hand-drawn scenes. Hundreds of unique locations transport you to a historic era when adventure pilots like Pearl were just beginning to open up our world.

● DISCOVER NEW ROMANCE SCENES
An epic story-driven game you’ll experience over years of gameplay! It will leave you with many dramatic scenes and stories to cherish and experience over and over again.

● UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY
Have fun! Find romance! Fall in love! Get swept away! Be shocked! But beware… in a world where power goes unchecked and hidden ambition knows no bounds, nothing is ever as it seems.

● BUILD YOUR PARADISE
As you journey through Pearl’s exciting challenges and hidden object gameplay, always return to Artemis Island to rebuild and expand – to create a paradise that you will love.

Join more than 40 million others when you play the most beautiful, deepest, highest-quality an epic hidden object adventure game on your mobile device. Adventure is waiting for you, so get started today!

~

Pearl Wallace lives the exciting life of an heiress and socialite in the 1920’s in New York City. That is until her father’s sudden suicide plunges her into a world of intrigue and mystery. Despite overwhelming evidence to the contrary, Pearl knows in her heart that her father’s death was no suicide. She will stop at nothing as she seeks to unravel the series of events leading to his untimely death and find the hidden villains who were really responsible. Money, danger and even death is no object as Pearl works to clear Samuel Wallace’s name.

As an ace pilot and cunning detective, Pearl flies headfirst into a whirlwind of adventure which takes her around the world from the depths of Africa to the heights of the Eiffel Tower. However, she’ll need your keen eye if she’s going to find the evidence she needs to confirm her suspicions that her father didn’t commit suicide at all. He was murdered!

Travel with Pearl to her family home on the Polynesian island of Artemis and help her find clues as well as piece together the puzzles, revealing the truth about mysterious secret orders locked in a struggle to determine the rise and fall of nations. Join our heroine as she unveils the hidden story of deception and betrayal that involves nearly everyone she has ever known or loved. Stand beside her as she seeks and finds hidden strength. Along the journey find the wealth to rebuild Artemis Island to its former glory, while discovering loyal friends, love and ferocious enemies that will test your limits.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Having problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us here: http://woo.ga/PPhelp

Become a fan of the game by keeping up with the latest stories, rewards, and competitions here:

http://www.facebook.com/pearlsperil
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Like us on facebook.com/wooga

Pearl’s Peril is free to download and play but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

You may require an Internet connection to play Pearl’s Peril and access its social features. Pearl’s Peril may also contain advertising.

description: Shakes and Fidget is a fun fantasy RPG satire and an award-winning role-playing game at the same time! Sounds crazy? Over 50 million players make SFGAME one of the most popular online games in the world!*October/November Update 2017: The gate to the Underworld has opened!Customize your own comic book hero and conquer the top slot of the Hall of Fame! It’s not an easy task with real players standing between you and victory in the PVP arena. Together with your pals from your guild you become stronger, more invincible, and find lots of epic loot! Accept quests, complete exciting adventures, level up, collect gold, obtain honor, be "overpowered" and become a living legend!Requires registration, via Google Play Games, Facebook Connect or e-mail and password or an existing account.
descriptionHTML:
Shakes and Fidget is a fun fantasy RPG satire and an award-winning role-playing game at the same time! Sounds crazy? Over 50 million players make SFGAME one of the most popular online games in the world!

*October/November Update 2017: The gate to the Underworld has opened!

Customize your own comic book hero and conquer the top slot of the Hall of Fame! It’s not an easy task with real players standing between you and victory in the PVP arena. Together with your pals from your guild you become stronger, more invincible, and find lots of epic loot! Accept quests, complete exciting adventures, level up, collect gold, obtain honor, be "overpowered" and become a living legend!

Requires registration, via Google Play Games, Facebook Connect or e-mail and password or an existing account.
