comments: I'm so addicted to this game! Out of all the simulation games I've played this is by far my favourite. The characters are great and the story line changes on each route so it keeps you interested. And you don't have to spend money to enjoy everything in this game. An hourglass takes a while to get but it's worth it to use them to get the extra stories. I enjoyed the Christmas add on.

I LOVE this game, and everything about it is awesome, aside from the fact that I just got a new phone and now the time is correct on it (my old phone clock was an hour off), and daylight savings time just happened so while my new phone time is an hour later, my game won't let me play due to the time change. It says I need to go back to my previous time zone (which I haven't moved anywhere, its just daylight savings time). I've already put a suggestion up on your site asking about whether you guys can put an option to change the time on the game for these very situations, or to install a daylight savings time option so it can keep up with real time. Other than that though, I absolutely love the game, the graphics, the game play, and the characters to which I get so attached to, are stunning and beautiful. Y'all should be really proud of yourselves <3

Nice description, nice plot. Likable characters with spot on music. What more could I ask for? (Edit on 9/7: I downed the rating not because it's a bad game, but because although I had an account for this game, I lost all my data when I logged in. I had saved 270+ hourglasses so I could do the secret endings but well. That went down the toilet. I won't be trying again until I get interested (and over this) in this game again. Other than that I fully recommend this game.)

Loved it overall but make the chats last longer without having to reset them as I miss them with school or sleep. Not everyone can use the app at certain times in the day. It doesn't have to last the whole day just a few more hours  or 10. The games good other than that though. It's a good way to pass the time and has a good story.Keep up the good work.

Im in love wih the characters already! Though, its kinda sad that you are forced to be a girl character even if you state that you arent in game. That kinda took me out of the experience a bit. I understand it would probably take a lot of effort to put that option in, but man would it be cool. Keep up the great work!

I've been a long term fan now since 2016 when it came out and I still play it to this day! The chatrooms are very interesting to read and the visual novels are always something to look forward to! I have been in love with Saeran since the Common Route so him getting his own route was like a dream come true! Although, his route is an emotional roller coaster..

comments: I love this game one of my biggest issues though as it has a tendency to overheat your tablet or your phone. If it overheats too much then it will start shutting down the game and then can cause issues. I've had where my tablet has gotten the black screen of death and I'm having trouble using it directly in correlation to playing this game because of it overheating. This is something I think really needs to be looked into and see how they can maybe not use so much memory that it affects your tablet or your phone to the point of overheating

Still loves the game when I play. However, I don't understands why the bonus games keep disappearing after I play one round. I have to back out off the app and then restart for the next levels to show up. Pain in the butt. Because this has continued to happen I find myself playing less and less

Early levels are fun and make use of some skill. Obviously this style of game has luck involved, but later it is all luck and willingness to use paid items, as there will be 1-2 available matches on the board at a time and you just need to hope one of them will bring you closer to the win condition. They rarely do. I've had maps where the available moves are so few it  had to reshuffle after EVERY MATCH. Sometimes more than once, while it the condition was to make matches in specific locations. Complete luck.  I'd rate lower, but I did have some fun in earlier parts of the game and paid items can technically be earned occasionally. Needing to rely on them however has broken this for me, as otherwise it just feels like work in a button pressing factory.

I have this installed on a newer tablet and have played it for a year and now I can't get it to work.  I also play this on an older tablet that I have been playing for 5 years and plays very well but when I play Elsa creations it does not calculate all that I have matched whether it be one or three.  This part needs to be fixed.  I have watched it not tally what I have matched.  No way to win when it does not work right! I am adding to this post because now frozen free fall does not work at all!  Not sure what happened.  I even uninstalled it and reinstalled it and nothing.  So everything I have played on this game is gone!!

I love this game but its gotten very buggy in the last week. Screens go blank, restarts when making level selection many times over, errored out when buying snowballs, and extra challenged randomly appear and disappear so that the "days left" has no meaning. Someone needs to look at this.

Great game that I've been playing for years now, however with the new updates, I can't play past level 1310 because the game freezes as soon as I run out of moves and it tries to reshuffle...and just this morning I can't even play a level without the game restarting over and over again! I can play all the extra bonus games with no issue, it's the regular levels that I can't play...please fix this!
description: Play  1,000+ exciting levels in Disney’s #1 puzzle game, Frozen Free Fall! Get ready for an epic puzzle matching adventure in the Kingdom of Arendelle, inspired by Disney’s Frozen! Join Anna, Elsa, Olaf and more of your favorite characters on a journey to slide and match hundreds of icy puzzles for FREE! Unlock MORE seasonal puzzles and game modes as you explore the land with our new updates! JOURNEY WITH FACEBOOK FRIENDS - Ran out of Hearts? Ask your friends for more and return the favor by gifting them right back!EXCITING MATCH-3 GAMEPLAY – Slide beautiful and colorful ice crystals to match 3 or more, and test your matching skills with extra challenging objectives! UNLOCK YOUR FAVORITE CHARACTERS – Follow the story and play with even more characters like Olaf, Kristoff, Sven, Hans, and more! UNIQUE POWER-UPS SPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR EACH CHARACTER – Use Anna’s torch to burn up an entire row of crystals, or Elsa’s glacier power-up to make all of the same color crystals magically disappear! comments: Its world best game ever played.  It is like a small GTA of phone or for android. It doesn't look too good but if u download and play it will like a real GTA. It is a quite big but the game is super amazing. It is not too interesting in starting but later u can play it like a GTA. It also not need any extra files to download after downloading from play store but it needs Internet connection.

This game might not look so good when you download it, but there is a lot you can do. Buy properties to get money, buy guns armor, cars. There are plenty of minigames and quick play missions like street races, survival, and parachuting. The storyline may only be decent, but the missions are still fun.  The only real problem is the file size. You have to dedicate too much of your storage, if you have a newer phone with more built in storage, or a microSD card, you should try this game.

Huge Kudos to the developers for making this game!! It's amazing it's literally like playing GTA but on your phone it has the story mode and it all makes sense!! The graphics are ok but I'm sure if they made this again in a Los Angeles version of some sort the graphics could get better and better!! Overall Amazing game and there's nobody else making games like this on the app store!! Great job! 10 out of 10 stars!!!

Wow this game is so fun! when you go the airport, there are planes yay! and one thing you have to add to the game, please add some more hotels that are in the real Las vegas and I love the daily bonus and the one thing I hate, the military base where you get killed by a jackalope tank, bustard helicopter and the iron horse and please make the military base free to enter without getting 5 stars note: version is 3.6

Best game I've ever played! In fact it is the only game I've had on my phone for 2 years. But there are some minor errors that keep occurring, such as when you are running or driving any vehicle, the control pad keeps stopping and I have to lift my thumb up and put it back down to regain control. Now I know it doesn't sound like much, it can mess up your drifts and the gas will stop as well. PLEASE FIX. Thanks

It's a very great game,Nothing but love.   But I got a notification  that there is an update,I updated the game but I still can't find the new added missions in the game. Secondly I am on day 87 and my day 90 supposed  Reward changed after I downloaded the update.
description: Roll up on a dangerously fun, wildly expansive, and overwhelmingly rich trip to the City of Sin!Enjoy everything Vegas has to offer, from shooting up rival gangs and stealing cars to race down the strip, to pushing your luck at the casino and customizing your threads. You can even take off into the sky as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS√ Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighting star whose dreams of becoming a Battle Royale champ clash with a world of theft, gang wars, zombies and more in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE.√ Fight your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action, auto races, shooting and more. Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.√ Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN√ Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you’ll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.√ Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.√ Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!√ Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.√ Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn’t the only way to make the big bucks!RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE√ Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.√ Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there’s no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!√ UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.√ CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL√ Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.THE STORY:In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano’s perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/GVonFacebookTwitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_ENInstagram:http://gmlft.co/GVonInstagramYouTube:http://gmlft.co/GVonYoutubeForum: http://gmlft.co/GV_ForumPrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/privacy-noticeTerms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/conditions-of-useEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/eula
descriptionHTML:
Roll up on a dangerously fun, wildly expansive, and overwhelmingly rich trip to the City of Sin!
Enjoy everything Vegas has to offer, from shooting up rival gangs and stealing cars to race down the strip, to pushing your luck at the casino and customizing your threads. You can even take off into the sky as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.

WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS
√ Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighting star whose dreams of becoming a Battle Royale champ clash with a world of theft, gang wars, zombies and more in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE.
√ Fight your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action, auto races, shooting and more. Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.
√ Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.

ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN
√ Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you’ll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.
√ Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.
√ Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!
√ Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.
√ Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn’t the only way to make the big bucks!

RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE
√ Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.
√ Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there’s no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!
√ UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.
√ CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.

BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL

√ Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.

THE STORY:
In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano’s perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!
Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!

For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.

This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up.

How to Play
The Lobby
1. To enter a room simply double touch or two touch on the Room area in room list.
2. The status of room is “Playing”, or time stamp of remained time to play
3. There are 4 types of room, Emerald, Sapphire, Diamond and Ruby.
4. Each room type requires the minimum tick price. For example, a ticket price in Emerald is 5P and Diamond ticket’s 1￡.


The Room
1. When you fist visit a room, it’s divided into two columns.
2. Right column is ticket list to buy. Another ticket list can be shown to swipe ticket list.
3. Touch a ticket to buy, the status of ticket is changed to “Selected”. Touch “SELECT MAX TICKETS”, 18 tickets will be selected.
4. Touch “BUY SELECTED TICKETS”, then all of tickets to be chose will be bought.


The Game
1. One of the great things with online Bingo is that you won’t need to worry about marking your cards as you go, the computer will do all this for you.
2. While you enjoy the game or chat with your friends, our automatic daubers will mark your cards and keep a record of how many correct calls you need to win
3. We’ll also ensure that your most complete cards are pushed to the front so you can make sure you’re watching the front of the race!
4. We’ll flag it up each time someone wins and automatically credit your account!

The Prize
1st line pot : When All numbers of the first line on a ticket is called, you win 1st line pot
2nd line pot : When All numbers of the second line on a ticket is called, you win 2nd line pot
HOUSE : When All numbers of the all three line on a ticket is called, you win HOUSE Jackpot

comments: I do like the game because it is fun.  The graphics are excellent, the gameplay is challenging; however, the new update includes an option to purchase updates to units by way of credits, alloy, and crystals.  The wording is not specific and I wasted quite a bit of crystals, credits and alloy and did not receive what I thought I purchased.  Although I am unhappy and will most likely NOT make any further purchases in this game in the future, it is still worth a try.  Just make sure you do not make the same mistake I did.  I do hope the developer reads this and makes the appropriate chsnges.  Enjoy.

Loved it to begin with and spent a lot of actual money to progress...... but it only helped a little, you have to have deep pockets or too much time to get anywhere. Oh and now it's crashed, having to re install just to see if I've lost all my money!

I gave 2 stars.  I used to like this game but not anymore. I am lvl 7 and the only people who ever hit me are lvl 10 bases!!! What is up with that? Don't give me some bs excuse is because regardless, this is not right and I am thinking of quitting because of this.  I'm a paying customer but I won't be spending another dime on this lopsided game.  Thanks for stealing my cash and my time.

Would definitely give at least 4 stars, but there's one thing that really makes me mad: The Attacking/Defending Algorithm. Out my entire squad, I have the least attacks, but I'm the leader, by far, in defenses. I don't WANT to attack anyone yet. I want to farm and get stronger. But I can't do that if I'm getting attacked 7-10 times every hour. Even when I win defenses, I still lose resources. Fix that. Make it to where people that rarely attack, are rarely attacked.

this game used to be good but they have ruined the opponents. being a level 9 on all  units costs more to build to attack than the resources you can scavenge from your opponents. also the developers are allowing hundreds of absolutely identical bases to be produced so even if you decline an attack and are repaired you get matched to a different 'player' but with the same base. it's a disgrace.

The new event challenge is great but the number of times the game crashes now is unbelievable. To make it worse it only seems to crash when I'm almost getting a 3 star win so I then end up with a loss and lose any troops which take ages to rebuild. Please fix it.
description: Fight for Your Side. Command The Galaxy.The Galactic War rages on. Where does your allegiance lie? Will you side with the Rebellion or the Empire? Join the fight, build your base, recruit and train your army, strategically plan your defenses, and lead your troops to victory on war-torn worlds throughout the galaxy! Battle with or against iconic characters like Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Princess Leia, and utilize or destroy units like AT-ATs, Speeder Bikes, Wookiee Warriors, and Stormtroopers. Join millions around the globe to play in this epic combat strategy game. Commander, the fate of the galaxy is in your hands! FEATURES • CHOOSE to fight for the Rebellion or the Empire• TRAIN your troops to charge into battle• BUILD units and vehicles with multiple upgrades• DEFEND your base against enemy forces• COMPLETE original story missions and gain additional rewards• LEVEL UP your heroes, troops, vehicles, and more• BATTLE on different worlds within the Star Wars™ universe• TEAM UP WITH FRIENDS and allies to form the ultimate squadUpgrade your Planetary Command building to scout and relocate your base to new worlds such as Dandoran, Yavin 4, Er’Kit and Hoth to expand your command and strengthen your squad. Star Wars: Commander requires Android OS 4.0 or above and supports both tablets and phones.Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains: • Social media links to connect with others• In-app purchases that cost real money, push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content• Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards• Advertising for The Walt Disney Family of CompaniesWe respect your wishes regarding your Privacy. You can exercise control and choice by resetting your Advertising Identifier in your device’s Privacy Settings. This app allows access to your Google Play Account. You can upload and save content from this app to your device.Visit the official Star Wars Commander website – https://www.starwarscommander.com/Privacy Policy – http://disneyprivacycenter.comTerms of Use – http://disneytermsofuse.com
descriptionHTML:
Fight for Your Side. Command The Galaxy.

The Galactic War rages on. Where does your allegiance lie? Will you side with the Rebellion or the Empire? Join the fight, build your base, recruit and train your army, strategically plan your defenses, and lead your troops to victory on war-torn worlds throughout the galaxy!

Battle with or against iconic characters like Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Princess Leia, and utilize or destroy units like AT-ATs, Speeder Bikes, Wookiee Warriors, and Stormtroopers. Join millions around the globe to play in this epic combat strategy game. Commander, the fate of the galaxy is in your hands!

FEATURES

• CHOOSE to fight for the Rebellion or the Empire
• TRAIN your troops to charge into battle
• BUILD units and vehicles with multiple upgrades
• DEFEND your base against enemy forces
• COMPLETE original story missions and gain additional rewards
• LEVEL UP your heroes, troops, vehicles, and more
• BATTLE on different worlds within the Star Wars™ universe
• TEAM UP WITH FRIENDS and allies to form the ultimate squad

Upgrade your Planetary Command building to scout and relocate your base to new worlds such as Dandoran, Yavin 4, Er’Kit and Hoth to expand your command and strengthen your squad.

Star Wars: Commander requires Android OS 4.0 or above and supports both tablets and phones.

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains:
• Social media links to connect with others
• In-app purchases that cost real money, push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content
• Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards
• Advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies

We respect your wishes regarding your Privacy. You can exercise control and choice by resetting your Advertising Identifier in your device’s Privacy Settings. This app allows access to your Google Play Account. You can upload and save content from this app to your device.

Visit the official Star Wars Commander website – https://www.starwarscommander.com/

Privacy Policy – http://disneyprivacycenter.com

description: Football Manager Mobile goes wherever you do, so you can win anytime and anywhere with your favourite club. With compatibility across the majority of smartphones and tablets, you’ll speed through the seasons in FM Mobile whilst still experiencing that authentic football experience – with all the top players and clubs featured from around the world.  There’s a massive 17 countries to base yourself including all the big European leagues, so you’ll be the boss at one of the world’s top clubs.  Transfers and tactics are completely down to you, so you’ll play the transfer market and decide who plays and who warms the bench.It’s down to you to keep the players, the board and the fans happy and lead your club to victory, and who knows – maybe one day they’ll name a stadium after you! Football Manager Mobile 2018 delivers many new and improved features for this season including:TWO BRAND NEW LEAGUESYou can now try your luck in South Korea and the USA, two brand new fully licensed league additions for this season. LARGEST EVER DATABASE OF PLAYERSUp to 21,500 active players can now be loaded with custom options across leagues and nation, meaning your scouts will be busier than ever before. TACTICAL REVAMPImproved player roles, new team instructions and a fresh UI make it easier than ever to create your footballing vision and control how your team plays. UPDATED USER INTERFACEUpgrades and fine tuning make the FM Mobile UI the most intuitive of the series. IMPROVED TEAM REPORTSThere’s now far greater insight to the strengths and weaknesses of your squad and new depth charts will highlight where you might benefit from playing the transfer market. ALL-TIME BEST XI / TEAM OF THE YEARJudge how your current team stacks up against club legends with the All Time Best XI and see which of your players make it into your dream Team of the Year.THE BEST OF THE REST…•	Choose your managerial starting reputation before starting your career•	Improve and develop your staff with training options•	Badger the board for a new stadium

comments: 💖LOVE THIS GAME!  BEAUTIFUL, STUNNING GRAPHICS on each level. Continues to the next story line and game level without any ads. Only issue it keeps freezing up on me as a new player to this game. I hope I don't have to uninstall it as  its the best came I've come across that I have truely enjoyed. To many games on Google play with kiddie themes. This one is just what I've been looking for. I 💖💖💖💖 it. But if it keeps freezing up I'll have no choice but to uninstall it. How sad that would be.

Game is not fun at all. You spend too much time looking for stuff that it won't give you, not to mention that you need to match 5 gems to get any kind of special gem unlike other match 3 games where you get a special gem when you match 4 or more gems. If they change that I will be willing to give it another try. But until then I'm uninstalling the game and won't reinstall again.

I wasn't expecting to like this game but I started it 3 hours ago and I'm still playing so it must have something good about it or I wouldn't still be here. I'm more of a play a few min and move on. It has pretty graphics, and nice story line.

I love this game! The graphics are awesome and the games themselves are difficult but winnable. Just don't plan on playing through it very rapidly. The only complaint I have is that the story line is disjointed and sometimes difficult to keep track of. I would recommend this game to anyone who likes match 3 games.
Great game, nice to play. But too many instructions to play makes this game BORED. Waste a lot of time. Sorry to say, I just uninstall.

It is ok and worth a download. I am at level 36. The first 10 levels took two hours, then it got hard to make progress.  This is greedware requiring many $100s to play very long. The initial game plays over an hour, then becomes tedious and time-consuming. It is fine to play when on the toilet in the morning, and that seems appropriate. Mostly, this is just another match three game with excellent graphics and a modest story. Skip all the side games, those just waste resources prompting you to buy time or resources for real cash.  Never waste jewels to keep playing as there are unlimited replays only requiring you to wait for more energy to slowly but for free to build up for the next day's 15 minutes of play. The rewards for playing daily go at least for a year, so it takes a long time to finish.
description: When boring, uninventive match-3 puzzles prevail and all hope is lost, it all comes down to one single game … Cradle of Empires! Become the Chosen One and help the ancient empire rise from the ruins in this adventurous match-3 game with a rich storyline, thrilling quests and captivating characters!Cradle of Empires is an exciting — yet cool, calm and collected — family-friendly adventure. It takes you on a breathtaking odyssey that challenges your matching, building and collecting skills. With the help from Nimiru and Egyptian settlers, you can break the Amrun’s curse and restore the ancient civilization to its former glory. Step up and become the secret weapon in the triumph of good over evil!  WHAT MAKES THE GAME SPECIAL?● Unique gameplay mix: You make matches, build a grand city and go on an adventure all in one … How awesome is that?● Mega-sized adventure: You’ll be immersed in this engaging adventurous story with unexpected twists, gripping quests and memorable characters.● Ancient cities and civilizations: You collect resources by playing match-3 levels, which help you rebuild the cities that evil had destroyed.● Different game modes: You play 6 different match-3 modes, a variety you won’t find anywhere else.● Many power-ups: You can earn a diversity of bonuses, power-ups and amulets — you’ll develop your own strategy for using them.● Regular updates: You’ll never run out of new adventures as you’ll get new buildings, quests, bonuses, levels and whole civilizations in future updates. comments: This is a time consuming game. It is a not free game, non money users are extremely handicapped.  Easier to use than previous versions. Primarily a PC game. Playing off the app brower is like threading a needle underwater. Should be rated "R" for language and content. Still requires some finesse when using phone app and Android tablets. Good support.
I stopped playing for awhile and I love the new updates. You're game is still awesome.
I played this game when it first realesed years ago and it was extremely slow paced they have done a lot to improve the fun factor

Addictive and  overall  good game but could be improved. Anyone that's played for a number of years will agree that changes in the last year are ruining the game. The events pretty much every month now are ridiculous.  The instant builds & gold abuse are out of hand. Used to be a game of skill, a level playing field in regards to age, background & financial means, where players skill level & strategy were tested on the battlefield, now it's become a pay to win game where teams are assembled based on how much they will spend to win. For all the $$ Inno is making off gold purchases, they fail to invest back into the game experience for a smooth running game. Example, the game will freeze up on a player being op'd and they are not able to effectively defend. This issue has been brought up many times to Inno & has yet to be corrected. Players know the glitch & many exploit it, again making for an unfair playing field. Many long time & loyal players are choosing to leave the game after finishing up current, active world's due to changes in the last year or so. For new players, it's a fun & addictive game in which you have the opportunity to meet & play with people from all over the world, but be advised the description is misleading, it's not a free game & based on skill as it once was. If you want to win, be prepared that you will need to spend a great deal in the newer version pay to win it's become.
Worse then Trump
A great game for strategy

Now the heroes of antiquity are entering Grepolis! Legendary and powerful heroes, such as Leonidas, Hercules, Andromeda and Helena, help your city or army with their unique powers and strengths.

comments: It's fun but has it's problems: When pressing shoot it doesn't always shoot, it moves the player without shooting. When swiping it doesn't always read the swipe and kick it for a try through ball. When shooting the swipe isn't constant, I can swipe as fast as i can and it goes 54mph. Either give us an analog to move the player so the screen is just used for swiping or better your current way so it doesn't glitch or give issue. Atm the game isn't going to be played much more because it gets frustrating when it isn't working right.

description: Collect and upgrade over 100 cards starring your favourite players and compete head-to-head in real-time football matches located in iconic, city based Arenas across the world. Show off your finishing skills by curling one in the top corner, or smashing it past the goalkeeper from distance. Be the last line of defence by taking control of your keeper, tip one over the bar, or make an acrobatic save for the cameras.Win trophies to unlock new levels, gaining access to different Arenas and more elite players with unique special abilities. Compete in tournaments to win prizes, challenge to be the last team standing and prove you are the true Football Clash champion.Form a League with friends or others from across the globe, share XP and help improve each other's players whilst leading your team to victory! KEY FEATURES:* Collect 5 types of player cards - Good, Superb, Elite, Legacy and Legendary.* Each player card has its own set of attributes and one special ability.* Select your ultimate All Star team to defeat your rivals.* Create your strategy by selecting one of the 6 different formations.* Immerse yourself in the action with a 3D dynamic shooting and goalkeeping experience.* Outscore your opponent and take your team to glory.* Win card packs to unlock rewards, build and upgrade your squad with your favourite players.* Tour the world in iconic city Arenas on your path to be No.1* Form a League to donate cards and build your own football community.* Challenge your League members to friendly matches to determine who is best.* Compete in knockout tournaments to determine the ultimate Football Clash champion. descriptionHTML:
Battle the legions of darkness across time and space as otherworldly anti-hero 'Eddie', in an epic turn-based fantasy RPG.

Collect, power up and evolve incredible champions to form the ultimate fighting team - battle through multiple worlds, defeat giant bosses, rebuild Eddie's shattered soul and save the universe!

COLLECT AND COMMAND
Warrior, Magus, Sentinel, Gunner or Assassin. 5 different classes and 100's of characters to collect. Defeat corrupted enemies, turn them to your side and create incredible teams!

UNLEASH INCREDIBLE POWER
Eddies come in many shapes and forms, each featuring their own unique set of powers and abilities, including; Cyborg, Mummy, Trooper, Vampire, Viking, Samurai, Bounty Hunter and many more!

ENTER THE PvP BATTLE ARENA
Prepare for Eddie Vs Eddie in the ultimate face-off! Put your strongest teams to the test against other players and fight for death or glory as you duke it out to gain valuable prizes and supplies.

STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
Collect unique resources to upgrade and evolve your team, enabling strategic gameplay to counter the enemy. Over 40 different 'Talisman' sets to pick and choose additional abilities for your characters!

TRAVEL THROUGH TIME AND SPACE
Explore the furthest reaches of a sprawling universe, from the depths of underworld to ancient Egypt, past battlefields, an enchanted forest and beyond, all set in stunning 3D environments.

HALLOWED BE THY GAME
Features the incredible sound of Iron Maiden, with an epic soundtrack especially prepared for the game.

NOTES:
- IMPORTANT Minimum requirement: 768MB Ram, 1GB+ recommended
- Minimum Android OS: 4.1 or newer
- Minimum screen resolution: 800x480
- Recommended: Android device manufactured in 2014 or newer
- Requires online connection to play


Why is Iron Maiden: Legacy of the Beast free to play?
We want every Iron Maiden fan and every mobile gamer to be able to enjoy our game! You can fully enjoy the game without ever spending a penny! You can battle it out, earning every piece of of the game through sheer victory on the battlefield, or you can speed up your progress by purchasing Ironite in the Vault.


Having trouble? Contact us at support@ironmaidenlegacy.com

comments: Easy to pick up and varied game play.  Some of the controls can be a little repetitive but not to the point of distraction.  Keeps you interested and doesn't require a great expenditure of cash if you are a relatively casual player.  Plenty of good themed events.  All in all a good distraction which I have now been playing for almost a year !

I have been enjoying this game very much since I installed it maybe about a month ago. I actually stopped participating in a game that I've been in for 3 years for I find the is more entertaining, better graphics, quick response time on tickets and the community is more open. Highly recommend this game; which I might add is for all ages and gender who enjoy space battles and strategy. Thanks eh

description: The fate of humanity rests in YOUR HANDS. Play the #1 Space SciFi Strategy MMO on mobile! Colonize planets, build epic fleets of spaceships and battle real players from around the world!2525 AD. Man is an interplanetary species, forced into space and fueled by the discovery of 3 powerful new elements: Raon, Nugen and Sectium. Collectively called the Cosments, these resources were shared between the two dominant hegemonies, the Alliance of Neos and the Federation of Terra. But an already strained peace explodes from the devastating arrival of mysterious Alien fleets. Humanity’s confidence is shaken to its core, and war is now unleashed across the galaxies.As a powerful commander, both Neos and Terra call upon your aid. Colonize planets, recruit skilled heroes and develop warships to lead in battle against a multitude of enemy commanders. Along the way, you will raid alien fleets to harvest their technology, discover TRONs and EXTERs, and form crucial alliances.A prequel to the browser scifi classic, AstroNest (1999). The universe of AstroNest awaits. Which side will you choose?SCIFI GAMEPLAY:● EXPLORATION EVENTS: Play for free resources to upgrade your planets, heroes and spaceships● CAMPAIGN: Destroy space pirates, collect resources and level up your nation● PURSUIT: Capture space pirates, bring them to justice and collect your bountyWORLD-WIDE MULTIPLAYER:● MASSIVE MULTIPLAYER WAR: Work everyday w/your faction and engage in fierce inter-factional war● ASTRO LEAGUE: Weekly tournaments amongst experienced commanders● ALIEN TECHNOLOGIES: Raid aliens and harvest their technology to empower your fleets● ALLIANCES: Form alliances w/users from around the world to send gifts to and aid in multiplayer raids● FRIENDLY SKIRMISHES: Battle allies to hone your skills, test new formations and get rewardsDEVELOP:● SPACESHIP STRATEGY: Create your own unique combination of spaceship formations and weaponized them for battle● COLONIZE NEW PLANETS: Discover and colonize new planets to mine for and develop more resources● DEVELOP HEROES: Recruit, hire and train to develop the best heroes for each role● ASSEMBLE TRONS: Customize robots, called Trons, to boost your hero’s abilities● HYPER RESEARCH: Get advanced alien technology to upgrade your fleetINTERNET DATA USE:● AstroNest: The Beginning, requires a stable internet connection and is best played on Wi-Fi. After the initial install and updates, AstroNest: The Beginning needs to download additional game data, Wi-Fi is recommended.For suggestions and help, please contact us at: AstroNest.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/newLike Us on Facebook for Updates, Livestreams and Free Prizes: Facebook.com/AstroNestJoin Our Official Community of Strategy & SciFi Fans: Facebook.com/groups/AstroNestCheck Out Our Wikia for How-To’s & Strategy Guides: AstroNest.Wikia.comVisit Our Official Website: AstroNesttheBeginning.comSubscribe to Our YouTube: YouTube.com/AstroNest
descriptionHTML:
The fate of humanity rests in YOUR HANDS. Play the #1 Space SciFi Strategy MMO on mobile! Colonize planets, build epic fleets of spaceships and battle real players from around the world!

2525 AD. Man is an interplanetary species, forced into space and fueled by the discovery of 3 powerful new elements: Raon, Nugen and Sectium. Collectively called the Cosments, these resources were shared between the two dominant hegemonies, the Alliance of Neos and the Federation of Terra. But an already strained peace explodes from the devastating arrival of mysterious Alien fleets. Humanity’s confidence is shaken to its core, and war is now unleashed across the galaxies.

As a powerful commander, both Neos and Terra call upon your aid. Colonize planets, recruit skilled heroes and develop warships to lead in battle against a multitude of enemy commanders. Along the way, you will raid alien fleets to harvest their technology, discover TRONs and EXTERs, and form crucial alliances.

A prequel to the browser scifi classic, AstroNest (1999). The universe of AstroNest awaits. Which side will you choose?

SCIFI GAMEPLAY:
● EXPLORATION EVENTS: Play for free resources to upgrade your planets, heroes and spaceships
● CAMPAIGN: Destroy space pirates, collect resources and level up your nation
● PURSUIT: Capture space pirates, bring them to justice and collect your bounty

WORLD-WIDE MULTIPLAYER:
● MASSIVE MULTIPLAYER WAR: Work everyday w/your faction and engage in fierce inter-factional war
● ASTRO LEAGUE: Weekly tournaments amongst experienced commanders
● ALIEN TECHNOLOGIES: Raid aliens and harvest their technology to empower your fleets
● ALLIANCES: Form alliances w/users from around the world to send gifts to and aid in multiplayer raids
● FRIENDLY SKIRMISHES: Battle allies to hone your skills, test new formations and get rewards

DEVELOP:
● SPACESHIP STRATEGY: Create your own unique combination of spaceship formations and weaponized them for battle
● COLONIZE NEW PLANETS: Discover and colonize new planets to mine for and develop more resources
● DEVELOP HEROES: Recruit, hire and train to develop the best heroes for each role
● ASSEMBLE TRONS: Customize robots, called Trons, to boost your hero’s abilities
● HYPER RESEARCH: Get advanced alien technology to upgrade your fleet

INTERNET DATA USE:
● AstroNest: The Beginning, requires a stable internet connection and is best played on Wi-Fi. After the initial install and updates, AstroNest: The Beginning needs to download additional game data, Wi-Fi is recommended.

For suggestions and help, please contact us at: AstroNest.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new
Like Us on Facebook for Updates, Livestreams and Free Prizes: Facebook.com/AstroNest
Join Our Official Community of Strategy & SciFi Fans: Facebook.com/groups/AstroNest
Check Out Our Wikia for How-To’s & Strategy Guides: AstroNest.Wikia.com
Visit Our Official Website: AstroNesttheBeginning.com
Subscribe to Our YouTube: YouTube.com/AstroNest

comments: While the overall gameplay is pretty good. The whole game is literally a grind fest. Keep playing the same level over and over until you can upgrade, play another level, then proceed to keep playing the same level again. The competitive mode is also messed up as the opponent gets scores near impossible

Everything is great and good but only have one problem. And this problem will killing you all. That's the loading is damn slow no matter you are in LTE network or wifi situation. Because of slow loading it will kill your battery life fast as well. Please help to fix the problem and I will re-rate again. Thanks

Even with a perfect LTE speed game struggled with downloading hunts. The game forces you to do certain hunts before you can go back to the ones you like and want to finish. Not too mention every other minute it forces you to watch an ad or tries to get you to buy something from them. I will be deleting this app once i finish posting this comment.

Awsome game, the only thing wrong with it is that it takes forever to load. The graphics are amazing and so is the gameplay. This is something that could keep me entertained all day and I wouldn't get bored.😺👌

The game currently wont open, when it does its constantly crashing and force stopping. I have the silver subscription ($1.00/weekly) and im unable to take advantage of the content im paying for  want a refund. The upgrades and new equipment are too expensive, the gear and parts are also too expensive and hard to come by especially for the spearfishing which is the best part of the game.. You certainly can't get very far without spending some real money. You can be killed by animals when the come from behind so you with your limited turning capability you have no chance to defend yourself. A lot of problems.
During cts theres moments get sudden lag and it throws off the shooting causing to miss when i know aiming right. It never had these lag bits before.

comments: This game is awesome. The girls are beautiful and the songs are nice. There are a couple of errors I be having with the game though. I would have liked if they had subtitles to the songs so we know what they are singing. Also give us a chance to earn more gems and scouting tickets.The scouting I think is also not fair. I would scout single ten times and not get anything but a rare. While my friends do single scouts and get ur and SSR. YOU won't get goods cards unless you pay or do the 11 scout. The pricings also could be improved

I like music game in general, it's hard to get the game right on mobile. but they manage to get it right here. The LP system prevent you to play continuesly unless you paid. But in my experience the amount is decent enough (this make you enjoy the music more since you dont have to restart to achieve perfection). The card mechanic is added bonus where you can spend hard earn cash. I can see people still enjoying the game without spending anything.

Warning! This game is freakin' addictive. Good graphic with cute characters. Recommended for anyone who loves idol genre ... Suggestion: please fix the lagging. The circle disappear sometimes during the live show. Sometimes the app even doesn't recognize my finger touch that makes me miss a circle. But overall. It's a good game  .... ALL HAIL PRINTEMPS AND GUILTY KISS

I love the game definitely but with the new update, it keeps telling me that there's a transmission error then when it went through and finished connecting, it said that the data transfer was successful. I haven't transfered anything to a new device or anything like that. The only options I'm given is to contact support and start a new game in which I definitely don't want to do. It isn't my connection because everything else on my phone that requires WiFi is fine and I can use it. Is this because of the new update?

I love the game and it's wonderful!!  But...  I had i don't know like a glitch or something.  When started to play the rhythm game while I playing suddenly the icon that I should press came faster all or a sudden. But the song is still OK.  After the glitch it becames back to normal.  This happen me for 3 times on the same day. Please fix it. And Thank you.

It's so addicting and a fabulous rhythm game. One thing I'm really picky on is that you press the circle on the beat and this is the only game so far that has stayed true to all the notes being on the EXACT beat. Other games don't do that and it bothers me to no end bc I don't know when to press but this game is great and I love it dearly. Also cute girls.
description: A massive hit game app in Japan, now available worldwide!Featuring Aqours and μ's from the Love Live! series, as well as game-original characters. Support the school idols and help them make their dreams come true!Simple and fun to play. Just tap to the rhythm!----- Original Rhythm Action ——Live shows are performed by tapping the screen to the rhythm. Better timing can earn you higher scores. String combos together to gain even more points!There are over 80 original songs to choose from.----- Create Your Own Team ——You can pick and create your own teams from Aqours, μ's and many more original members.Create teams best suited to your favorite songs or events, or just with your favorite members. It's all up to you!------Improve Your Members———Improve your team members by "Practice." The better they get, the greater their performance scores will be!When you "Special Practice" two of the same member, they become idolized with cuter costumes.------Full Stories With the Official Anime Voice Actresses———The main story is fully voiced by the original Aqours and μ's voice cast.------Side Stories for Each Member———Each and every member has their own story to tell. Deepen the bond with them to unlock the side stories.Side stories of Aqours and μ's members are also fully voiced by the anime series voice cast!***Recommended screen resolution***640 by 360 pixels or higher(This game is not supported on rooted devices.)
descriptionHTML:
A massive hit game app in Japan, now available worldwide!

Featuring Aqours and μ's from the Love Live! series, as well as game-original characters. Support the school idols and help them make their dreams come true!

Simple and fun to play. Just tap to the rhythm!

----- Original Rhythm Action ——
Live shows are performed by tapping the screen to the rhythm. Better timing can earn you higher scores. String combos together to gain even more points!

There are over 80 original songs to choose from.

----- Create Your Own Team ——
You can pick and create your own teams from Aqours, μ's and many more original members.

Create teams best suited to your favorite songs or events, or just with your favorite members. It's all up to you!

When you "Special Practice" two of the same member, they become idolized with cuter costumes.

Each and every member has their own story to tell. Deepen the bond with them to unlock the side stories.

640 by 360 pixels or higher

comments: This game is rigged!!!!  Get dealt two seven of clubs as a pocket pair.  Get a seven of spades on the river and lose to someone that had two pair.   And I have a pic saved of my pocket pair.   Last time I checked it is impossible to be dealt two of the same card.   And in what world does a three of a kind lose to two pair.   Will never spend money on this app again!!!!!!!    So glad to receive a generic response...   It would have been nice if you actually read the review.  It doesn't matter how lucky you are. You cannot get get 2 of the exact same card dealt in the same hand.  And no matter how lucky you are 3 of a kind shouldn't be losing to two pair.  That just the rules of poker.

Use to be Terrific, last 2 weeks the game froze on my winning hand causing me to loose to Those Ugly Figurines..... No matter how my h or how I play this game is RIGGED to have those Monsters, break you...  Every Time ...... Beginning Not To Respect This Money Vaccum
After new update  very slow loading and can't play game very upset please fix problem ASAP
Game is fun to play. Sometimes a little frustrating on the out come of the deal.
Hard to  win any hands , the give ok money  bonus.  Win maybe 2 hands out 100, unless you buy.
SUCKS!! A big joke!! Don't waste your time to download

comments: This is an updated version. My last post was from I think September or maybe October, but this game is truly AMAZING!!! The story line itself is great as well as the side story's that you can read as well. This game has changed so much from when I started playing this game in August. The events are great but I think the developers can give a little bit better rewards then just XP juice and more jewels as well as heart stamina, but other than that the game is perfect no glitches and non of that stuff. The one year anniversary was amazing thank you for that!! I can't wait for season 10 and the future seasons of Moe Ninja Girls!!!

There really isn't anything negative to say about "Moe! Ninja Girls" the story is great, every character is deep and likeable, even if you're a free player each chapter is long enough to keep you coming back and paying is definitely worth it,too. It looks great and sounds great to boot. I honestly don't like mobile games at all but this is amazing and would be even it were a console or pc game. To me this is THE perfect app on mobile so download it now! And devs: I hope you continue to support the game because if you guys keep making seasons,I'll keep playing. Love you guys! <3

The story is really the best part of the whole game. The ninja fighting seems to be arbitrary , as you can have high stats and still lose a match. Collecting new gear is fun but you don't get as much new gear as you would like. Sometimes the game stretches the abilities of my Amazon fire eight and crashes under Google Play add in. This story definitely makes it worthwhile playing though it's funny and titillating!  ;-)

Amazing story! Great characters. Other similar apps dont compare. Im playing completely free so far, just finished Season 1, and many awesome event stories. Well worth my time. Yes you have to wait 4 hours between chapters, but who cares. Its actually a nice pace.

Cute anime girls. Only things is that the gameplay was really simple. I've played some dating games before and usually there's more options or they appear more frequently. And the ninja fight mini game was also simple. I don't know. This game seems to get good reviews so maybe it's just me.

The game's quite sensational! You wouldn't believe how hooked I am to this game when I finally found it then played it. The story is quite good, the cast are very unique. All in all, a great game. Oh, it would be nice to add some mini-games that allow players to gain nineys/gems other than the ninja fights. Also, there were some hick-ups with some of the dialogues where the words don't make sense but it's still readable.

She admires ninjas and comes up with the idea to set up a "Ninja Seeking Club".

descriptionHTML:
The highly anticipated AAA title War of Warship is the latest in a series of free-to-play, historical online combat games to be added to the wargames portfolio. Command history's most iconic war vessels as you build your own massive naval fleet. Level up important tech modules and prepare to dominate the oceans!

With four classes of ship, a myriad of upgrades and strategically designed environments, the action never ends. Every match is a unique experience. Hours of strategy, tactical gameplay and pulse-pounding combat await all who take the helm in War of Warships!

= Features =

Construction of naval base!
All over the world can build a naval base, you also need to defend against enemy attacks.

Naval construction!
Build a powerful naval fleet, more than 20 kinds of types of warships.

Form huge Alliances!
Join players from around the world, make friends and become allies. There is strength in numbers, so you can work together and take on others in exciting campaign.

World War!
As you get stronger, you can wage war on other countries and occupied them.

Research cutting edge technology!
Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.

description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!HIGHLIGHTS💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

comments: This game has had me hooked for almost two years now. There is always something to work on and improve. For long time Final Fantasy fans, this is the ultimate fanservice. I found this game to be more nostalgic than even other Final Fantasy crossover games like Dissidia and Theatrhythm. My only gripe is that I wish there was some sort of non-battle exploration aspect. A chance to explore the 3d FF games in 2d, even if they were brief and not the whole worlds, would be a nice touch. Highly recommended if you're looking for an addictive combat-focused rpg to devote yourself to, and super recommended for Final Fantasy fans.

Some minor technical issues with hanging or loading forever screens... but overall superb job with the idea, and best part is not needing to gatcha for your fave ff characters. Prob the least p2win of the top mobile games out there

I would rate it a 5, but the problem is that after the 6/8 update, the game ended up being super slow.  Extremely slow that I had to set my battle speed to 1 just to perform a blatant laggy action.  If you fix this issue, then I'll be happy to re-rate it a 5, but for now, you deserve a 3 unless you resolve it.

A fun game that makes you think about playing other Final Fantasy games. I have become invested in various characters and I am interested in Ffiv. The sprites do not work for all characters as it is hard to see differences between characters such as Vayne and Larsa. The game has missed an opportunity to create a storyline to bring the various games together. However it is a fun game that makes you want to play the full range of the Final Fantasy franchise.

I can't remain as positive as I used to be towards the game. With the various app issues such as excessively long loading times, poor performance, and issues with in-app purchases, I have soured on the game as a whole. The lack of daily missions that the japan side of the game received with the FF3 Onion Knight event that we still haven't received reeks of greed and deprives us of about 100 mythril (the in game currency) compared to where we should be.   The game itself, when it runs properly is still excellent. And it is awesome to use your favorite Final Fantasy characters, or become new fans of some. But DeNA has treated the Global version of the game as an afterthought as of late.

I gave this game 5 stars on EVERYTHING! But... I have some criticism. Some of the dungeons are completely too difficult. I've been playing the game for 2 years now DIEHARD and i still can't get even close to beating some of the bosses.
description: *** OVER 10 MILLION DOWNLOADS WORLDWIDE *** Gigantic update! RELIVE your favorite FINAL FANTASY moments in FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper! Fight with your favorite FINAL FANTASY heroes, battle through classic FINAL FANTASY moments, restore the lost memories and save the world once again. ======= "FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper has single handedly restored my faith as to the potential of this franchise and genre on mobile...” - Touch Arcade  "FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper takes characters and scenes and mixes them together to form a new experience, giving fans a new way to revisit their favorites.” - GamesBeat  "...must-have for fans of the Final Fantasy series." - CNET, 04/02/15 ======= FEATURES • RELIVE THE MEMORIESBattle your way through the most epic FINAL FANTASY moments, woven together for the first time on mobile with an all-new tale! Tyro, a brand new character designed by Tetsuya Nomura, takes center stage!  • CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAMPut your own twist on the tales: build your fully customized FINAL FANTASY party and lead them to victory! With a massive roster of FINAL FANTASY characters, the possibilities are nearly endless!  • FIGHT THE BATTLES YOUR WAYExperience the iconic FINAL FANTASY Active Time Battle (ATB) system! YOU control the flow of battle! • SPECIAL EVENTSWith special events every week, complete new chapters and collect limited edition characters, gear and abilities! ======= STORY In a glorious kingdom that thrives on the harmony between magic and art, epic tales of valor and hope have been passed from one generation to the next. The records of these great chronicles uphold the peace and prosperity of all civilization. The kingdom sealed these records inside paintings, to safeguard the balance of the world. That is until, without warning, the records within the paintings began to fade away... Darkness fell upon the world, bringing catastrophe and ruin. The time has come for you to save the kingdom’s future.  Defend Your Legacy. ======= EXPERIENCE A bunch of memorable moments are called out from FINAL FANTASY! FINAL FANTASY VII: Lead AVALANCHE against Shinra, and unravel Sephiroth’s plans…FINAL FANTASY VIII: Take your place in the elite group SeeD, and recruit the powerful Guardian Forces…FINAL FANTASY X: Battle Sin, and uncover the mysteries of the lost city of Zanarkand…FINAL FANTASY XIII: Rise up against the fal’Cie, and discover the true history of the world of Pulse… And many, many more...  © SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD.© DeNA Co., Ltd.
descriptionHTML:
*** OVER 10 MILLION DOWNLOADS WORLDWIDE ***

Gigantic update!

RELIVE your favorite FINAL FANTASY moments in FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper!

Fight with your favorite FINAL FANTASY heroes, battle through classic FINAL FANTASY moments, restore the lost memories and save the world once again.

=======

"FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper has single handedly restored my faith as to the potential of this franchise and genre on mobile...” - Touch Arcade

"FINAL FANTASY: Record Keeper takes characters and scenes and mixes them together to form a new experience, giving fans a new way to revisit their favorites.” - GamesBeat

"...must-have for fans of the Final Fantasy series." - CNET, 04/02/15

=======

FEATURES

• RELIVE THE MEMORIES
Battle your way through the most epic FINAL FANTASY moments, woven together for the first time on mobile with an all-new tale! Tyro, a brand new character designed by Tetsuya Nomura, takes center stage!

• CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM
Put your own twist on the tales: build your fully customized FINAL FANTASY party and lead them to victory! With a massive roster of FINAL FANTASY characters, the possibilities are nearly endless!

• FIGHT THE BATTLES YOUR WAY
Experience the iconic FINAL FANTASY Active Time Battle (ATB) system! YOU control the flow of battle!

• SPECIAL EVENTS
With special events every week, complete new chapters and collect limited edition characters, gear and abilities!

=======

STORY

In a glorious kingdom that thrives on the harmony between magic and art, epic tales of valor and hope have been passed from one generation to the next.

The records of these great chronicles uphold the peace and prosperity of all civilization. The kingdom sealed these records inside paintings, to safeguard the balance of the world.

That is until, without warning, the records within the paintings began to fade away... Darkness fell upon the world, bringing catastrophe and ruin.

The time has come for you to save the kingdom’s future.

Defend Your Legacy.

=======

EXPERIENCE

A bunch of memorable moments are called out from FINAL FANTASY!

FINAL FANTASY VII: Lead AVALANCHE against Shinra, and unravel Sephiroth’s plans…
FINAL FANTASY VIII: Take your place in the elite group SeeD, and recruit the powerful Guardian Forces…
FINAL FANTASY X: Battle Sin, and uncover the mysteries of the lost city of Zanarkand…
FINAL FANTASY XIII: Rise up against the fal’Cie, and discover the true history of the world of Pulse…

And many, many more...


© SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD.
© DeNA Co., Ltd.
developerAddress:
665 3rd St, STE 150
San Francisco CA 94107
summary: RPG with heroes from across the history of FINAL FANTASY! Defend your legacy!
title: FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper

description: 세븐나이츠 4주년 업데이트!각성 태오와 Smart 세나를 만나보세요!▶ 구사황  각성하다 ◀파괴의 힘을 받아들인 태오!한층 더 강력해진 태오를 지금 만나보세요.▶ 4주년 업데이트 기념 이벤트 ◀ 루비 5000개, 스페셜 영웅6성 겔리두스 장신구 선택권풍성한 이벤트로 4주년을 맞이해요!▶ 더 편해지고 Fun해졌다! ◀ 더 이상 지루함은 없어요!매일 반복해야했던 숙제같던 콘텐츠가어떻게 바뀌었는지, 확인해 보세요!!4년동안 많은 사랑에 감사 드립니다.앞으로도 다양한 이벤트와 업데이트로보내주신 사랑에 보답하겠습니다.■■■■■ 게임소개 ■■■■■ 비주얼이 다른 전략! 거부할 수 없는 초강력 비주얼 RPG 세븐나이츠 for kakao 1. 수백 명의 영웅들과 팀을 만들어 모험을 떠나자! 2. 쉽고 빠른 자동전투로 누구나 손쉽게 즐길 수 있는 게임! 3. 다이나믹하고 다양한 게임모드! - 모험모드: 13개의 영지를 정복하며 나의 영웅을 성장시키자! - 결투모드: 자웅을 겨루고 최강임을 인증하는 결투장! - 무한의탑: 나의 한계는 어디인가! 도전하고 또 도전하자! - 요일던전: 매일 다른 영웅들을 조합하여 공략하는 재미! - 공성/길드전: 길드원과 협동하여 최강의 길드가 되자! - 보스전 : 극강의 보스를 물리쳐 최고임을 증명하라! ■ 상품 정보 및 이용 조건 안내 ■ ※ 유료아이템 구매 시 별도의 요금이 부과됩니다. - 공급자 : 넷마블게임즈(주) 대표이사 권영식 - 이용조건 및 기간 : 게임 내 별도 고지된 내용에 따름 (사용기간이 표시되지 않은 경우, 서비스의 종료일까지를 사용기간으로 간주) - 결제금액 및 방법 : 상품 별 별도 고지된 결제금액 및 결제방법에 따름 (외화 결제 시 환율 및 수수료 등으로 인해 실제 청구금액과 다를 수 있음) - 상품지급방식 : 게임 내 구매한 아이디(캐릭터)로 즉시 지급 - 넷마블 고객센터 : 1588-3995 (평일 오전9시~오후6시 상담가능) - 최소사양 : CPU 듀얼코어 1.2GHz, Ram 1GB - 주소: 서울특별시구로구디지털로300 - 사업자번호: 105-87-64746 - 통신판매업번호: 제2014-서울구로-1028 호- 사업자 이메일: netmarbles@igsinc.co.kr개인정보 취급방침 : http://help.netmarble.com/policy/privacy_policy.asp?locale=ko서비스 운영 정책 : http://help.netmarble.com/policy/terms_of_service.asp?locale=ko■ 접근권한 안내 ■   ▶ 필수적 접근권한       저장공간       - '단말기내 프로그램 설치 및 데이터 저장' 등을 위해 필요합니다.       휴대전화 상태 및 ID 읽기       - '이용자 계정 생성 및 확인'을 위해 필요합니다.     ▶ 접근권한 철회방법       - 운영체제 6.0 이상 : 설정 > 어플리케이션 관리자 > 앱 선택 > 권한 > 접근권한 철회 가능       - 운영체제 6.0 미만 : 접근권한 철회가 불가능하므로, 앱 삭제로 철회 가능----개발자 연락처 :개발자 연락처 : 02-1588-3995 서울시 구로구 디지털로 300 지밸리비즈플라자 20층사업자 번호 : 105-87-64746  통신판매업 번호 : 제제2014-서울구로-1028호

Used to be a fun game with silly characters and lots to do. Since sold by per blue game quality has plummeted. Deleted and moved on to other games that run smoother and appreciate customer feedback.
The text in game as become tiny almost unreadable since last update. Am I the only one? I'm playing on galaxy S8.

One of my accounts was stolen, I had it connected to FB, Google & Email, I have gotten an email asking for things they need to verify, I sent what I could, name, server, etc, I also sent pics of the name it was when I had it and the name they changed it to, also the guild name, still not heard a thing back? It can't be that hard to get it back, I known a few ppl working in the gaming area, and they say it's pretty easy that you guys probably could care less, as long as you get your money...I really like playing it, I've put money into it, but security is horrible if I can have it connected to 3 things, yet someone can still steal it???.....Very disappointed now.

descriptionHTML:
Battle dragons and monsters in DragonSoul, the epic fantasy RPG stuffed with amazing heroes, legendary monsters and fantastic loot!

Battle online to earn legendary heroes and power-up to brawl your way through multiple fantasy game modes. Roleplay through the many Campaign chapters, test your skills against real DragonSoul players in PvP battles, and take a break from your quest to battle in the Boss Pit! Even team up with other players by joining a multiplayer Guild!

With all new heroes, gear and maps to grind, DragonSoul is a ridiculously fun and epic role playing adventure!

DragonSoul Features:

Strategy RPG with Over-the-Top Battles!
+ Collect and choose your 5 best heroes to wage war against monsters, dragons and even other players online
+ Roleplaying games and campaign battles come with a ridiculously epic twist
+ Strategy is key to beating tougher and stronger opponents!

Battle in Weekly ‘Guild Wars’ Fighting Games!
+ RPG fighting games give you a shot at squaring off against other players
+ Battle dragons and other amazing creatures in updated challenges
+ Multiplayer RPG games allow you to compete against other players for top ranks, prizes and bragging rights

Epic Heroes & Powerful Runes!
+ Heroes have at least 4 deadly skills and 14 rarity levels
+ Collect Heroes to build the ultimate lineup
+ Battle with awesome gear like Laser Kittens, Enchanted Elbow Pads and Lucky Orc’s Foot
+ Legendary heroes get even stronger with the addition of Runes

Battle Dragons & Legendary Monsters!
+ Battle dragons and monsters by fighting in combats
+ Monster RPG becomes real! Strategize with your heroes to battle your monsters in this RPG
+ Heroes clash with epic monsters in battles like you've never seen with unique & awesome gear

Epic Hero Quest!
+ Battle dragons and monsters as you collect Soulstones to free and unlock Heroes from the clutches of the evil dragon, Umlaut!
+ Roleplaying as five main heroes; you’ll battle dragons and grab rare loot

Amazing Graphics!
+ Explore a rich fantasy world filled with gorgeous environments, hilarious characters, astounding effects, and stunning graphics.

Long ago, fearless heroes ruled the land with mighty powers. Then the jealous dragon Umlaut captured the heroes, trapping them in Soulstones. Now, only few heroes remain. Only YOU can take the remaining few on a journey from a scrappy band and turn it into an unstoppable army as you unlock Soulstones in each battle. Explore an original world with fantastic characters while fighting your way to the top, freeing heroes and defeating evil along the way!

Fantasy RPG games will never be the same! Battle with your legendary heroes and become the best in this monster RPG!

Download DragonSoul today!

DragonSoul is available in multiple languages, including: Spanish, French, German, Russian, Italian, Turkish, Portuguese, Dutch, Danish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese and Indonesian.

title: DragonSoul - Online RPG

comments: Smurfymurf.  Now that's a Smurf! Did they ever mean something to you? Then you just have to get it ! Super nice!!! And technically very well done too !!!   Oooooooooops !!!! Update few days later...   Suddenly the game keeps crashing randomly...   Tried it for days....   Can hardly survive a single level now...    Very sad....   The game itself is still excellent....   Maybe a later update brings a fix..................

This is by far one of the best games I have played like this all year. Very addicting, easy, but challenging enough to keep you wanting to come back play some more. Haven't found something I don't like about this game just yet😁

Fun game, my daughter enjoys playing. ..easy, yet challenging at the same time.  One irritating issue...every time there's an update, or just opening the app, turns on the game's notifications..and have to turn it off constantly. ..otherwise it would be a rare 5 star rating from me.
You can't get anywhere unless you actually use money to buy the power ups to bet the levels. It's a waste of space for any device
Hate it. Too difficult. No helping aid. Not funny, but stressful. I left the game at level 83. Why you made it ugly like this?
Like with all other games this game is rigged, once you get to a certain level you are set up to fail unless you buy coins. I don't play games so I can go broke on coins, I don't like this.
description: **CELEBRATE SPRING WITH OUR LIMITED-TIME OFFERS**Ready, aim — pop! Embark on a colorful, bubble shooting adventure with all your favorite Smurfs in Smurfs Bubble Story! Travel with Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Clumsy and rest of the Smurfs family, on a quest across a forbidden forest, mysterious meadows and rushing rivers to pick up the other Smurfs kids who have gone lost.  Join these little blue folks on an amazing magic adventure as they discover new Smurfs, explore the Smurf world, and go toe to (smaller and very blue) toe with Gargamel.  Earn rewards, unleash special moves, and expand your Smurfs collection as you puzzle pop your way to victory!  Line up the perfect shot and trigger massive chain reactions by using each Smurf's individual amazing abilities.  --FEATURES-- MATCH BUBBLES - Pop matching bubbles to collect tons of magical items. BUILD YOUR SMURFS COLLECTION - Collect all unique Smurfs for special abilities to blitz through missions.  FEATURING YOUR FAVORITE BLUE FRIENDS - Just like in the cartoons, meet Smurfette, Hefty, Brainy, Clumsy, and more. HUNDREDS OF MISSIONS - Countless missions with addictive, yet challenging obstacles. EXPLORE A BEAUTIFUL WORLD - Journey through the Smurfdom filled with stunning visual assets from the movie. PLAY BOSS BATTLES - Face off against Gargamel and his minions in bubble blasting showdown to win special booster powers! COMPLETE BONUS MISSIONS - Limited-time challenges to unlock exclusive rewards and new Smurfs! GET SOCIAL – Connect to Facebook to play your friends and gift extra lives. CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS – Beat your friends at collecting the most Smurfs.   If you have issues, questions, or comments please email us at SmurfsSupport@spe.sony.com. We want to hear directly from you!   NOTE: If you uninstall Smurfs Bubble Story (or if your device is lost, stolen or destroyed), all unused consumables (In-app purchases) will not be refunded and cannot be transferred to new devices or accounts. comments: 5 min for 1 bar of energy is too long to wait. Loose interest.. when you level up the energy bar stays the same. It doesn't refill or increase.  Which also annoying as takes too long to complete timed tasks.  Frustrating as hell as decent game but as states above is a disappointment. Improve on these factors and you have a decent game until then there's no point in playing as everything is LONG and boring

I love that this game features the cast of Desperate Housewives - they look so similar and it makes me remember what their voices on the show are like. I think it's great that the game can be played Offline and how there is a storyline with mystery involved. I've played most of the game and just play the new episodes as they come. 4 Stars!
I don't understand why you don't get a refill of energy when you level up. It takes so long as it is to full up.... give us a freebie when we hit a milestone!

Its ok...a bit. The concept is interesting. But the game is getting too monotonous. .. and also do something about the energy refill.  It takes too long. Overally its an ok game but there is room for improvement.

Y'all need to hurry up !! I already completed Chapter 14. Like what are y'all waiting on ?! Don't make a game so damn addicting and have people waiting to see what's next. Get a move on. Until then you only get 3 stars.
Only issue is you have to wait so long for energy..  Only get to play for a few minutes..  Then wait on energy!  Would be willing to pay for it for a better deal :) but still gets a 5 star!!

comments: 1st the game is no longer about skill its all about spending money, if you dont regularly spend large amounts of cash you can't compete. 2nd rewards are obsolete after 2 weeks. 3rd support is useless, all they do is say sorry but they never actually do anything.
Expensive game to play, long build time, no protection for lower level playes. You spend money you will do fine major lag when playing
wasted of time and money becuase of the scripts which you cant kill it amd make this game clean and fiar,,we coined alot and we just lost our miney and anothers got what we coined free from scripts,,

It would be nice if you got rid of all the inactive player's, but I do like this game, ive been playing for over 3 year's now . I recently lost my  phone, when i got a new phone i had lost my account but a very nice guy called Neil at rockyou sorted it for me so I can't complain.

MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS Been playing over 3 years its time they need to merge servers. At most 50 active players on w14. Would be obvious but most have 10 alternate accounts making it harder to see how dead it has become. The select army function has been broke for months even tho they have updated to make map look like snow and buildings animate faster. Pointless... Lag is even worse and now impossible to do anything when attacked you have to exit game and reload to hopefully have anything left. Theres been multiple hacks making armys instant return to there death. Nothing waz done to fix it. Very expensive packages are rigged to only give one commander but imply that you recieve the 32 needed to complete one. Experimentals fail even at 110% chance success. The players are great community and support slightly improved. It is a very complex game with many things to keep u busy forever. To many issues to list all most of all need to MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS MERGE SERVERS
Its my favourite game but it is lagging all the time pls fix it and 5 stars..also the building takes so long..why so much time?
