descriptionHTML:
Build your military empire and conquer your enemies by becoming a war mastermind. Raise a powerful army and join an alliance to take over the world in this free-to-play MMO Strategy game.

NEW – Report to Alliance Base, one of the biggest game expansions yet! Explore new environments, construct new buildings, and collect new resources in your march to victory. Then, vanquish your enemies in epic single-player Campaigns and recruit new Commanders, Specialists and Implants to seize the day.

=WAR OF NATIONS FEATURES=

EXPLORE AN OPEN WORLD
Build up to 11 outposts on a giant world map occupied by other players. Strategically choose the best coordinates by building on rare resource patches and avoiding enemy territory.

BUILD & MANAGE STRATEGIC ALLIANCES
Coordinate attacks with up to 50 players around the globe. Join a strong Alliance to protect each other and devastate enemy bases.

BATTLE IN SINGLE-PLAYER MODE
All-new Single-Player Campaigns will challenge players like never before! Come back daily for new missions and rewards!

MANAGE YOUR ALLIANCE BASE
Introducing an all-new hub for your Alliance. Build the powerful Alliance Command, Monument and Material Compound to get the leg up and enable team boosts.

DEPLOY BATTLE TACTICS
Overwhelm your enemies with different battle strategies by stealing, raiding, capturing, or occupying enemy bases. Level up your defense by building base shields or teleporting outposts.

RECRUIT UNDEAD SOLDIERS
Recruit new Zombie Commanders to lead your army and devastate the enemy.

UPGRADE & FUSE YOUR STRONGEST COMMANDERS
Artificially fuse & equip your commander with hi-tech gear. Send the toughest ones with your units to conquer your enemies.

UNLOCK POWERFUL HI-TECH UNITS
Research to unlock up to 18+ powerful units with multiple levels of upgrades.

ENGAGE IN REAL-TIME EVENTS
Display the power of your alliance in World Domination, King of the Hill, Players Arm Race & more.

ACCUMULATE VIP POINTS
Collect rewards for playing, including larger armies, Commander upgrades, exclusive events and much more.

Conquer the world with high-tech weapons, powerful Commanders and vicious specialists. Level up and explore to gain the upper hand, and crush the opposition.

Download War of Nations and claim your territory today!

Visit our Forums: http://forums.rockyou.com/forum.php?
Follow us on Twitter: @rockyouinc
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Rockyou
Watch us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC3d94dVqq6hCb-WGNExZqw/feed

comments: I was having so much fun with this app today after the updated it on my S3 Galaxy tablet! Seriously!! This is dope! I can't wait to level up my grade from 3 & move forward to grade 5! When I watched the ATIS video tutorial,  I was blown away! It seems that "Expert Server" is becoming much more awesome with their new feature added in the server!! I really can't wait to get there! This is awesome update FDS!  Great job!  Keep it up! 😊😎👍👍👌👌🙌🙌

This is truly a step up over your average plane simulation games. With Global release and many changes that have taken place it truly is the best out there.  My only gripe is that there is not enough focus on African Airlines. The new update has totally been focused on American and European Airlines. Most African airlines already have aircraft listed in Infinite Flight but yet aren't added. Sad really, hence the 4 stars

Its good to hear that ur asking for our feedback. First of all let me tell that u guys are doing a superb job...keep it up and lots of love to u all who developed this simulator. One request to the admins that atleast reply to what we are asking, not exactly at the same time but take ur time and reply.. previously i had asked about adding liveries to 777 300 er model no one replied or even acknowledged that ur reply has been received. I hope to get a reply here atleast.  I would like to know when u will add A350 and more liveries in 777-300er model ( would love to see air india, jet airways, china southern, china eastern, jal, ana, korean air, alitalia).. please add this liveries.. it will be awesome

If you love flight or you're a total aviation geek like myself. Infinite Flight is the app for you. Take a chance and fly anywhere around the world with dozen of aircraft for your choosing. You won't regret it. What are you waiting for ? Stop reading this and install 😁

Played this game since the beginning, one of the biggest updates has only been made to those who have to pay an extortionate amount.  Feel robbed really and the fact I can't play the game offline, seriously? ffs what a waste.

Well this is a bit atrocious. I feel entirely missold, was shown this app with the ability to fly pretty much from and to anywhere on the planet. I even had it on a previous phone and did such. Now I buy it and oh guess what? It was updated so one can't fly from one city to another, let alone another country. I mean it's pretty pointless at this point, don't think I can justify the additional £75 (per year) to enable me to actually use this and salvage some fun out of it -_-   Tl;Dr? I almost want my £5 back bc it was used for about 5 minutes - may as well build paper planes as they go further.
description: Infinite Flight offers the most comprehensive flight simulation experience on mobile devices, whether you are a curious novice or a decorated pilot. Explore high definition scenery in regions from around the world with our diverse inventory of detailed aircraft, tailoring each flight by choosing your time of day, weather conditions, and aircraft weight configuration. Features:• Dozens of aircraft in a diverse fleet of airliners, general aviation and military aircraft (free and paid add-ons)• Multiple regions featuring high definition satellite imagery, accurate topography and all major airports with precise runway and taxiway layouts• Customizable time of day and weather conditions (real time or custom)• Realistic atmospherics with the sun, moon, and stars• Autopilot (supports control of all flight parameters, NAV mode to follow your flight plan, and auto land on select aircraft)• Easy-to-use flight planning system with accurate fixes and Navigational Aids• Engine startup and shutdown• Instrument Landing System (ILS)• Advanced replay system• Weight and balance configurationSubscribe to Infinite Flight Pro for an all-access experience which allows you to fly anywhere in the world with live weather and our entire fleet of aircraft. Join thousands of other pilots and air traffic controllers for the most engaging online flight simulator available today! Infinite Flight Pro subscription benefits:• Join thousands of other pilots for a global multiplayer experience• Fly the world with millions of square miles of high definition scenery with access to over 25,000 airports (no region lock-in)• Enjoy all available aircraft • Act as an Air Traffic Controller• Fly through live weather and winds aloft • Subscription Options: 1 Month, 6 Months, and 12 Months• Payment will be charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase• Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off before the end of the current period• Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the Infinite Flight Play Store page after purchaseNote: Internet connection (WiFi or Cellular) is required to use Infinite Flight.Privacy Policy and Terms of Service:https://goo.gl/zBteBg
descriptionHTML:
Infinite Flight offers the most comprehensive flight simulation experience on mobile devices, whether you are a curious novice or a decorated pilot. Explore high definition scenery in regions from around the world with our diverse inventory of detailed aircraft, tailoring each flight by choosing your time of day, weather conditions, and aircraft weight configuration.

Features:

• Dozens of aircraft in a diverse fleet of airliners, general aviation and military aircraft (free and paid add-ons)
• Multiple regions featuring high definition satellite imagery, accurate topography and all major airports with precise runway and taxiway layouts
• Customizable time of day and weather conditions (real time or custom)
• Realistic atmospherics with the sun, moon, and stars
• Autopilot (supports control of all flight parameters, NAV mode to follow your flight plan, and auto land on select aircraft)
• Easy-to-use flight planning system with accurate fixes and Navigational Aids
• Engine startup and shutdown
• Instrument Landing System (ILS)

comments: With every patch they nerf useful pirate(resource) spawns.... I guess they REALLY want you to throw cash at the game to even have a chance of surviving.... I know it's a beta, but I'm fast losing patience. It's also laggy, buggy, and slows my phone down like no other app....

Players leaving this game since updates have put up resource costs. Slowly but surely turning into a p2w game. Game is also glitchy and support do nothing to help.  It could be a great game,  don't kill it before it leaves beta.

Seemed great then I realised that the 'beta' has been non progressive forever, the updates only include small pirate gathering and fleet adjustment,  never the main things like resource sharing and reinforcement which are the big things people actually want aswell as convenient random fleet losses that either you get no reports for or none of your ships are saved by the warp which is purely for that purpose.  Play by all means but don't expect to advance unless your pockets are deep.
Loving it so far. Not quite sure what's going on but it follows the basic premise of many games, it looks good and handles well.
I don't usually play these type games but I'm enjoying learning this one Controls are easy to use and it guides you through early stages of building colony enjoyable game
Brilliant game, my only complaint is it's a little hard to see the writing and ships on my phone,but that's all, thanks fo a  excellent  game

comments: I absolutely LOVE this game!! The stories of each character are amazing! I just wish they had more suitors. And I wish they made more games exactly like this but with a completely new story line and characters. Like, I love the voice animations and how long the chapters are and how long the story line of each person is. I also love how your character talks like a modern day girl when she's at the sengoku era. You don't have to pay to see more about each person either. It's amazing. I Love this app. Please make more!!!! ❤️❤️❤️

So, this is my third update. That's how much I love this game 😂. Thank you for giving us castle and closet space via game events. Very helpful. I don't have anymore lag issues. And I appreciate the diversity in storylines. No route is the same, unlike other Otome games. Also, the relationship development is fantastic - not too slow or fast. The main character actually talks like a real person and less like a "character". Art is beautiful, too. I just feel bad that I can't say much about the music or voice acting, as I usually have my phone on vibrate.

Idk what to say, but one thing for sure I really loveee this game!!!! Is so awesome, the chara omg so magnificent. I don't mind spending much money on this game hahaha it's so freaking beautiful!!! And I really love the MC she's so strong and cute, it's just like I want to have a route for MC too. But rn I'm waiting for KENSHIN UESUGI route, I hope it will come out soon. Damn, Cybird always make such a beautiful otome game. Thank you for making this game, it just made my life💗💗💗💗

I couldn't resist to do a newer version of the review, so here it is. I've been playing this game for nearly three months now, and that's saying something. First of all, the story is really engaging. The characters are really sweet, and I love how we don't need to spend money to enjoy it, unlike other otome games. Shout-out to the people who made Ieyasu's route a dream come true.

There are only a few routes out currently but they are wonderful all the same. The main character is funny and reacts realistically to situations! Not to mention the voice acting is impeccable like wow I don't speak a word of Japanese but everytime Nobunaga speaks I'm just nodding along. Also this game has an adorable animated series and it is the best

The most romantic and sweetest experience of falling in love game..  I feel like I'm truly falling in love with Masamune date.. Love his playful side, his sweetness,  fierce yet gentle  sometimes.. The only reason I CANNOT RATE 5 STAR is I cant read back the route chosen even though I have spent actual money..  Its like I'm purchasing the story,  but the fact is,  I'm not.. This is frustrating..  Atleast after having spending so much money,  we can keep the story to be read again afterwards..  Please reconsider this..  Thank you
description: You've just nabbed your dream job as a fashion designer when you're sent hurtling back in time to an alternate version of Sengoku era Japan! After accidentally changing history and earning the favor of warlord Nobunaga Oda by saving him from near death, you must survive 3 months surrounded by Japan's most famous and handsome Sengoku warlords before your next chance to make it back home. In a world where it takes one man to conquer a nation, do you have what it takes to conquer his heart?Ikémen Sengoku: Romances Across Time, one of CYBIRD's most popular games in Japan, is finally out in English! Enjoy a vibrant, exciting story complete with engaging music, gorgeous illustrations, and character voices! Receive 5 free Chapter Tickets each day to progress through the story! Free to download! Play now and find your one and only Sengoku love!■Enjoy Characters voiced by some of Japan's most popular Voice Actors!Nobunaga Oda (Voice: Tomokazu Sugita)Masamune Date (Voice: Kazuki Kato)Yukimura Sanada (Voice: Kensho Ono)Ieyasu Tokugawa (Voice: Toshiki Masuda)Hideyoshi Toyotomi (Voice: Kohsuke Toriumi)Shingen Takeda (Voice: Yuuichiro Umehara)Mitsuhide Akechi (Voice: Shunsuke Takeuchi)Mitsunari Ishida (Voice: Yoshitaka Yamaya)Kenshin Uesugi (Voice: Hiroaki Miura)Sasuke Sarutobi (Voice: Kenji Akabane)Kennyo (Voice: Tarusuke Shingaki)■Collect Gorgeous Illustrations!With each character route, you receive 3 beautiful illustrations of your guy that will suck you right into his story! You can also receive illustrations through special in-game events!■Cute Avatars for Every Girl to Enjoy. Dress Up Your Guy As Well!Experience more interactive otome gameplay with the in-game avatars!Extravagant kimono, beautiful Japanese rooms and gardens, and cute accessories all await you in this game.Collect hundreds of attire pieces to adorn your avatar. Limited edition attire pieces are constantly being added so that you can always stay up to date with the latest trends! Characters from the story are also available as avatars!Dress up your love interest for the perfect day out together.■Shape Your Story through the Choices You Make!In Ikémen Sengoku, there are multiple endings available for each guy depending on the choices you make in the game. If you get enough points you might even receive a special epilogue with your one true love! Which happy ending awaits you? Play to find out!■Enjoy In-Game Story Events for a New Experience with Your Guy!Ikémen Sengoku holds many free Story Events that require no Chapter Tickets to continue reading! Play to experience exciting mini stories outside of the main story. Get into new situations with your favorite guys, and clear endings to get bonus items and attire pieces!Team up with your friends to clear the events faster and get every event ending!*1・・・Free to Play （In-Game Payable Content Available）
descriptionHTML:
You've just nabbed your dream job as a fashion designer when you're sent hurtling back in time to an alternate version of Sengoku era Japan!

After accidentally changing history and earning the favor of warlord Nobunaga Oda by saving him from near death, you must survive 3 months surrounded by Japan's most famous and handsome Sengoku warlords before your next chance to make it back home. In a world where it takes one man to conquer a nation, do you have what it takes to conquer his heart?

Ikémen Sengoku: Romances Across Time, one of CYBIRD's most popular games in Japan, is finally out in English! Enjoy a vibrant, exciting story complete with engaging music, gorgeous illustrations, and character voices! Receive 5 free Chapter Tickets each day to progress through the story! Free to download! Play now and find your one and only Sengoku love!

■Enjoy Characters voiced by some of Japan's most popular Voice Actors!
Nobunaga Oda (Voice: Tomokazu Sugita)
Masamune Date (Voice: Kazuki Kato)
Yukimura Sanada (Voice: Kensho Ono)
Ieyasu Tokugawa (Voice: Toshiki Masuda)
Hideyoshi Toyotomi (Voice: Kohsuke Toriumi)
Shingen Takeda (Voice: Yuuichiro Umehara)
Mitsuhide Akechi (Voice: Shunsuke Takeuchi)
Mitsunari Ishida (Voice: Yoshitaka Yamaya)
Kenshin Uesugi (Voice: Hiroaki Miura)
Sasuke Sarutobi (Voice: Kenji Akabane)
Kennyo (Voice: Tarusuke Shingaki)

■Collect Gorgeous Illustrations!
With each character route, you receive 3 beautiful illustrations of your guy that will suck you right into his story! You can also receive illustrations through special in-game events!

■Cute Avatars for Every Girl to Enjoy. Dress Up Your Guy As Well!
Experience more interactive otome gameplay with the in-game avatars!
Extravagant kimono, beautiful Japanese rooms and gardens, and cute accessories all await you in this game.
Collect hundreds of attire pieces to adorn your avatar. Limited edition attire pieces are constantly being added so that you can always stay up to date with the latest trends! Characters from the story are also available as avatars!
Dress up your love interest for the perfect day out together.

■Shape Your Story through the Choices You Make!
In Ikémen Sengoku, there are multiple endings available for each guy depending on the choices you make in the game. If you get enough points you might even receive a special epilogue with your one true love! Which happy ending awaits you? Play to find out!

■Enjoy In-Game Story Events for a New Experience with Your Guy!
Ikémen Sengoku holds many free Story Events that require no Chapter Tickets to continue reading! Play to experience exciting mini stories outside of the main story. Get into new situations with your favorite guys, and clear endings to get bonus items and attire pieces!
Team up with your friends to clear the events faster and get every event ending!


*1・・・Free to Play （In-Game Payable Content Available）

descriptionHTML:
Journey to the world's most beautiful destinations and fish for real in paradise!

Jump into paradise blue and experience the ultimate 3D fishing adventure!
Know nothing about fishing? It's okay! You'll be able to catch the Blue Pointer with just a tap!
Download Ace Fishing now to travel all over the world and fish at the most famous fishing spots!

1. Fishing Made Easy
- Get hooked on fishing with simple, one-touch controls!
- Who says fishing is boring? Just 3 seconds is all it takes before heart-pounding action!
- Complete the tutorial and practice in the Practice Room to master the skills and even get rewards!

2. Jaw-dropping 3D Graphics
- Interact with catches so life-like they could fly off your screen!
- Perfectly recreated physics of fishing means you'll be able to feel the excitement of fishing at your fingertips!

3. It doesn't get any more real than this!
- Fishing rods customizable with fishing lines of varying length and tension strength!
- Hang in there- tire out the fish through epic struggles!
- Fish movements and characteristics captured with stunning realism!
- Complicated mechanisms made easy to bring the most realistic fishing experience to mobile gaming!

4. Travel the World
- From Hanauma Bay to the Amazon River, and China! No place is off-limits!
- Hundreds of exotic fish native to different areas! Venture through the entire map to catch them all!

5. Global Rankings
- Reel in the biggest fish and break records! Compete in fishing tournaments held by the hour and go head-to-head against users from around the globe!
- Prepare the lure for the target fish through Lure Crafting System to rank higher!
- Your records are automatically saved every time you fish, so you can aim to break them!

6. More to Enjoy!
- Equip Accessories on your rod for more power! Use the Pearl Powders to Power-up your Accessories!
- Utilize the special Fever Mode! Fever Mode will increase your stats to the MAX so you can catch the fish you've always dreamed of!

7. Shh! It's a Secret!
- A special League Ranking to show off your skills is coming soon!

descriptionHTML:
THE CULT FIGHTING GAME IS BACK!

Experience the adrenaline rush of classic KOF fights combined with the exciting & addictive gameplay of collectible card games! Choose from an expansive roster of classic characters straight out of the best SNK games, assemble the ultimate tag team and chain-up your fighters’ special move in battle to unleash devastating combos onto your challengers.

==Key Features ==

>>DECK BUILDING<<
Unlock, recruit and collect fighters from a roster of 70+, including fan-favorite Terry Bogart, Kyo Kusanagi, Iori Yagami, Mai Shiranui and many more. Select up to 6 fighters in your dream team, set them in formation, then get ready for a hell of a fight!

1, QTE COMBOS
Kusanagi Serpent, Maiden Masher, and Haoh Shoko Ken…unleash your fighters’ incredibly powerful attacks at a tap of your finger. But with KOF98’s unique QTE system, it takes the right timing and skills to chain up the perfect combo and KO your challengers!

2, RPG PROGRESSION
Train your fighters, upgrade their equipment and level them up to their maximum potential to unlock their most powerful passive and active abilities, and their deadliest attacks.

3, CAMPAIGN & PVP
Fight your way through the 70+-level campaign that follows the classic storyline of the games, and a multitude of PVE challenge modes. Then take on players from all over the world in a variety PVP modes and tournaments, to eventually claim the real “King of Fighters” title!

4, AUTHENTIC KOF EXPERIENCE
All the classic fighters, battle arenas, iconic special moves, sound effects and even the Japanese voices from the original game. A must-play for the fans!

==Official information==

Official Website: http://98kof-us.game-bean.com/

©SNK PLAYMORE CORPORATION ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

comments: Just started and it is quite full of ads. At least they let you end the ad after 5 to 8 seconds. I wish therr was a way to go back and do the tutorial again and I accidently pressed during the first one and missed how to land. Lots of trial and error on that one. Also would be nice to know how the scoring exactly works.

It's getting frustrating.. I'm into level 14, have up graded skills and equipment but yet still can't manage to get a bronz let alone a silver or gold in the very first jump in the game. Along with finishing a constant 16th about 95% of the time make me think it's rigged. What's up with that??

Fantastic concept and artwork and potentially amazing game ruined by a half arsed tutorial and lack of information, pure laziness.  The fun of the game turns to frustration as you get good distance and terrible scores, but why? You assume landings but the game gives you no information on correct technique. Also same for takeoff and mid air lift.   Come on devs its lazy and ruining a game with huge potential. Uninstalled...

By level 4 no matter what score i get the bots always get about 15 higher. 1 game i would get 130 and the bots would get 145. Then when i get 160 they still get 175 showing this is rigged. That makes it so annoying with a lack of help from the developers make it annoying otherwise would b 5 stars if these issues were fixed

The game has a great Idea to it, but it really needs so tweaking in the physics deparment of the game, on certain Stages I go further with a Bad Jump then a Excellent one, and the wind doesnt really play that much of an effect in the game. But overall great and fun game, amd very addictive.

This game is actually very good, I play a lot of mobile games as its normally all I have time for and this is challenging and fun, the career mode is good and also like the upgrades..  I will definitely be keeping this one on my phone for a while because it is a really cool game. If you don't like ads then click you back button to get rid of it from time wasting or spend the buck to lose them forever.. Well done on a cool game, make some more like it!!

comments: I'm so addicted to this game! Out of all the simulation games I've played this is by far my favourite. The characters are great and the story line changes on each route so it keeps you interested. And you don't have to spend money to enjoy everything in this game. An hourglass takes a while to get but it's worth it to use them to get the extra stories. I enjoyed the Christmas add on.

Nice description, nice plot. Likable characters with spot on music. What more could I ask for? (Edit on 9/7: I downed the rating not because it's a bad game, but because although I had an account for this game, I lost all my data when I logged in. I had saved 270+ hourglasses so I could do the secret endings but well. That went down the toilet. I won't be trying again until I get interested (and over this) in this game again. Other than that I fully recommend this game.)

Loved it overall but make the chats last longer without having to reset them as I miss them with school or sleep. Not everyone can use the app at certain times in the day. It doesn't have to last the whole day just a few more hours  or 10. The games good other than that though. It's a good way to pass the time and has a good story.Keep up the good work.

Im in love wih the characters already! Though, its kinda sad that you are forced to be a girl character even if you state that you arent in game. That kinda took me out of the experience a bit. I understand it would probably take a lot of effort to put that option in, but man would it be cool. Keep up the great work!

I've been a long term fan now since 2016 when it came out and I still play it to this day! The chatrooms are very interesting to read and the visual novels are always something to look forward to! I have been in love with Saeran since the Common Route so him getting his own route was like a dream come true! Although, his route is an emotional roller coaster..

Update: I said that I only rated 4 stars because sometimes I missed the chat room because I didn't get any notification, right? But now, after I updated the game I get notifications about the chat, and not just once but twice! I got double notifications lol I'm so happy, thank you! And thanks for the 20 hourglasses after the update. Now I give you full 5 stars! I LOVE this game! 😘  I'd love to give 5 stars, I mean this game is amazing and almost perfect! Just sad that sometimes I missed the chat because I didn't get the notification. So, I have to check the game often. But I really enjoy playing this game, which doesn't feel like game at all. I feel like I'm chatting and talking with real people! And it says something, cause I just installed this yesterday. Highly recommended! Try it and you'll love it!

description: Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself. Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive! ◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro! The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News ▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade ▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo ▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro ▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint ▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play ▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN ◈◈◈Features: ● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed) ● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management) ● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful) ● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?) ● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!) ● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved) ● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements ● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon) P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references! Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!◈◈◈Like Plague Inc. on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc Follow me on Twitter: www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations
descriptionHTML:
Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive!

◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈

Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro!

The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!

▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News
▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade
▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo
▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro
▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint
▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play
▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer
▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed)
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management)
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful)
● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?)
● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!)
● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved)
● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements
● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!

Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon)

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references!

Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!

◈◈◈

comments: Bad physics are bad. The trucks always roll. You have to grind the first stage over and over and over and over to upgrade your truck. Even after you unlock stage 2 you can't get any points from it because your truck is so bad. It makes this game frustrating rather than challenging. The only way to go faster is to upgrade truck.  Not a huge fan.

Great game for killing time.. Having an issue with sound though.. Sound is fine with no headphones or wired head phones but the moment I try to play with my wireless headphones the sound gets choppy and one second of sound take 5 seconds to play.. This needs to get fixed please

DO NOT import gt. All it does is reset your progress and give you 1 more upgrade slot. So stupid. I uninstalled after this. Disgusting to lose a couple days progress to false advertising such as this.
Great game, but one level seriously needs to be looked at. Snow: Mayhem Marathon 1 is nearly impossible to beat. It's 99 percent luck on that level. Fix that and I'll give the game 5 stars all day.
The game is great. Anyone else have problems with beating pro racers I with the apc in under 57 secs? Stuck on that one...

Developer forces you to watch ads which is excessive considering most people will choose to watch ads for free items. Plain greedy. Stop wasting my time with your ads on good games. Let the player choose to watch the ads for rewards.

comments: It's a fun game but pvp is a big part and can take a week building up an army just to have it crushed when you log on. Has caused me to not play for a day or two because of this but also what makes me come back it offers that challenge that is often lost in most games like this where is the fun of there is no risk. Not to many tedious tasks after about day 5 no longer logging in every 3 hours to start a build project or something.

Other people might think its a boring game, but this game really fits for someone who doesnt want to get stressed out in a game.. really love the concept. Been a player here for almost 6 years now.. tried other games but still going back to this game.

Should add a few features like: 1. Able to share your battle report with other players. 2. Cancel troops in training. 3.See incoming attack on Hamlets you're holding (Or add a lost art which helps to see it).
My most resource hungry app on the tablet. Need to buy too many stuff to be a top level player. Lately, more stuff to buy and twice as expensive. Don't recommend this game.
Complex empire builder, takes time to learn. Definitely a pay to win. Lots of people with alts and coin hacks. Still lots to do. It's fun, but not worthy of serious commitment.
Reviving soldiers for sapphires must be the most ridiculous idea of all. My handful of soldiers need 2000 of those that are already impossible to acquire. :(
description: Immerse yourself in the dark world of fantasy and myth! Stormfall: Rise of Balur™ delivers epic battles in one of the most challenging and popular MMO strategy games available. The empire of Stormfall has fallen, and rival warlords join the battle across the continent as an ancient evil rises once again. You have been chosen to defend and protect the lands of Darkshine, and lead your people and your army through these dark times and into the light. For the first time, this popular free strategy game has been brought to mobile as a standalone, epic, multiplayer adventure, featuring groundbreaking graphics and genre-defining gameplay. Attack enemies, forge alliances and gather resources as you defend your castle from constant enemy attacks whilst simultaneously building and expanding your empire. Carefully plan your strategy and join clans in order to defeat rival leagues in this ultimate MMORPG.    NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Stormfall: Rise of Balur™FEATURES✔ FREE TO PLAY✔ Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Portuguese and Russian✔ Exceptional artwork, graphics and gameplay✔ Recruit giant armies, raid endless castles and defend your empire ✔ Exciting PVP battles – pit your armies against other players from around the world, master strategy, diplomacy and join forces with great League to defeat your rivals. ✔ Popular MMORPG free to play with thousands of clans to join.  ✔ Forge diplomatic and strategic alliances with millions of online players, from around the world, all in real time. ✔ Raid, attack and defend in order to defeat your enemies in ongoing battles and wars. ✔ Earn bonus rewards just for commanding your troops each day. ✔ Role playing game adventures and missions, deep level strategy NOTE! Stormfall: Rise of Balur™ is a standalone mobile game and is completely independent from the web and social Stormfall servers.Please give us your feedback to help us make it even better!Support: https://plarium-mobile-support.zendesk.com/hc/categories/115000198969 Community: https://www.facebook.com/Stormfall-Rise-of-Balur-1491465477787736/Privacy Policy: http://plarium.com/#/doc/policy/Terms of Use: http://plarium.com/#/doc/terms/

comments: Would of given 5 stars if it wasnt for the 300 energies as it doesnt go very far, would be better if it refilled twice a day instead of once. Why do you have to spend money on special scenes they should be unlocked if you picked the right choices not pay for them. Apart from that love the story and the graphics are great if these issues could be sorted that would be great

I downloaded this due to the narrative and the reviews, but I am not a fan of this game. 300 energies (30 sentences) is very short I get through it in about 3 minutes and then you wait an entire 24hours for another. I love the storyline and the graphics so therefore this would be good for someone who is a slower reader. It's a shame but I will be uninstalling.

Wish there was more energy or like an easier way to get more energy. I get 450 energy for the day with the initial 300 and playing the mini game which gives 100 and watching the adds which is 50. But it's not enough I feel like I only get about a couple sentences in and then I run out. Maybe if you could play the mini game every hour or two to get the 100 energy and watch the ads around the same time to get 150 instead of waiting 24 hrs it would be better. The story progresses too slowly with that little amount.

This game really addictive!! The only problem is they don't give you enough energy.😒you either have to buy energy or play a mini game to get more energy. The highest energy points that you can get is 100. Plus the 30 points if you watch a video. Other than that the game is AMAZING. The graphics are realistic. It has a lot of romance too. You should definitely download this game if you're not bothered about the energy points.

The game has me hooked. I'm big on reading so I fly through the 300 energies. I've spent $10 repeatedly, even $20 for energy and it feels like it was gone in the same amount of time as the 300 energies. If you allowed maybe 4 refills a day, it would be amazing, or some other way, maybe to just keep playing the minigame. There has to be something more other than 20 energies for a video once a day. But despite the lack of energy, this game has me so disgustingly hooked. I love it so much.

I think this game is really good. I just have one problem. Even though it says my energy is full, it feels like I have nothing. And also the mini game 100 energy seems to last longer than the initial 300 you receive. If you could fix this taht would be great. And if it's designed like this can you make energy spending more efficient?

comments: This game is quite good. The graphics are pretty nice for a kid's game, and I do appreciate how there are vents to win power up. That is a very nice update. It seems like Disney took the kids element a little more into consideration.  The later stages do get understandable harder. But after the 100th stage is almost impossible for kid's standerard, but I don't mind it since other games do the same thing.

The game WAS great..spin the wheel, watch an ad, get a gameplay reward.  Great. But OMG now there's an BETWEEN squares AND for  rewards??!!! After you refused to give me back lost features  & said "Disney had NO INTENTION of doing that in the future", I had to think whether to uninstall the game, or suck it up & gimp along. Think you guys made the decision for. Too bad, I really enjoyed the game. Thx for what USED TO BE fun.

This may not mean much to most. After suffering from a head injury, my memory was terrible. Level 250, memory coming back strong. I play daily on 2 devices. Just wish you could win gems, you have  to buy them except 22 in beginning. All in all 3-4 stars.

I love love love this game!  BUT....THE ONLY THING I HATE IS THAT YOU CANNOT SAVE YOUR PROGRESS...IVE HAD TO REINSTALL THIS GAME 3x's AND LOST ALL PROGRESS! Maybe if i wasn't on level 280 it wouldn't be an issue! You should have this as a feature by now! UGH! 😠😭

Impossible to save or synchronize progress! As mentioned in many other reviews, it is not possible to save game progress, even if you link to your Facebook account. App support website confirms this functionality is simply not supported. Absolutely unbelievable. Just unbelievable. Don't waste your time on this game - it really will be _wasted_ time.

This is a great game and you can have fun for hours. I'd rate it 5 stars if a few things were changed. First, you need to be able to sync on other devices, especially if connecting to Facebook. I have other games that sync, no reason why this game can't get with that technology. Just got a new phone, was at level 346, and now have to start over on new phone. Luckily old phone will still be used. Second, it's impossible to earn gems. There should be special events to earn gems. Yes, you can spin to win, but the odds aren't in your favor to earn them. Third, there should be more opportunities to earn helps. The event to pass 5 levels is extremely difficult and there aren't many other opportunities to earn helps. I'm not spending money on this game. Take tips from Farm Heroes! Overall, this is a fun game and the graphics are cute.
description: WINNER OF GOOGLE PLAY’S BEST OF 2015 APPS! From the creators of Frozen Free Fall and Where’s My Water?, Disney Interactive brings you this one-of-a-kind bubble-shooter based on the hit Disney•Pixar film, Inside Out!   Growing up can be a bumpy road, and it’s no exception for Riley. Like all of us, Riley is guided by her Emotions — Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness. Join Riley's Emotions on a journey to match, sort and burst memory bubbles, as you travel through unique locations inspired by the film — Family Island, Dream Productions, Boy Band Island, Imagination Land, Train Yard, and more! Play this bubble shooter that twists the puzzle genre inside out! • SHOOT & MATCH memories• UNLOCK characters and play over 1000 levels• UNLEASH POWER-UPS – Create sunbursts with Joy, let the rain pour with Sadness, blaze a fiery path with Anger, repel matching memories with Disgust, and scatter orbs in frantic fun with Fear!• OVERCOME obstacles like Brain Freezes and jump ahead using boosters like Brain Storms! • CONNECT to Facebook to gift and receive free lives, and to see how you stack up against your friends!• IMMERSE yourself in the world of the film through stunning 3D animation and gameplay featuring voice actors from the film!Before you download this app, please consider that this app includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests.  You may choose to control targeted advertising within our applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device’s advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads).   • In-app purchases that cost real money• The option to accept push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content• Location-based services• Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards• As well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of CompaniesVisit the official Inside Out Thought Bubbles website – http://games.disney.com/inside-out-thought-bubbles-app	Privacy Policy - http://disneyprivacycenter.comChildren’s Privacy Policy - https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/Terms of Use - http://disneytermsofuse.com

description: Ultimate Match-3 game in the jewel world with addictive and exciting adventures!Jewels Legend (from LinkDesks Inc.) is an addictive and exciting adventure match 3 game filled with colorful jewels crunching effects! This jewel game has well designed puzzles for you to play in anytime and anywhere! Be the Jewel Star and unlock all castles in this jewel saga game.HOW TO PLAY★ Match 3 or more jewels in a line to crush them.★ Match 4 jewels to create special lightning jewels. Lightning jewels can make a blast to destroy all jewels in a row or column.★ Match 5 jewels with T or L shape to create special jewels bomb. The jewels bomb can destroy all jewels around it.★ Match 5 jewels in a line to create special color jewels. Color jewels can destroy all jewels with the same color of selected jewels .★ Match 6 jewels can create a more powerful lightning jewel.It can destroy all jewels in a row AND a column.★ Combine 2 special jewels together to make different kinds of fantastic effects to help you pass the level.★ Reach different level target to pass levels in your adventure. JEWEL LEGEND MATCH 3 PUZZLE FEATURES★ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.★ More than 550 addictive jewel quest levels - more added regularly.★ More than 150 challenging castle levels.★ 5 completely different best match 3 games types.★ Helpful magical boosters to win jewel stars.★ Daily free bonus in best jewel games.★ Auto hint when you jewel quest but could not find one match.PLAY WITH FRIENDS★ Connect to Facebook and play with friends!★ See your friends on the map!★ Synchronize the game on multiple devices and platforms!EASY AND FUN PLAY★ Easy to control, fun to play, great graphics!★ Just swap & match with your single finger!NO TIME LIMIT★ Play at your own pace!NO WIFI? descriptionHTML:
Ultimate Match-3 game in the jewel world with addictive and exciting adventures!

Jewels Legend (from LinkDesks Inc.) is an addictive and exciting adventure match 3 game filled with colorful jewels crunching effects! This jewel game has well designed puzzles for you to play in anytime and anywhere! Be the Jewel Star and unlock all castles in this jewel saga game.

HOW TO PLAY
★ Match 3 or more jewels in a line to crush them.
★ Match 4 jewels to create special lightning jewels. Lightning jewels can make a blast to destroy all jewels in a row or column.
★ Match 5 jewels with T or L shape to create special jewels bomb. The jewels bomb can destroy all jewels around it.
★ Match 5 jewels in a line to create special color jewels. Color jewels can destroy all jewels with the same color of selected jewels .
★ Match 6 jewels can create a more powerful lightning jewel.It can destroy all jewels in a row AND a column.
★ Combine 2 special jewels together to make different kinds of fantastic effects to help you pass the level.
★ Reach different level target to pass levels in your adventure.

JEWEL LEGEND MATCH 3 PUZZLE FEATURES
★ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
★ More than 550 addictive jewel quest levels - more added regularly.

★ 5 completely different best match 3 games types.

comments: Played this on PC, and really enjoyed it for its simple, quirky playstyle. While it does trail off at the end when you've mastered everything, the entertainment value is still strong. Particularly like going back to this title every now and again for a no-pressure, casual simulation game. Surprisingly, Game Dev Tycoon is pretty smooth on mobile, so kudos to the devs!

Just gave this game 5 star everything. When this game first came out on PC I couldn't afford it, so I pirated it. Sorry Greenheart! Now I have the chance to purchase your game and I'm glad I have. I know I'm going to play this for hours on end. It is definitely the best indie game I've ever played. Looking forward to your next project Greenheart!!

Loving the game! Not sure where else to try to contact the devs, but I am having an issue. My auto save is from Year 15. I am currently in year 22, and so is my manual save. However, whenever I try to load my manual save, it only takes me back to the year 15 autosave. I know it's just a game but it's pretty upsetting to not be able to access that lost progress, so any tips or response would be awesome. Great game!

It's good. 80 hours on PC version. This has some extra bits. Just want to support Dev, but am looking forward to playing it more on phone. Haven't had a bug yet either. Controls are great, they really lended themselves to mobile!

Played for days on the PC version. This one is just like it, except in the palm of your hands. No micro transactions, coins, or loot boxes. One price for the full game. Amazing!  In Game Dev Tycoon, you make games and build a company to from your parents garage, to a fully fledged AAA Studio. The controls are awesome. Your first games will be tests to how and what gamers like. You'll develop games for real life hardware (with names changed for licensing issues). Eventually, when you get to late game, you can create your own console and compete with other companies, releasing exclusive titles of your own, and dominating the market share.   You'll easily lose if you're not careful with your finances, but the game is so addicting that you'll keep coming back to it. Like I did.

I don't ever rate games, but this one deserves it. Only been playing an hour and I love it. I'm already excited to start over and try things differently. Totally worth the money and I highly suggest this for any sim fans. Great time killer as well. Good job guys.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Game Dev Tycoon. In this business simulation game you start your own game development company in the 80s. Create best selling games, research new technologies to boost your business and invent new game types. Become the leader of the market and gain worldwide fans.

Create games your way
Your success depends on your creativity and willingness to experiment. What topics and genres go well together? Should your Action game focus more on engine optimization or on quest design? The decisions you make during the development of your games will have a major impact on the ratings you receive.

Grow your company
Once you have successfully released a few games you can move into your own office and forge a world-class development team. Hire staff, train them and unlock new options.

Features
🕹 Start a game development company in the 80s
✍ Design and create games
💡 Gain new insights through game reports
👁 Research new technologies
⚙ Create custom game engines
🏢 Move into bigger offices
👩🏽‍💻 Forge a world-class development team
🔬 Unlock secret labs
📈 Become a market leader
💚 Gain worldwide fans
🥇 Unlock achievements

The full game has many more features which are not listed here to prevent spoilers.

The mobile version introduces
☠ A super-difficult (but optional) pirate mode
📰 An updated storyline
👩‍🍳 New topics for even more varied games
📱 New UI optimized for phones and tablets

A game with 💚
Game Dev Tycoon does not contain any in-app purchases or ads and you can play it without an internet connection. Enjoy!

comments: This game should be avoided. They don't care about what the players think and refuse to make improvements or adjustment players suggest. Progress is slow and even if you spend real money your odds of getting what you want is low.  Avoid starting at a costs. It is not worth your time.

It is impossible to have a good team without spending lots of money.  In order to have a good team you need 4 star level robots which even when you do get a chance to get one, you will end up with a duplicate which will be liquidated for just about nothing. Hence better players get better and lower level players stay at the bottom. Also players that spend alot tend to get better chances on draws that are supposed to be random. Wow that's a surprise

This game is a lot of fun. Great time killer. The only thing I think could be improve is the fact that you can't upgrade your bots with duplicates you get in the space bridge. And possibly better mechanics to see the bots you have walking around your base. Other than that. It's amazing.

Slow, VERY SLOW You have to wait for everything.  After each battle, the Autobots need 7 minutes to recover for the next battle, but I have enough fuel for battle.  And, as your robots get more stars, the more you have to wait.  So it is about 20 minutes per game for me. Slow  Then if you accidentally switch to another apps or shut the screen off for a second, you will have to wait for the game to reload for another 2 or 3 minutes.  slow  Graphics is beautiful, but story suck, and wait time is horrible

Updated. Games are supposed to be fun, if u play this game be prepared for a complete lack of respect for its user Base from the devs and a lack of fun events. Even those spending 1000s are bored  Don't start spending as the game is dying Don't expect good support from the game makers either who seem to be on a mission to put off it's older users to the point of stopping them playing the game. Ps dont expect many players as a deception. Pps #saveferal

First off, if you do not want duplicates, do _not_ spend any money on anything other than maybe another builder bot and don't waste any of your cyber coins on crystals until you get all of your builder bots.   So long as you don't care about getting dupes the game is fun. And you will get so very many many many dupes, often times the same bot in a row. Fortunately, the somewhat new cores help take away the pain of getting dupes.  Personally, I enjoy the strategic and alliance parts of this game a lot and the events are fun so long as you don't care about placement on the leaderboard. Having a good alliance helps a lot by the way. Don't be afraid to look around for ones that boot leaches.

comments: Love the fact that you can now try that move you didn't understand why SiFi didn't make. It is fun and realistic enough. I didn't give it a 5 stars because of some of the programing actions available. The waypoints are sometimes more trouble than they are worth. The programmation is limited to 24 hrs. A ruler would be very useful for projections over 24 hrs. But I am enjoying myself, even if my wife doesn't understand why I should wake up at 4 am to check my course.

A good improvement. My only beef is it cost money to change your boat colour. Be prepared to spend if you need to win. Find a few friends to race against and have fun without spending. Since last update keeps eating auto sail cards but only stays on for a few mimutes

Getting close to perfection, need to keep the update of wind to closer to ugrib actual, but very happy with true effect and updates, like the new features of wind display, much better for present and future course determination.  Please look to make driving dial a bit larger, and a bit less sensitive, and possibly a 1 degree up or down feature, like the arrows  but a +1 or minus 1, as feature on present dial is too sensitive and does not adjust so refined.  From a Canadian point of view, can you look to include some races like Vic-maui, Transpac or even more amazing and local to west coast of North America, races such as Swiftsure or Southern Straights... short but very technically sweet races that are very challenging.
Shame you can buy your way to the front of the fleet otherwise good fun.  So I have crossed the finish line 3 time but just keeps saying I have run aground ?? Hopeless

Is lots of fun and surprisingly addictive.  I do mostly just the Volvo Ocean Race.  Would be nice to have an option to overlay exclusion zones.  Don't need to be enforceable, but more fun for those trying to beat the actual fleet.
Great game, but I do get frustrated by it saying wrong sail, after I close the app, and after setting the sail properly.

description: Enjoy one minute of explosive match-3 fun from PopCap Games! Detonate as many gems as you can, 60 action-packed seconds at a time, in the hit puzzle game played by over 125 million people worldwide. Match three or more and create cascades of awesome with Flame gems, Star gems, and Hypercubes. Use powerful Rare Gems and upgradable Boosts to compete against friends, or challenge other players and top the global leaderboards.DISCOVER EXPLOSIVE EXCITEMENTCollect special Boosts like Scrambler to scramble the board, or Detonator to blast all special gems, and add extra power and fun to each match. Then upgrade them up to 10 times for scores that reach the stratosphere! Use Boosts any time and without spending Coins. Boosts never expire, so you can focus on upgrading the ones that work for you. PERFECT YOUR STRATEGY WITH RARE GEMSAmazing and unique Rare Gems like Sunstone and Plume Blast provide big scores and even more excitement. Combine them with Boosts to achieve unbelievably high scores. Play your way when you create mighty combinations of glittering Rare Gems and three Boosts to develop your own personal approach. TOP THE LEADERBOARDSChallenge your friends to beat your best 60-second score or compete with players worldwide in local and global leaderboards. Track your performance with helpful tips on how to improve your game. And, compare your strategies with top players by looking at their Rare Gem and Boost combos. SPARKLING NEW CONTENTFeast your eyes on fresh visuals and enjoy remixed audio that has been overhauled to improve your experience. Play live events with players around the world and complete special tasks each week to earn exclusive rewards. Plus, get in the game faster than ever with a rebuilt user experience and simplified navigation."Important Consumer Information. descriptionHTML:
Garnering Critical Acclaim from Around the World!
Dark Summoner, a Dark Fantasy Social Game Gem!
Downloaded over 9 million times worldwide!
Overwhelming Quality Recognized Around the Globe!

[Game Introduction]

Dark Summoner is set in a multidimensional world known as "Triaterra",
where a war between rival factions has plunged everything into chaos...

In the role of a Summoner, you must call forth Monsters and creatures from distant dimensions to join your army and fight for you in Missions and Events.
Battle other players in the Arena and make friends in Clans, where you cooperate with your Clan comrades to fight your way to the No. 1 spot and the glory that comes with supremacy!

[Gorgeous Monster Illustrations!]
Dark Summoner boasts Monster illustrations of outstanding quality by many famous Japanese and international artists!
More than 5,000 Monsters available!
Realistic, alluring, grotesque... A myriad of awesome Monsters to acquire!

[Command Great "Sentinels" in the Clan League!]
Battle alongside your Clan mates against enemy Clans in the Clan League!
Combine your Monsters with those of your Clan comrades to create giant "Sentinels".
Utilize various Abilities you learn as you skill up and knock out your opponents' Sentinel!

Dominate the frequently held "Ranked Brawls" to acquire both handsome reward and glorious honor!

[Strategic Battles]
Bolster your army with the Monsters of your choice and lead them into Battle!
Combos, Skills, and equippable Items known as "Relica" are just some of the keys to victory!
Find your own strategy and out-play your opponents!

[Frequently Held Events]
Battle, Raid, Foraging, and many more exciting Events held frequently!
Join Events for a chance to win exclusive Monsters and lots of Monster enhancement Items!

***********************************************************

* This game will run on Android 2.2 and higher, but some display issues may arise on devices running other OS versions.

* The game's initial load time may take a few minutes in areas with a weak network connection.
In such cases, please wait for the load to complete and do not close the application.

* A Wi-Fi connection is recommended for the optimal Dark Summoner experience.

* The game may not run smoothly in certain conditions.
This can sometimes be improved by restarting the application or rebooting your device.

comments: Enjoyable mental break. Wish there were fewer ads or at least more variety of ads.  Response about getting no ads with any purchase. This actually isn't valid as I just looked at each option to buy and none give the option of no ads. Plus I've made purchases and still nothing. I just updated the app and received the option of no ads. I clicked it and paid to no avail. Email has already been sent about it.

I really love this game. I downloaded it for mindless stress relief in between classes and it has not disappointed. Some of the levels are really tricky, I think in an attempt to get you to buy more balls. But that's not too much of a complaint. I bought the full version and it's worth it to be add free.

Hi there! I love this game! Im on level1839 and my hubby says i have a problem bahaha. The only thing ive noticed is the levels seem to have stopped introducing challenges and are sometimes just not possible to beat without serious coin. But that doesn't mean I plan to stop anytime soon hahaha.
It's an ok bubble blaster game, it has a lot of pop up ads. When you beat one level and move to the next there is always a 15 sec video. If your not on WiFi this will drag at your data
While its addicting its quite easy. I've gotten 3 stars on every level and I've played over 200 levels already. Ive only had to replay a level that failed 3 or 4 times.

This was fun... Until level 100 when they take away the ability to switch colors of the ball you're shooting. It makes it too difficult. I'm missing clearing it by one ball each time so then I'm watching ad after ad to avoid restarting the level. It's really disappointing how much that one thing has made me abandon the game and uninstall.

comments: Amazing gameplay, perfect controls, and an all around very fun FTP app. I'm not normally a fan of "stay in your lane" style games, but this one is actually fun. Watch your hops and make sure you time your landings right. If you miss the landing you can go from holding a large lead to struggling to get up the next hill...I highly recommend this game!

Amazing game!! I have purchased 1 or 2 bikes already, I would even pay to get new bikes, but it is very expensive. Please consider lowering to prices or making better bikes more accessible. Ive been stuck on the same level for 5 weeks. I want to continue playing but im loosing intrest not being able to advance. Maybe you could trade your old bikes in to get something in return for a newer bike. Im sure you will never read this, but you do have something special here! Thanks

Very fun BMX pump game. Seen a few reviews say it's gets impossible after level 3 when it becomes pay to win. I don't agree I've just reached level 8 in a few hours. If you ride bikes off road and understand how to pump you'll love it

Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

I loved this game for 3 days. Then it got to the point where I couldn't beat a level without upgrading my bike, but I couldn't upgrade my bike without spending real money. So disappointing. Don't waste your time if you don't want to spend real money!

The game is fun up until around the third level. After that it becomes near impossible to win any races without spending actual money to upgrade your bike. Had a lot of fun with it up until that point, but it's definitely not worth spending actual money on. Deleted the game after pay to win clearly became a necessity.
description: Mad Skills BMX 2 has finally arrived! See for yourself why Mad Skills games have been installed more than 40 million times worldwide, by action sports enthusiasts, professional athletes, and casual gamers alike. This is side-scrolling racing action as you’ve never experienced it, racing against people from across the globe on carefully designed tracks that will challenge your skills and — sometimes — your sanity.- Amazing physics that combine elements of realism with arcade fun- 7 different bikes that can be unlocked, upgraded, and customized- Tons of rider customization options to help you achieve your own on-track look- Dozens of hand-crafted tracks, with more added every single week for free- Weekly Jam competitions carried over from the smash-hit game Mad Skills Motocross 2- Competition with friends, people from your state or region, and international players- Evil bosses to defeat — a Mad Skills first!Mad Skills BMX 2 will get major developer support, ensuring tons of meaningful updates in the weeks, months, and years to come. comments: It's a fantastic game, nothing less than what I'd expected. The graphics were fantastic, the story engaging, the characters well developed. However, it was too difficult to earn the in game currency. Perhaps you could add in a video where the players are able to earn gems? Even if it's only once it twice a day, I'm sure it'll definitely help. All in all though, this was a great game as usual. Keep up the good work!

I've been obsessed with Sherlock Holmes since I was about 7. Every incarnation of him, be it the books, the TV show or even the anime has left me completely in awe of Sherlock.  So I'm sad to say that I feel this falls short. As it's own game, it's great. I love the story and the characters are well developed. However, I went into it with a certain idea of how Sherlock should act, and it's not what I got. I understand why though, and it's not too distracting from the game. With that being said, I thoroughly enjoyed myself. The puzzles were a fun mechanic (a little easy for my liking, but still enjoyable) and the art style is really pleasing. Overall, I do think it's a game worth downloading.

I really love it. Just like the other "shall we date" games you guys made. However, twice already did i not get my free SH points after doing the required action for it. Is there anything for that? Also if you guys are into the idea, you can do a free small amount of gems for watching an advertisement once every day or something? All the rest in the games you guys make is awesome and i love em all.

The best Shall We Date game by far.  The characters are funny,  especially Sherlock and I love the plots.  If you can make Sebastian,  Jack, Hercule,  Jeremy and even Lestrade's routes it would be SUPER appreciated.  Omg, I think Lestrade's route would be the funniest because ALL of them would rip and mock him.  😂  Update: I still think it's the best one.

I just have to say: I love that the MC is not the usual cheerful idiot that somehow makes every guy fawn over her even though she can barely string a sentence together. This MC is portrayed as witty and intellegent as well as beautiful.  All the guys are also intellegent and quirky.  The stories are well written AND well edited. I never have trouble figuring out the plot due to poor grammar or translations.

Great game, I think it's the best game shall we date had. Female lead is independent woman who doesn't make me wonder why everyone likes her. Guys are great as well, plus I absolutely the writing. It's probably the only game were I was bothered to play more than 3 routes
description: Complete the prologue before Feb. 28, 11:00 PM (PDT) and get useful items! Don’t miss the starter SALE to get special avatar items for FREE.◆From the creators of Otome games for FREE with <32 million DLs> comes the newest competitor, Guard Me, Sherlock!◆◆WHAT’S AN OTOME GAME?You’re the heroine - Otome - in these simulation games, experiencing the sweetest moments with hot men. Just tap your way through more easily than reading a visual novel. These large-scale love story games are different from either anime, manga or romance novels but are just as enjoyable on your devices!◆ABOUT GUARD ME, SHERLOCK!“I didn’t realize this until you showed up, but when I sleep alone, my bed is EMPTY and COLD.”You visit the office of the world’s greatest detective, Sherlock Holmes, wanting to request him something unique. There, you meet charming men with quite a colorful personality, together with whom you’ll get involved in various incidents.Do you want Sherlock to be your bodyguard and live together with him and Watson in his office at 221B Baker Street? Or do you want to go on a trip with the mysterious millionaire Professor Moriarty and catch a thief? Can you escape the “elementary” crime? Experience thrills after thrills in modern London with classic characters transformed into irresistible hotties!The British geniuses will eventually fall in love with you and whisper words of love, kissing you. Choose the path of your romance story with them, and the ending you’ll reach will be a moving one!Solve the mystery of the case and love all in one story!◆YOUR HANSOME GUARDS:Sherlock Holmes - “Do YOU have feelings for John?”Undoubtedly, the world’s greatest detective with exceptional logic. He used to only be interested in strange cases until he met you, and he’ll notice he has feelings towards you unlike any he’s ever felt before. But his best friend John H Watson has the same feelings toward you too! Where will that love triangle lead you? John H Watson - “I promise that I’ll always strive to be someone who’s good enough for you, someone who deserves you. So...will you marry me?” The best friend of Sherlock and another genius. He’s smart, gentle, and perfect - what’s the reason behind him proposing to you on the very day you meet? And what will you do when Sherlock tells you that you’re the only one that he could open his traumatized heart to?James Moriarty - “By the time this journey is over, your life will have changed COMPLETELY.”The Napoleon of the backstreets of London, and the biggest rival of Sherlock Holmes. Coming from a noble family and the way of the law, he plans a stage aboard the gorgeous Reichenbach Express for you. He’s never the one to hide his affection for you...but at the same time holds a horrifying secret.◆FEATURES:*FREE to play!*Read with Story Tickets, which will recover themselves in time*Beautiful artwork, alluring soundtracks and motion effects*Solve mysteries unique to each character’s story*Multiple endings depending on the choices you make*Cute avatars in Japanese anime style with constant updates*In-game events frequently held with exclusive prizes*Available ON FACEBOOK too!◆HIGHLY RECOMMENDED IF YOU:-love romance novels or movies-love Japanese games, manga, novels or anime-are interested in dating sim games but prefer something more simple-want to enjoy being in love with a variety of men-want to have a love affair without anyone knowing-love to read mystery novels-are crazy about Sherlock Holmes-love to investigate and judge someone guilty-love romance games / dating games for free -love fashion and dressing up your avatar-enjoy reading fiction with grand setting◆FOLLOW US:NTT Solmare is a Japanese company that strives to make the best Otome games / romance games / dating games for adults and fantasy games for free.facebook.com/ShallWeDate.NTTSolmare (*LIKE us if you enjoy our romance games!)youtube.com/user/ShallWeDate

The British geniuses will eventually fall in love with you and whisper words of love, kissing you. Choose the path of your romance story with them, and the ending you’ll reach will be a moving one!
Solve the mystery of the case and love all in one story!

◆YOUR HANSOME GUARDS:
Sherlock Holmes - “Do YOU have feelings for John?”
Undoubtedly, the world’s greatest detective with exceptional logic. He used to only be interested in strange cases until he met you, and he’ll notice he has feelings towards you unlike any he’s ever felt before. But his best friend John H Watson has the same feelings toward you too! Where will that love triangle lead you?

John H Watson - “I promise that I’ll always strive to be someone who’s good enough for you, someone who deserves you. So...will you marry me?”
The best friend of Sherlock and another genius. He’s smart, gentle, and perfect - what’s the reason behind him proposing to you on the very day you meet? And what will you do when Sherlock tells you that you’re the only one that he could open his traumatized heart to?

James Moriarty - “By the time this journey is over, your life will have changed COMPLETELY.”
The Napoleon of the backstreets of London, and the biggest rival of Sherlock Holmes. Coming from a noble family and the way of the law, he plans a stage aboard the gorgeous Reichenbach Express for you. He’s never the one to hide his affection for you...but at the same time holds a horrifying secret.

◆FEATURES:
*FREE to play!
*Read with Story Tickets, which will recover themselves in time
*Beautiful artwork, alluring soundtracks and motion effects
*Solve mysteries unique to each character’s story
*Multiple endings depending on the choices you make

*In-game events frequently held with exclusive prizes
*Available ON FACEBOOK too!

comments: Awesome game.  Biggest downside I don't like is, unlike similar games, once the small packs are bought you are only offered the largest ($50/$100). I'd honestly like to see all packs back or at least if you're going to tier up buying options, at least offer a $25 as lowest.

Once you loose the shield, you will get farmed by higher level players, forcing you to use whatever resources you have left over to repair. Once you finished repair, you not surprisingly get attacked again. This results you in being frustrated and uninstalling or you foolishly spend your hard earned cash for resources that you will soon enough loose from being attacked.

Why do you need a commander to be sent to gather resources? This is absurd! I need troops to gather but then again I want my commanders to attack renegades and stuff! Please make gathering without th e need to send a commander with troops!!

Don't waste your time unless you are going to spend large amounts of money. Free to play players get attacked daily by credit card players and you dont get a chance to progress. Good idea for a game but sadly very imbalanced.

Overall an excellent game IF you have an alliance to back you up.  Otherwise you are a sitting duck. I recommend this game anytime to anyone because you do a lot in half an hour.   Only option I request is warlords events diring the weekend.  Poly and Thor are critcal resources and there never seems to be enough unless you pay for it.

Again the only way to move forward is to pay large amounts of money.!!! every rss is so scarce to retrieve and trying to obtain VIP is I don't even know how without paying money.... the chat is just plain messed up also...
description: When the entire world is at war, bold generals rise to the challenge and lead their armies toward Global Conquest. The time has come for you to strike! Do you have what it takes? Build your base, dominate regions of an actual real-world map, and lead your faction to conquer every nation of the globe! You are a single modern military order, cut from the same cloth as a sultan or the Vikings of old, destined to forge a mighty empire. But you are not free from rivals. Many generals share your ambition and have their own loyal armies to back them. Some will join you and your clan. Some will clash with you as rivals. But friend or foe, only one can reign supreme. Go boom or go bust as you recruit skilled commanders into your army, build a massive war machine, forge brilliant strategies, and order strikes on enemy bases in the most massive free MMO warfare game on mobile! **GAME FEATURES** REAL-WORLD ACTION• Play with thousands of real mobile players as they clash around the world.• Talk to your war friends and foes alike in the global chat as you plot every strike to grow your empire.• Build and order ultra-realistic units based on actual modern war machines like mobile artillery, battle tanks and big boom-dropping bombers! • Wage total warfare as you clash across a faithfully recreated World Map. REAL-TIME CONQUEST• Clash with the ferocity of modern Vikings in live, real-time PvP warfare.• Become the Sultan of Boom by issuing split-second orders in-game that determine which army will emerge victorious in battle.• Call on your clan for reinforcements when the clash is most intense. REAL MILITARY STRATEGY• Feel free to build your war base however you want in a customizable mobile experience.• Order your commander to strike, then power them up to bring the boom!• Forge a clan, lead it with the strategy of a sultan, and plan your strike together._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/SNS_FB_ENTwitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_ENInstagram: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_IGYouTube: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_YTThis app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-usePrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-noticeEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula
